instruction: What is Gremolata?
output:
What is Gremolata?

In many cases, a gremolata is not a "recipe" in exactly the same sense as an Italian cooking recipe. Instead, this is a collection of items that a more seasoned cook knows should be added to a dish, that are usually finely chopped and mixed together prior to use and, typically, are never written down. The reason is that every culinary expert, and every cook, has a different version of the "ideal" gremolata √¢¬Ä¬î to the point that, in some cases, even the individual components may be called by different names. Often the gremolata components in different recipes are used in proportions that would be considered unusual and, in addition, rarely are they used in exactly the same order.

That being said, the following list should serve as a good starting point in your quest to create a homemade gremolata:

  * 7 to 10 basil leaves (about 1/2 cup chopped).
  * 1/4 clove garlic
  * 1/4 cup chopped parsley
  * About 1/4 cup chopped lemon zest

You can keep the mixture in a freezer bag or jar, but I recommend the quick and easy method of just putting it in the mixing bowl.
FACT

A recipe for tomato and oregano salad was published by Italian culinary expert Giovanni Battista Scalise in 1723.

A few decades later, a similar recipe with an addition of marjoram (in English, called "oregano"), and it was called "orecchiette with tomatoes, garlic and marjoram."

This was just a hint of one possible direction that the tomato and oregano salad could have taken. In 1822, an article in the _Gazzetta Piemontese_ newspaper made the recipe even sweeter: "the ripe and sun-dried tomatoes of Ticino are chopped, mixed with a little vin santo [sweet wine], salt, pepper and marjoram; this is a very interesting recipe."

FACT

Marjoram is the only herb that has both Latin and classical Greek names.

It comes from the Greek word √é¬º√é¬±√è¬Å√é¬≥√é¬ø√è¬Å√é¬±√é¬ø√è¬Ç (maro√É¬∫ras: "dried garlic").

From there, the ingredients of the gremolata became various spices: for example, rosemary, coriander, orange peel, alliums, fennel flower, lavender, basil, sage, thyme (it is the only gremolata recipe not including marjoram) √¢¬Ä¬î to which they all refer as oregano.

It is not just the name that changed; according to a variety of historians, the recipe was transformed into a variety of different dishes, based on the availability of the ingredients of the time.

In the 1800s, gremolata became one of the main "pre-aroma" condiments. In 1857, in the book entitled The "Recipe" for the Pasta, it was called "gremolata, marjoram, oregano, basil and rosemary."

Gremolata is also one of the ingredients of "Pesto Genovese": the famous sauce of Liguria that was first written around 1078 CE.

Some versions of gremolata add other herbs, sometimes whole and at other times finely chopped: thyme, sage, marjoram, lovage, rosemary, bay leave, horseradish (this last one is usually used instead of coriander), garlic.

FACT

The gremolate recipe has changed several times during the 2,000 years since when it was first created in a monastery in France. It is said that, since that time, the recipe has been changed more than 1,600 times!

The oldest gremolata to be preserved in any recipe book is this one that we came across in the 1300s in a book compiled by an Italian monk:

instruction: Why did humans evolve to believe in God?
output:
Why did humans evolve to believe in God?
Science explains almost everything, and yet we still have a desire for transcendent meaning and even a need for God, says David Albert
Dustin Euston
Mon Feb 13, 2012 - 2:57 pm EST Sat Jun 19, 2021 - 10:42 am EDT
February 13, 2012 (LifeSiteNews.com)  If there is something that science has been unable to explain, we tend today to believe that it must be God, as if that is somehow a better explanation than any other. A prime example of this belief is the claim that we have an inborn drive to believe in God. If this were really true, it would be a clear explanation of how a God-shaped hole could exist inside each of us, and what can be called a missing link in the case for God.
But a closer examination of just what this claim really constitutes, and even what the people who make the claim are actually asserting, raises troubling questions.
The idea that we have an inborn drive to believe in God that would explain why we believe in God at all is usually put forth in one of two ways. First, it is posited that there is something in the human experience that makes believing in God an easy position to take. And, second, there is the claim that this drive is some sort of universal, basic human experience. By these two means, then, the idea is suggested that this experience is actually fundamental to the human experience, and therefore some sort of explanation must be given as to what exactly this would be that would generate our experience of God.
Since the first claim suggests that there is something in human experience that actually makes belief in God plausible, it would seem that if it is true that the human experience contains something that would make belief in God possible, then it would be difficult to say that it is a mistake to believe in God. Since the second claim asserts that the drive to believe in God is just another part of how our brains work, then it would also seem that even if there were nothing that would make the idea of God plausible, something about our brains actually does make it so that we could come to believe that God exists.
So what exactly is this drive or this experience or this something that makes religious belief possible and that explains why we would even have the idea of God in the first place?
What is usually proposed is that the experience of a person feels like there is something that is trying to connect to a larger reality (though these people usually do not use those words) that does so in some of the same or similar ways in which science itself does. They are saying that they feel they have a desire for something more. So, what is the more that these persons and scientists themselves are feeling is a desire for the truth. This desire, when satisfied by science and even by natural theology, is what these people believe makes them feel satisfied and happy. This need for truth, even if it is satisfied by science or a naturalistic explanation of God, is thought of as what makes God even possible. And that this would make it possible for people to believe God exists is the basic idea that drives this argument.
But this idea does not work, because it is based on what they are saying that every person is just having this feeling of a desire for truth. So, the problem is that they are not just saying that they have the feeling that science fills the same void that God does, and even that science fills them up somehow (though others insist that this is not the case!). They are also saying, in effect, that every person has this same desire, and if so, this is not even a good explanation of why we would believe in God.
Since there is nothing in our experience that would even give us the idea of anything that is outside of the truth, and since we are all experiencing the same kind of a desire for the truth, there is nothing to give us the idea that someone might call what we encounter God. We all experience the truth, and it is not the truth that we find within the realm of what science has discovered. And, so, if nothing in our experience or in ourselves gives us the idea of God, then God cannot exist.
But is it true that there is something about our experience or about what we are that actually does fulfill that need for truth and for a connection to a larger reality? No. It is just not true. Science shows that the world we find ourselves in is all that it is that everything we see is all there is to see; there is nothing about what science discovers that would give us the idea of something greater in any way that could give us the idea of a supreme being. And, so, this second claim also is not correct.
Moreover, though it might seem that this third idea is based on an assumption that all

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mauritian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Mine Frite?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mauritian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Mine Frite?
As far as Ive been able to find out Mine Frite is a Creole dish that was prepared in the past but is difficult to cook and serve today. It would likely be hard to find in a restaurant too.
For me, Mauritian food is an acquired taste! If youve been to Mauritius you know that its a melting pot of cultures with Indian, French, African and Chinese influences. Mauritian food may look like you made it on the spot in a hurry, and that is often the case.
Mauritian dishes are a blend of local ingredients, spices, and cooking techniques. Dishes are full of vegetables and generally include a combination of herbs, chilli, spices, rice, and fried fish.
My suggestion is to visit Le Bistro and try the dishes. Le Bistro, in the old Port Louis, is a classic restaurant run by Tresor and Renee. They are delightful hosts and serve wonderful Mauritian food.
What are some vegetarian food choices in Mauritius?
Mauritian cuisine tends to be meat and seafood oriented. There are a few vegetarian options though. Most vegetarian dishes I found had at least a little meat (Ive put them in italics below.) You can ask in restaurants to substitute an ingredient for something else, but the chefs do not make a special sauce. Instead they use coconut milk to add taste and texture.
We also found some nice vegetarian options in the market.
Here is a recipe for a classic Mauritian salad: Vegetarian Mutton Curry Salad.
There is some good vegetarian food on the island, but it is more about what is prepared. I found little, if anything, in the food outlets in hotels etc.
I came across very few vegetarian restaurants in Mauritius; but if you keep an open mind you can still enjoy the local flavours.
Le Bistro & Les Jardins de Sefou, both run by Tresor and Renee, are excellent restaurants. You will enjoy the warm atmosphere and the friendly and well-spoken staff, plus the great food and unique design.
The Mutton Curry Salad in Les Jardins de Sefou is one of the best Ive ever had. It is a blend of potatoes and mixed vegetables with the meat made of potatoes and coconut milk.
The dish is a vegetarian version of a meat curry, and it is delicious! I didnt want to take any home.
One of my most favourite dishes from Mauritius is the Vegetarian Mutton Curry Salad from Les Jardins de Sefou. I dont eat meat so I asked if they could make me this dish with lentils. Yes they could! So I tried it and it was amazing.
The dish is full of vegetables with no meat, but it works! I didnt notice the absence of meat at all. The curry mix is made of coconut milk, plus some spices and some lentils instead of meat.
I also had this dish, the Vegetarian Mutton Curry Salad from Le Bistro. They have a vegetarian menu, which consists of Indian and Mauritian (Creole) foods. My favourite dishes on the menu are Mango Fondant, Creole Chicken Soup and the Vegetarian Mutton Curry Salad.
I made my own homemade mutton curry in Mauritius and loved it! When I returned home, I was able to make my own version of Mauritius curry, and for the first time I could actually taste and compare my own home-made curry with a traditional one in Mauritius.
Mauritian Mutton Curry is a dish that combines a blend of potatoes, peppers, onions and mixed vegetables in which meat is substituted by pureed sweet potatoes and coconut milk which creates a smooth curry taste.
You can follow the instructions in the recipe but it is made using a similar method as other Indian dishes you may recognise. I found this recipe in an old Mauritian booklet and the instructions are not too difficult to follow. Of course everyone makes it differently.
The best way to serve this curry is to add boiled, hard-boiled or fried eggs, and I always use white ones. I make enough for a meal or a lunch, plus any extra can be reheated the next day, and I freeze what I dont eat.
Mauritian curry is an amazing dish and I recommend you try it on your holiday. I enjoyed making it and eating it. You can also find some Mauritian cuisine ingredients, including curry powder, in a supermarket.
My next post is about the dishes my daughter and I made at home.
Thank you to all who have read, commented and shared on my Mauritius posts. You have helped make 2015 a great year for

instruction: Why can I see the moon during the day?
output:
Why can I see the moon during the day?
To the right is a photograph of me pointing my digital camera at the sun at 10:15pm on October 18th, 2010 in New York City...and that was 2 weeks ago.
The "photographic" moon is seen because I took two photos from the same camera at roughly the same time; one using B&W film, and one using a low-ISO (and very dark) sensor setting to try and create the best possible image I could of a cloudy day...and that gave me the best possible image of the sun I possibly could have gotten!
By taking two photos of the same thing, and changing the settings, the resulting image is a much more accurate than any picture would otherwise be. For anyone who is interested in the science behind this process, check-out my previous posting on how the sun's light makes everything white or very bright, and everything else dark; which means that when you try and take a picture with a digital camera it will end up "white", or very bright, wherever light is present, and therefore "dark" where light is not present. The science of a digital camera is very simple like that. They are either very bright or very dark. There is no in-between.
So, I took two photos of the cloud-filled sun at the same time; one in color (red, green, blue = RGB), and one in black and white. Since film and most paper have a much greater range than digital sensors, the resulting two photos were printed on a color printer.
By printing them out, you get a much better view of the photographic moon I've chosen to name; because the image of the moon is simply the photographic "highlight" out of all of the very dark things I chose to include in my photo of the day, including the clouds and the sun's "photographic" appearance as it set into the clouds - which was truly magical to see live!
As you can see, the moon is only a minor detail in the larger (color) image of the sun, not a central object as that same moon seems to be in the photographic (black and white) image, in which you can clearly see what I've named "the photographic moon"...as it floats off into the morning, as the sun's last rays of light fade off and the moon is bathed once again in the red light of the sunrise!
So now, the photographic moon seems to be taking over and stealing everyone's attention away from the star in the middle of the picture - where the sun was, and everyone is looking up into the sky to see what's "coming up" that's bright this morning...which is where the moon is!
I've learned two invaluable lessons today: one, that the sun's rays at sunset are a lot brighter than most people realize; and two, that the moon has the ability to give the impression that it is far more powerful and bright than it actually is, but people will still flock to it anyway and admire its apparent beauty.
The photographic moon's appearance is a reminder to all who see it to pay closer attention to the light around you as it becomes dimmer and dimmer, and never forget to go out dancing at least one single time while it's still bright: because it's not always going to be that bright!

instruction: How do I take care of a wooden table?
output:
How do I take care of a wooden table?
To make your table more durable, simply dust it with a damp cloth and wipe off the dust and dirt. If the table is not very clean, then use a damp cloth to wipe it again and a dry one to clean it.
What's wrong with a wooden table?
It can be damaged by fire and insects such as termites or carpet beetles. It might also have an uneven base, which will negatively affect users and guests around you.

If the legs are wobbly, then you will need to tighten the bolts of the legs in order to make the table stable. If you don't know how to do that, you are welcome to hire a professional.

The easiest way to make your table shorter is to remove a few legs.

There are several options to cover your dining table, including tablecloths, table runners, and table covers.

If the lacquer has been scratched or damaged, you will need to use a polyurethane to cover it.
Are there any alternatives to wooden tables?

A wooden table is also highly appreciated by many homeowners as it offers a classic and natural look.
Another advantage of a wooden table is that they can be very elegant and trendy. Even though they look rustic, they can be quite modern when purchased in the right color and used as a buffet in particular.
As wooden tables are very high-quality pieces, it is important to polish them properly. They may show scratches or other damages if they are not properly maintained.
Lastly, a wooden table provides you with a more natural feeling. When used at gatherings, this makes people feel more comfortable, especially if it is used every day.
The main disadvantages of a wooden table are the issues that you will face when it comes to storing it. This can be a bit challenging as these tables sometimes have legs of different sizes, and this makes them hard to store. You can store your wooden table upside down if you want to make it easier to transport.

instruction: What year was the Yamato Battleship built?
output:
What year was the Yamato Battleship built?
The Yamato was commissioned in 1942 as the Japanese battleship Yamato. It was 263.1 m (863 ft 1 in) long and had a beam of 38.9 m (127 ft 8 in), a draft of 9.40 m (30 ft 10 in) and displacement of 64,200 tons (63,100 tonnes).
You might be interested: Readers ask: What Did Japan Do During The Great Depression?
Why was Yamato so big?
The reason for their construction lay in the experience gained by the Imperial Japanese Navy during and immediately after World War II. The Japanese had used smaller battleships like the Yamato class, but by 1944, they had begun to experience loss of battle cruisers and battleships, and wanted a response.
Was Yamato stronger than Bismarck?
The Yamato was heavier, 69,000 tons compared to Bismarcks 42,000 tons, much bigger, faster, and better protected than the Bismarck.
Whats the most powerful ship in the world?
The first U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier, the USS Enterprise (CVN-65), was christened on 24 April 1960 at Newport News. At 1,100 feet (335 m) in length, she also held the title of being the longest ship in the world at the time of her launch.
Which carrier has the most aircraft?
The American aircraft carrier USS Gerald R. Ford (CVN-78) departed Norfolk, Virginia, on 29 April 2020 and transited to Naval Station San Diego for commissioning. When commissioned, CVN-78 will be the U.S. Navys second Ford-class carrier, following the USS John F.
Where is the Battleship Yamato now?
The Yamato sank at approximately 01:48 7 April 1945. The wreck of the Yamato lays on a north-east to south-west course within the Sanko Strait between the islands of Okinoshima and Ajiro, in the town of Naka.

instruction: Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra.
output:
Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra. Why did they become romantically involved in the first place?
How did their relationship evolve, what did it mean for Rome and for their nations?
When and how did their relationship end?
To what extent was their relationship based on real love, or was it just another tool in Caesar's career arc?
The Rise of Augustus
What was the social and political climate in Rome when Augustus took power?
How did Augustus achieve his rise to power?
What powers did Augustus have?
What is Augustus' reputation today?
How did Augustus change the Roman Empire?
The Legacy of Augustine
What was Augustus' legacy at the time the empire ruled?
And what is Augustus' legacy today?
An Empire of the Mind
What was the Roman Empire?
What were the advantages of being a citizen of the Roman Empire?
How did the Romans manage to conquer so much territory?
Why did the Roman Empire fall?
What role have religious figures played in the decline and fall of the Roman Empire?
Why have the Romans been so important to historians all over the world?
How does the Roman Empire affect our society today?
When it comes to the study of history, the Roman Empire is considered the pinnacle. Whether students are learning about the rise and fall of this great civilization in the class of History 101 or 111, they are likely to use a textbook written by a popular Roman specialist, such as William Eder, as well as primary resources in the form of documents and even artifacts.
Some of the most famous primary resources of the Roman Empire include these documents/artifacts:
Virgil's Aeneid
Documents of - The Emperor Diocletian
Documents of - The Emperor Constantine
The Domus Aurea (Golden House) in Rome.
A Roman statue of Romulus and Remus.
The Roman aqueduct.
The famous frieze of Pompeii.
These documents/artifacts can be found in collections across the country.
William Eder has written many popular textbooks and is perhaps best known for his work The Complete Book of Roman History, first published in 2004 and revised in 2012.
According to a review of the revised edition, Eder's textbook has been widely praised by teachers and students and has become a popular resource in teaching about the history of Rome.
The text covers all aspects of the history of the Roman Empire and is used as a reference for a wide variety of courses, such as World History, Modern World History, and European History.
Students use the book to understand the story of the development of Rome from the Kingdom of Italy under King Romulus through the glory days of the Roman Republic and onto the Empire and its fall.
The Revised Edition (2012) features 17 new chapters, several new photos and illustrations, and even more maps, graphs, and timelines.
Eder describes the book as an easy-to-read and easy-to-understand narrative.
Whether or not you plan on using textbooks in your History courses, you are likely to come across primary sources and documents from the Roman Empire in at least one of your teaching units.
And, after all, what is history without primary resources?

instruction: Hi, I'm in the mood for a Bloody Mary. Can you give me a recipe for making one?
output:
Hi, I'm in the mood for a Bloody Mary. Can you give me a recipe for making one?
Mixed Bloody Mary: This drink is served as an "as you like it", so the only real rules are that the drink must be made with vodka and tomato juice. There are infinite recipes for mixed Bloody Marys, with every bartender on every bar creating their own special formula. Some use 80 proof vodka, some use the less potent 100 proof or even 150 proof. The "secret" of making a good Bloody Mary is to use the lightest possible vodka available to avoid a harsh finish. This is why some bartenders use vodka with fewer grains used for distillation. Of course, you should always taste before you drink to see if you like the flavor to your liking. To taste all three, start at the left and go clockwise around my drink display.
Vodka Bloody Mary: There is only one single ingredient in this drink, an 80 proof straight vodka. Some people use the 100 proof or 150 proof vodka, but the bartender's goal is to make sure the drink is not too heavy or strong. Some people choose to season the Bloody Mary with a few shakes of celery salt. Since this is the simplest of all drinks to make, there are no rules about when to use it unless you wish it for special occasions or just because you want to. It is traditionally served at Christmas time and at New Years in honor of 2010.
Dirty Martini: This drink calls for a very good quality olive oil, or even a fresh squeezed lemon juice, and some simple syrup or straight soda. This is the drink of choice when you want to drink something on the lighter side without sacrificing the flavor of good vodka. The bartender's goal is to make a drink as smooth as possible in order to allow the drinker to better appreciate the vodka. It's best made with a fresh squeezed lemon juice, but there is no hard and fast rule as to how these drinks should be made.
Kahlua and Cream: One of the most popular drinks in America, this drink combines a flavored coffee liqueur and heavy whipped cream to create a decadent treat. Some people choose to season the Kahlua with some light brown sugar. While some people consider the drink to be a "morning" drink, it can be enjoyed anytime. There is really no difference, except maybe some people prefer theirs with milk because it is similar to a coffee milk.
A couple of days ago, my friend from high school who I have not seen in about ten years (yes, that long) stopped by to give me some gifts. He brought me a bottle of vodka and a bottle of the vodka flavored coffee liqueur in honor of Christmas and for my birthday. He also brought me some coffee. We drank some of the coffee and drank some drinks, including homemade Bloody Marys. For those who don't know, I am the barista at our local Starbucks, so I thought I would make a few variations of the drink to give to my friends.
I used Kahlua instead of vodka because my friend brought me the coffee liqueur, which has a stronger coffee flavor, and for consistency. The other thing I wanted to do was take advantage of the holiday time and make a mix-in drink for New Year's Eve. A lot of people in our household are not huge alcohol drinkers, so this drink is a good way to have a little taste of alcohol without all the effects.
After I had the right amount of alcohol in my drink, I added some of the Kahlua coffee whipped topping and then added some orange juice.
When this was done, I topped it off with a cinnamon stick and some whipped cream.
If you want to have a taste or two of the holidays, but aren't as excited to down a big glass of booze, why not try out our homemade recipe? No mixers, no extra ingredients, just clean up with a little mix-in. It's the only way to celebrate the time of year.
How do you like to make your Bloody Mary? Let us know in the comments below.

The term ‚Äúworld music,‚Äù first coined in the 1980s, was developed as a way of grouping together genres and styles of music from all over the place. World music can contain a mixture of ancient and modern styles, but it is usually a blend of Western and non-Western traditions or styles.

Classical music is a genre of music that was written and composed before the 20th century. The music may include instruments, such as the violin, flute, and piano, or just the performance of a song or piece. Classical music also includes opera and opera, classical ballet, and chamber music.

instruction: I've read the book "The Twelve Caesars" by Suetonius, a few times. I'm curious about the context, of when he wrote.
output:
I've read the book "The Twelve Caesars" by Suetonius, a few times. I'm curious about the context, of when he wrote.
Suetonius's "The Twelve Caesars" was probably published between 119 and 122.
Which is interesting, because of course it describes what was going on in 1st century Roman history, so even if he was writing it, why did he do it then and not before?
What's his motivation?
Was he trying to document the lives of the various Emperors, because he loved to tell dirty jokes about it, or was he actually trying to influence future Romans to take a more "pro-rebellion" (or whatever) stand during the reign of the emperor who Suetonius was writing for, or why?
If he was just doing it to document history, then in all his time since 1st century Rome was gone and he certainly didn't seem to think he was writing a book that would be taken seriously, as he didn't even give his book a title.
So what is his actual motivation for writing it? Because I'm guessing it was about more than just making dirty, funny stories to make people laugh.
Suetonius, at the time, was probably a part of history, or politics, or something since he worked for the current Emperor, but now it's clear he was trying to write down a reference for historians who would come along after him, and he couldn't even do that because in 500 years, when he was dead, there were already too many new authors. The only way one of his books would be remembered in 500 years was if he had been writing down some of the dirty history he had inside his head, which he was.
So were these 10 other authors in Rome in 500 CE, really there when he was writing?
Was he trying to make new history?
Or was he trying to make a set of funny stories that were true?
Because it's obvious he'd done research, and not just read stuff off of a Google page, so he knew most of those things wouldn't have made sense to anyone reading them 2000 years ago, but to do research on the Roman Empire and its history, he would have had to see many things, and read books that were thousands of years old.
And yet.... the things he said would seem, to us, to be made up or, at best, exaggerated, but at the very least these 10 other authors would have had access to these things, would have gotten the stories from him, would have seen his letters or something, but they just picked and chose the best stories that would fit with their beliefs about how the world works.
And then, they, like Suetonius, wrote the stories down, and passed them on. And we think these stories aren't true because everyone agrees everyone else was just making it all up.
That's a fascinating idea, really.
But then, would they have told the good stories, or the fun stories, or the funny ones, and what about their sources?
I would like to read even a little bit more about it, but I've read it, and as far as I can tell, it's about these 12 dead leaders, who did these things, that weren't all documented by anybody. I think it's about that.
I can get behind that.
Here's what happens, though. I can understand why it would be important to have a set of stories to teach kids. If you know the history and how to live right in the Roman world, and you know your parents are dead and you're being raised by a new family, your new step-family won't know these things, and, because they see you as a guest on theirs, it would be a big deal to get you to change your mind about some important "family" things, and you're living in a different world.
So you've got a group of stories, and other stories, and you don't know what's true and what's not true and you don't know what's important and what's not. So you can make up your own stories to try to keep order in your life until you figure out how to live. How you start out believing that Nero should be on the throne and then that Augustus shouldn't even exist because he didn't seem to be doing anything in particular, and you try to explain why you think it should be Augustus's brother Tiberius.
And you write the stories down, and then they keep adding another 10 writers, to make the book bigger, because that's more important than the real thing, and they'

### Exercise 5-30

Answer the following questions about the two American political parties.

  * What is the Democratic Party?

  * What is the Republican Party?

How were they founded?

  * What do the two parties promise voters?

## 5.7 Politics for America

### 5.7.1 Introduction

What does it mean to "vote your party"? Is it fair to ask party members to vote in opposition to their own ideals when voting on a particular issue? Or is it only fair to ask voters to vote with their ideology on election day? As you will see, these questions raise many others and they are among the issues of the day, as both parties make "compromise" or "bargains" on major issues.

In the United States, we all have a stake in the outcome of the next election; we all have a stake in the future of our children and our grandchildren. The only way to change matters is to take action. The first step is to become informed. We hope that this section has helped to accomplish that goal.

### 5.7.2 The First Amendment Right to Freedom of Speech

In 1789, the United States became a new nation with a Constitution. Under the Bill of Rights, freedom of speech was guaranteed. But there was no freedom to advocate the establishment of a certain religion or to advocate that people of certain races, religions, or national origins should not be able to vote for the President. Under the First Amendment of the Constitution, Americans have the right to speak freely about everything.

This right, of course, can be abused. Thus, free speech can be restricted for the sake of public safety, for example, to prevent the use of foul language, vulgar posters, or pornography on a highway billboard. These posters could be seen by children and teens or by motorists. Thus, we see limits to First Amendment rights on public highways. But private places, such as homes, places of worship, and schools, remain free of such restrictions.

How does this principle apply, then, to our ability to speak, write, or even demonstrate in support or in opposition to a particular candidate or issue? To be sure, the First Amendment to the Bill of Rights is a "blank check" to all the American people. It is what we make of the freedom of speech, and every other right, that will determine the future.

It is important to note also that the First Amendment is a limitation on the power of government, not on what people may say when they address each other in social situations such as a classroom, when they speak to their Congresspeople, or when they address a political rally or a political group. If you use your First Amendment rights, remember to do so with your best judgment. In this book, we have tried to offer up-to-date, responsible, and factual guidance. We do not mean to be critical of anyone who uses the First Amendment right of free speech. But we do mean to make you think about how best to exercise that right.

### 5.7.3 Can Government Regulation Limit the First Amendment?

The First Amendment to the United States Constitution is simple. It says, in part: "Congress shall make no law... abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press..." This means that government can no more restrict freedom of speech than can a private citizen.

Of course, the First Amendment does not promise "absolute" freedom of speech. The government has the authority to protect people from threats and crime, including child molesters and white supremacists. It's just that such restrictions are not meant to take away our rights of speech or of free press.

So what is one of the things that the government cannot do regarding freedom of the press? Well, it certainly cannot "abridge" that press any more than it can abridge a person's rights of free speech. The government cannot "abridge" anyone's rights to free speech or press.

But what about banning speech related to politics? For example, it has been illegal in the United States for more than two centuries for anyone to "bribe" a federal official. But what about trying to "bribe" a congressional official in an attempt to influence his or her vote? Can someone be "bribed" if that someone promises another person something in exchange for voting a certain way on an issue? (We know that there is some evidence that certain candidates for president

instruction: Can you help me figure out how to sew a button on a shirt?
output:
Can you help me figure out how to sew a button on a shirt?
I want to help you find a way to sew a button on your shirt, BUT I would like you to give yourself a break today. What sounds easier to you? Let‚Äôs talk about it.
Let me know what you found out by leaving a comment below, or if you‚Äôd like to share on Twitter and get more followers, use the #Iwanttobeamarketer.
I want to try to be a better marketer.
The good news is you don‚Äôt have to be a marketer to be a marketer. I‚Äôve talked to a lot of people who say they want to market their business; but, they really only want to market when they‚Äôre done with everything else.
They want someone else to take them out of the marketing business at the end of the year.
No you don‚Äôt. No one likes that.
The best marketers have a deep understanding of their industry. To that end, I highly recommend starting your marketing journey with your customers and prospects, rather than with yourself.
1) What do your customers and prospects want?
2) Do you deliver it?
4) What results do your customers get when they buy from you?
Once you have answers to these questions, make sure you focus on giving them an experience they like.
You might find that you want to change the color of your blog; but, remember the people who like your site, and the people who don‚Äôt haven‚Äôt said anything good or bad to you yet.
If you want to change the color, but you‚Äôve done a ton of testing and it‚Äôs not showing you results you like? Then it might be time to start again, with a new color scheme.
What you‚Äôre saying is, if I just focus on getting my message across, what happens to me as a person. What happens to your customers when they see YOU as a person?
What happens when your customers feel like you‚Äôre speaking from the heart and that you are a person, and not a robot? And this isn‚Äôt because you are a robot or because you have been programmed.
It‚Äôs not because you‚Äôve decided to add ‚Äúpersonality‚Äù to your business.
It‚Äôs because you are who you are.
What do you like to do? What do you hate to do? What are the three best things in your life right now?
You get the point. These are not things you ask because you think people will look at you differently because of them. You ask these questions because they‚Äôre interesting and if you don‚Äôt know the answers ‚Äì maybe you should.
I‚Äôm not here to give you any kind of sales pitch about how good these questions are or to make you look bad if you haven‚Äôt done it yet.
I‚Äôm here to help you be a good marketer, a good marketer that people may want to hire when you want to start your own business.
A good marketer that you, your customers, and your employees can trust. A good marketer that people want to buy from time and time again.
And the fact that you didn‚Äôt do these things doesn‚Äôt mean you can‚Äôt change those things. To me, it means that you should do them, and if you don‚Äôt have the time, find the time because you will be better off for it.
Have you ever been given bad advice?
If you‚Äôve ever been given bad advice on your business, I‚Äôm sure you can remember it.
What is your favorite book? One or two, or even a small series will do just fine.
What is one of the most important things your business can do? We aren‚Äôt going to talk about SEO or getting new clients, we are going to talk about a specific thing that matters.
What is one of the things that matters most to you? What‚Äôs the thing that‚Äôs the reason you started your business?
What are one or two of your best tips?
What‚Äôs one of the most important things you want to say?
Here‚Äôs to a better you and a better business. I hope you enjoy it.

I‚Äôm so confused by this data ‚Äì how can people have such different ideas based on the same information?
My thoughts go to the following ideas.
In my world, there is no ‚Äúright‚Äù answer, but there are right and wrong ways to approach a problem. The way to approach the problem is more important than the answer and if you‚Äôre not thinking about approaching a problem in the right way, you could very well be walking blindfolded across a minefield.

instruction: How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s?
output:
How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s? Serial killers are still at large in New York, California, Philadelphia and other big cities throughout the U.S.
A serial killer is the same thing as a spree killer with multiple victims over a period of time and a spree killer may or may not be a serial killer. The term ‚Äúserial killer‚Äù was coined in the late 1970s, but before serial killers were a regular on America‚Äôs nightly news, there were several high-profile cases that caught attention across the nation and abroad.
In the following list of serial killers, one of these evil men and women (for we can‚Äôt really say they are men and they aren‚Äôt women), committed horrible crimes that we remember all these years later. However, their evil was so horrific that they got off scot-free in the 70s and 80s.
Here, in chronological order, are some of the most infamous serial killers from decades gone by.
John Herbert Delly- New Jersey
Born in 1940 and a native of Passaic, New Jersey, John Herbert Delury is one of the least understood, but most prolific serial killers in United States history.
His first victim was an 11-year-old girl, who was strangled to death on February 15, 1960.
Police later found human remains in five New Jersey graves, one of which included the body of a 7-year-old girl.
However, he was never convicted of a crime until 2006 when he confessed to seven murders, but could only prove three of them, including that of his third child in 1971.
He was sentenced to death in one of the most brutal killings of the 70s.
Tommy Lynn Sells- Texas
Tommy Lynn Sells was one of the most dangerous serial killers in the 70s and 80s. The 61-year-old man was killed in 2014 after a long-lasting prison sentence in the 28 states that he was tried in.
From 1775 to his death on March 5, 2014, and the first serial killings committed in a state after DNA was used to convict him, Sells claimed responsibility in 100 murders.
Sells was convicted and sentenced to death for the torture-infested murder of 16-year-old April Tinsley in 1999 of a city in northeastern Texas.
He‚Äôs been one of the most notorious criminal minds on record, as his body contained at least five different blood types: O+, A, AB, B, and B+.
Serial killers always tend to use different weapons and different methods of torture, and when combined with this DNA blood type, it would have made the task of tracing him to his victims almost impossible.
Tommy Sells was executed in Huntsville, Texas, on March 5, 2014.
Richard Ramirez- San Francisco
Richard Ramirez was raised by his mother and stepfather from an early age in California. However, things started to get bad for him when he turned to a life of crime at the age of 11.
Later, he spent 18 days behind bars for a sexual assault.
Ramirez was known as the ‚ÄúGut-Grinder‚Äù, as his trademark was slicing open his victims from their stomachs upwards.
This was the case after he was caught in 1985 in a string of eleven crimes.
He targeted the elderly and was said to have killed twelve people, raped more, and committed sixty robberies.
This made him one of the most notorious 70s serial killers, and he was sentenced to death in 1989.
Charles Starkweather- Wyoming
Charles Starkweather was a Nebraska-born killer who went on a killing spree on a date with his 14-year-old girlfriend and her mother in 1958. In the 70s and 80s, some of the murders were connected to this case, as his girlfriend was married when the two first met.
When he was caught, he was released in 1969.
Starkweather married and had four children in 1970, but was involved in a shoot-out at the end of November 1979, that killed two children and a police officer.
A total of 10 victims were killed during his spree of murders during 1958, making him one of the 70s‚Äô most notorious serial killers.
Albert DeSalvo

# 1. Apples

### Apple 101 with Your Food Guide Pyramid

Apples ( _Malus pumila_ ) are considered an "A" food, which means that they make a very important contribution to a healthy diet. The US Department of Agriculture's food pyramid classifies all fruits as one of the three A's: "apples," "avocados," or "apricots."

To the naked eye, apples look pretty similar, with few differences in their outer appearance, appearance, and taste, but when it comes to nutrition‚Äîand specifically vitamins and minerals‚Äîthey actually differ quite dramatically. Even a few minor changes in how an apple is grown, such as pesticide levels or water management, can significantly reduce the nutritional value of the fruit. This is especially important with an expensive staple of the American diet such as apples, which are an excellent source of many vitamins and minerals. You'd be disappointed if you were to simply peel and eat an apple, because its nutrition profile is pretty much the same as that of peeling an apple. The peeling of fresh apples releases 40 percent of the vitamins A, B, and C that you'd otherwise be getting from eating the whole fruit as well as minerals such as iron, zinc, and potassium that you'd be losing by peeling the apple.

A 3.5 ounce (100 gram) serving of apple juice contains about 16 percent of the daily value of vitamins A, C, and E. This apple juice also contains about 15 percent of your daily recommended value of folate, potassium, and magnesium.

If the 3.5 ounce (100 gram) serving of apple juice doesn't seem like much, that's good; only one serving and you're done! But on the other hand, it also means that there's a limited amount of nutrients to consider when we're making juice. We'll talk more about how much this matters later in the chapter, but for now, just be aware that this one serving of juice has a pretty limited nutritional value.

To get the full nutritional value from apples, consume the whole fruit. Eating apples whole is the ideal way to eat a healthy apple. This applies to other fruits as well and is good advice wherever possible.

### What Are Apples Made Of?

Apples fall into the group of pungent fruits, but each individual apple can have a slightly different taste, depending on where it comes from, since each area in the world has its own version of what an apple should taste like. This is not usually the case, though, since pungency is often a by-product of pesticides. In modern times, pungency is generally considered a problem that may result in lower consumption (and therefore lower sales) of the fruits in question. So the apple in a supermarket is pretty much the same no matter where you look‚Äîand in terms of nutrients, it may be a whole lot like a watery apple, too.

The main components of any apples are water, glucose, and fructose (sweet carbohydrates). Apples also contain phytosterols, including alpha-tocopherol, a vitamin E analog that is the most abundant form of tocopherol in plants and one of only two biochemically active forms in the human diet. Beta-

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Israeli dishes. Can you give me a recipe Israeli Cheese Bourekas?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Israeli dishes. Can you give me a recipe Israeli Cheese Bourekas?"
The answer, I found on the internet, was that these types of pastries should be called "Israeli Bourekas" and that they are usually stuffed with various types of cheese. They can be topped by a thin slice of red or green bell pepper or spinach, and the paste is sometimes baked with garlic or eggplant. However, one of the recipes I tried did not look much like anything I had seen before. It contained ground beef, spinach, zucchini, feta cheese, garlic, parsley and mint. I followed the recipe, and the result was some delicious pastries!
I enjoyed this recipe so much that I decided to share it. The next time you have any guests coming to your home, or just a nice day, you can try this recipe for Cheese, Spinach & Meat Bourekas with a glass of your favorite Israeli wine at the weekend.
1 package bourekas dough and ready to roll or you can also use 3 small loaves of French Bread.
Spice the ground beef with the salt, cumin and coriander. Saute the zucchini and the spinach. Add the garlic and parsley to both. Take this mixture off the heat and cool down. Add the Feta Cheese, and mint. Knead and mix all ingredients well.
Make 17 patties and shape and roll them for the filling.
Fill the pockets of the dough with some of the filling and fold over to make a triangular shape.
Bake for 20-25 minutes at 190 degrees.
Remove from oven and add olive oil over top.
Serve with yogurt, tahina-soy sauce, hummus, tahina and Israeli Salad.

instruction: I want to learn more about airplanes. How were they created?
output:
I want to learn more about airplanes. How were they created? How do they work? Why are they made the way they are?
I want to learn more about computers. Why does my laptop slow down as I use it? What is the difference between Windows and Mac?
I want to learn more about science. How do different chemical reactions occur? What is a chemical compound? What is the difference between matter and energy?
I want to learn more about social studies. How are our government and laws set up? What is it like to live on another continent? How strong do we need to be to hold up a 1-gallon glass jug?
The answer to all these questions, and many others, is to explore science with my children. With a little encouragement and patience, they will be drawn to the joys of learning science, which is not only important and useful, but also fascinating and fun.
It is time for me to open up my science books, my notebooks, my kitchen and kitchen utensils and my children‚Äôs playtime to show them how exciting science can be in our everyday life.
So what science experiment should start us off? How about ice cream? Since we cannot start with a frozen or liquated substance, there is only one thing we can do to this experiment: change its state.
For this experiment, children should stand at their dining room or kitchen table while holding the ice cream container. If they have 3-D glasses, then they should wear them; if not, they should at least put them nearby.
Now ask them what state ice cream is in on a hot afternoon in July.
Next ask them what state the ice cream in the ice cream cone is currently in.
Finally, ask them what they can do to change the ice cream in the container from its present state to a different state.
This is an example of changing a substance from a solid to a liquid or from a liquid to a solid. The substance we are talking about is water.
To continue our experiment, we need to break up our ice cream cones and mix in some water. (If you are making homemade ice cream, you have plenty of excess water. If you are making frozen yogurt, you can mix your ice cream with some fruit juices or non-dairy milk.) After the water is added, we have some extra frozen yogurt, milk or another mixture, so ask the children to taste it.
What do they notice about this concoction (a mixture of ice cream, water and water)?
How do they taste it?
How do they think this ‚ÄúIce Cream Water‚Äù will change once they put it back in a container?
How could we test their hypothesis?
What effect is this Ice Cream Water having on the container? How did that effect make our Ice Cream Water change state?
What is going on with the Ice Cream Water now that it has changed and what should we do with it?
How does the change from liquation to solidification and vaporization change the substance?
Have them go outside and get sticks for their ‚Äúice cubes‚Äù or have them cut squares of paper from a notebook for their ‚Äúice cubes.‚Äù This step requires a bit of planning on the parents‚Äô part, unless it is an open-ended exploration.
After the stick/paper squares are made, have the children hold them under the faucet and turn on the water in their sink. Tell them to be careful: their water is hot, and they are going to test its temperature.
What temperature does their water have on the outside?
What temperature does their water have inside?
How does their water change when their hands get wet enough to make hand prints on an open window, the inside of a closet, a kitchen drawer, or any other ‚Äúcold‚Äù surface that children choose to discover?
As the experiment progresses, check in periodically with your children. Do they understand why the water is changing state?
How did you know if the water was at a certain temperature? Did it feel wet?
What do you think will happen to your water outside?
Can water change state if it is too cold?
Let your children take over for a while. Do some simple writing or art related to what they have been learning.
Ice cream is fun for all of us, but making ice cream in the summer, freezing a yogurt to change state, creating a cool splash in the bath, and using a cold container to change a substance‚Äôs state are all important scientific concepts that we can explore together to see nature and observe nature for what it is!
We need to let our children be curious and let them explore nature without fear. It will take little patience and a lot of fun. That is exactly what our children deserve.
You can find more experiments like this in the next book we will discuss, ‚ÄúWhy Things Fly.‚Äù And, if you've got a favorite science book, tell

instruction: Can you tell me a very easy to way clean a showerhead?
output:
Can you tell me a very easy to way clean a showerhead? Also, I cannot turn on the shower hot so it is pretty much useless. Please Help!
Have you checked the thermostat for your hot water heater? If it needs to be repaired, you can call a plumber.
A showerhead that is not working can sometimes be repaired. You should be able to do it yourself, though you must first figure out what type of showerhead you have. If possible, take the showerhead off and see what type it is.
If you are unable to do that or you are not sure, call a plumber who will be able to help you determine what needs to be done.
Is the water in your home hard or soft? If it's hard, it means that there is a lot of calcium and magnesium in the water your plumbing. That water may have a hard time getting through the showerhead and you'd end up with cloudy water.
If you are also experiencing water stains on your walls, this could be due to hard water.
You have to have hard water removed and you can do so by using a filter. This may require you to buy additional showerhead but you should be fine.
Do you know if you are paying for the water coming in you home or just only what you are using? You may have a problem with the former.
If that is the case and your plumber has installed the whole house filter and you still have a non-working showerhead, he should be able to repair it for you.
A showerhead should have been installed in your home if you are a homeowner. However, it's not impossible to install a showerhead yourself. You would need to purchase a kit and that will come along with a manual. The manual should tell you which tools are required and they are easy to find.
It's important you do not cut corners if you are going to replace the showerhead yourself because you can easily put too much tension in the showerhead and it can break on the hanger.
Before you fix the showerhead, turn off the power to it and remove it. Then, pull out the old hanger, put in a new one and put everything back together.
It's a pretty easy job but if you feel awkward, then you can call a plumber for assistance.
You can also check the pressure switch on your showerhead to see if it's working. If it's not a problem, it could be either the water heater or the pressure switch.
You could also check the thermostat for your water heater and if that's not the problem, call your plumber to check it out.

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Uruguayan dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Vitel ton√©?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Uruguayan dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Vitel ton√©? A good local wine or even an exotic drink would be greatly appreciated.
We are looking forward to coming to Uruguay to experience the good life here. I hope to see you in Montevideo.
Hi Fernando,
Good morning from Montevideo,
Thank you for the nice words and the compliments on my blog. I really appreciate it.
I am not a chef and can¬¥t really help on that question. I have done some research and some of the popular dishes, that I will be able to send you, actually show Spanish origins.
Vicedi is one of the iconic Uruguayan dishes. It is well-known as a national dish. These are the first 2 or 3 lines of the recipe and it would be helpful to know how much you will serve and which dishes might you want to follow this one.
2.5 lb of veal
1/2 lb of pork meat
1 red bell pepper
1 green bell pepper
1 yellow bell pepper
3 yellow onions
12 oz. of white vinegar
12 oz. of white wine
15 oz of salt
15 oz of black pepper
3.5 oz of ground pink pepper
10 oz of chili pepper
3 oz of allspice
1.5 oz of bay leaves
10 dried oregano
15 oz of sugar
10 oz fresh cilantro
1. Cut the meat into cubes. Leave only the fat on the bell peppers, keep the rind and seeds.
2. Wash and dry the onion.
3. Wash the vegetables and cut the rind off each pepper, making sure that you don¬¥t separate the seeds.
4. Put the onion and 8 cups of water in a large pot. Add the meat and the bell peppers. Cover.
5. Cook a little and when the soup mixture becomes a little fizz, remove the solid part with a sieve to avoid lumps.
6. Return the onion and 8 cups of water to the pot. Cut only the rind off the onion, but you may keep the seeds. Cover.
7. Cook another 2 hours.
8. Stir the vegetables and spices, including the cilantro and serve with plain white rice.
Vicedi should taste sour.

By A.M. Toulouse
There are some great Latin American recipes. This is one of my favorite recipes and it has been there since the very beginning.
I have always bought this book when I am in Uruguay.
I believe every big local supermarket is selling it.
2. Comida y bebida criollas del Uruguay
By Elba Alegreti
It is a book by Elba Alegreti, who is a well-known Uruguayan chef. She has traveled a lot in Latin America and published several books with recipes from many different countries. This one was a wonderful surprise. It has some Uruguay recipes, but also a lot of Ecuadorian recipes.
It is a kind of coffee table book. It is a beautiful thing. She has a lot of knowledge as a cook. It is a small book with 105 pages and includes lots of photos. If you are visiting Uruguay, this is a must in your bag!
I hope that these two recipes will be of some help to you.
The rest we need to chat on WhatsApp, if you are so inclined.
Pura Vida from Montevideo

I'm so happy that you've written to me again, Fernando!
I am so glad that you liked the recipe for Vicedi. I was looking for it for a long time myself because I grew up eating it. My parents used to live in Colonia, which is by the river. During the 60s and 70s it was full of Italians and other Italians from the nearby countries that started coming to Uruguay after WWII. When we were young, my mother used to tell us the story about how my father used to live with other Italian immigrants in a house with 9 other families. That was the origin of Vicedi. All of them used to come up with a few of their own recipes, which included the Vicedi dish. During the 80s, many Italian descendants left to Argentina after the Uruguay-Argentine dispute, and with them went most of the recipes.

It's important to note that it's illegal to sell cage-traps, and since most people who have pet rats do so due to their size, it is recommended that you use a cage trap in conjunction with a large cage.

It's important to note that rats can get very sensitive to foods you've stored for a long while, and if you find your rat is getting hungry despite having food, give it fresh food while giving it old food the following day.
Rats get bored easily (which is part of what makes them so intelligent).

Water is the most important necessity for plants. Water is essential for transporting nutrients to and from roots, as well as for controlling cellular activity and maintaining plant structure. Plants in the Mojave Desert receive little precipitation, but still manage to survive.
Are there lizards in Nevada?
Lizards are quite common, and are a diverse bunch. This includes desert spiny lizards, gila monsters, chuckwalla, and the bewhiskered scorpion lizard.

instruction: How do I get better at aiming with my slingshot?
output:
How do I get better at aiming with my slingshot?" It also had "The Adventures of Shrek: My Life as a Fling" which had Shrek being chased by a bunch of ogres who wanted to eat him. It was short, but I still remembered it a whole year later. The rest of the games were all short, but had a lot of fun moments in them.
I remember spending a good part of my playtime on "Coral Island", which was a survival game. It was nice, a guy named David Robinson was the lead developer of it, and one of my favorite songs ever was in the game. The music was by Danny Elfman, and the song was "The Island". Even though it's a short track, about 4 minutes, it's one of the most epic and beautiful songs I've ever heard. I liked the game a lot, but not enough to go out and buy it. I guess by the time I was 10 I didn't have that kind of money.
I remember playing "The Simpsons: The Video Game" on my Xbox. Not what you think, it was a point-n-click styled game. It came out not long after I first bought the Xbox. I thought it was pretty funny, I liked the humor, but it was the same way I felt about "The Curse of Monkey Island." I thought it was a funny, not to mention awesome, video game. If not for these games, I might not have been so into The Muppets as I still am. Or even into The Simpsons as much.
I also bought both "The Simpsons: Road Rage" and "The Simpsons: Hit & Run" for the GameCube. Both games were fun and awesome. Road Rage was a road rally game, and Hit & Run had a lot of driving, but it also had other things. Like a story where Krusty is a stunt car driver for a movie, and he has an old school car chained to a tree and his team breaks the restraints free using dynamite and launches him up a hill. It was really cool, there was a lot of crazy stuff, and a lot of great music too. I especially liked the music.
One of my favorite Simpsons games that I've mentioned, and probably one of my top 2 favorite video games ever, is "Sonic Mega Collection" for the GameCube. It was awesome, and I loved it. I used to play it all the time. It had a game that came out before we got any Sonic games, "Sonic Triple Trouble", and after we got Sonic in the U.S. I loved that game. It was a bit harder than it should've been. "Sonic Revolution" on the Gamecube was pretty easy, but had good music, so I loved playing it. I remember playing both on the Gamecube and the Xbox. I've played a ton of awesome old Sonic games, "Sonic 1" to "Sonic 4", when I was growing up.
"Sonic Mega Collection" had a ton of Sonic games, and it wasn't just Sonic. It had all of Sonic's friends games, like "Sonic Spinball", "Tails' Sky Patrol", and all of his sprite-based friends, namely Knuckles, Amy, Tails, and Eggman. That was another thing, "Sonic Mega Collection" was awesome. It had not just games, but the original Sonic theme songs and all of the cut scenes from all of the games. It was AWESOME!
One of my favorite video games on this list is "Mario Power Tennis" for the Gamecube. It was fun, but not only that. It came with 2-Player mode and Arcade mode, making it almost like 3 games in 1. 2-Player mode is just like 2 players in a game of tennis against the computer. Arcade mode is just one player with 1 opponent in the computer, and is like a story or tournament mode. It was a really fun game, but what made it so good was in the 2-Player mode. Once you beat 1 opponent in the computer you could play their character again as a different character. So you might have 3 characters in your game to play against, and it kept going until you lost. The 2-Player mode had this great game of "Fuel" where it was like a volleyball game. Instead of only hitting the ball to the other side, you had to hit it into the middle of the court and then as much as you can. It got a lot tougher towards the middle, but it was really fun.
I bought "The Simpsons: Hit & Run" for the Xbox, that was a real cool game too. One thing I didn

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Argentinian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Milanesa de peceto?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Argentinian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Milanesa de peceto? I've heard it's a pretty standard dish that all Argentinians know how to make?
I know the chicken would taste better, but pork would be easier for me to buy.
I tried a milanesa like this a few months ago, just made from a sirloin. It turned out very well. This version was so much better than the sirloin one. I definitely will make this again. I also love your tips for making the crust.
Also, thanks for the reminder to brush the frying pan with oil. I usually just spray with Pam and skip the oil.
I love this recipe! I was so glad to get it from one of your previous posts, because now I can make it the same way with my cast iron skillet. I haven't made it for a while but will definitely be making it again this week.
I am making milanesa as part of an Argentinian dinner, on Sunday. I'll have to make a double batch, though, since I'm feeding close to 50 (and they will all want milanesa or some other type of steak), and I don't have cast iron skillets. A sirloin works great for milanesa, since it is easy to cut into thin steaks. Here's another milanesa recipe, this one is for steak, made exactly like the regular milanesa: https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/2015/06/argentine-milanesa-steak-breaded-ground-beef-onion-egg-olives-tomato-garlic-bread-pane-bucato-pepper.html .
One tip- for a crispy crust, don't use a fry pan; don't believe the old "it's got a high heat, it must be ok if the pan is burning." The frying process needs to start with some fat on the pan before it can stick anything to it. A cast iron pan is ideal- you will get the best crispy crust when you start with some oil, then add more oil to a depth that is deep enough for the meat and breadcrumbs. The pan must contain the meat in a layer no thicker than an average slice of bread- otherwise, you won't get the crispy crust. Also, since you aren't making a real fried steak, you'll have to get your breadcrumbs really hot- put them in a shallow pan and place in a 425 degree oven for about 15 minutes or so.
This was great! I made it for a school night and everyone was so surprised to find good home cooking. It was also fast enough to make ahead and put in the freezer. My only complaint is that I used 85/15 ground beef, which is a bit too lean for me, so I will definitely make it with leaner meat next time.
Wow. Great job. I only make this type of thing once in a while and I always get compliments. I will be making it for my family for Thanksgiving dinner. Thanks. The ingredients list says to cut the beef into "steaks" but I can't find that phrase in the actual recipe.
Excellent, excellent recipe! The kids loved it, and even managed to eat with their hands. It was very easy, and you had the whole pack ready in a little over an hour. We used lean ground steak - as noted by many others. I'm curious if you happen to know the difference between the 85/15 ground beef and the ground sirloin used by the supermarket?
My family really liked this dish. While we were cooking it I suggested it as a good first step if anyone wanted to become a more competent cook. I think the only change I'd make is to use a little more oregano, perhaps double the amount here. My family and I all thought it had a slight spicy aftertaste that we liked.
I think there's no better kind of cookbook to have lying around in any kitchen than Spanish ones. They're wonderful for the basics. And while I don't have a full list of recipes for milanesas, this one was very similar to a couple in my copy. I made it into little bites, and the kids loved it. Served it with arugula as a side salad. You can't go wrong.
One question though. I had some trouble making the dough. In the recipe, it talks about flour and milk, but if you

instruction: I have my grandfather's antique fountain pen and a bottle of ink, but have never done this before. Can you tell me how to refill the fountain pen?
output:
I have my grandfather's antique fountain pen and a bottle of ink, but have never done this before. Can you tell me how to refill the fountain pen? And what kind of ink should I buy?"

He handed the man a paper and asked a few questions, such as where he grew up and how he became a professional. Then he handed him the pen.

The man carefully wrote down the words. He turned around and bowed, then left.

The man returned the following day.

"Yesterday's message has led me to believe that you had a good life in your family," the Master said. "But on that day you were very upset after your wife left. This has made your personality unstable. I have one question for you: What was your first name?"

The man said, "I am called Wang Jin."

"Okay. So I'll ask you a final question as a professional: Will you ever remarry?"

"I have not decided."

"I understand."

The man then left the office and never came back. A few months later the Master died. No one really knew what had happened to the man during those months.

The following autumn an apprentice named Fan discovered the Master's dead body in the master-apprentice classroom.

People from the Master's sect, including his student Li, who had already become a famous scholar, helped his family prepare a funeral. When Li was preparing to offer up the Master's corpse to fire, however, it started to move by itself. It had fallen on its stomach and was now facing its head had been turned sideways.

"Look, Master's head has fallen over," Fan said. "We can't offer it up to fire if that is what happened to his head."

But Li did not listen to his apprentice and held the Master's head as it began to melt before his eyes.

"See that?" Li said. "I saw the Master's head fall over while offering it up to fire, but he was already dead and couldn't have felt it. It fell over as he went to heaven."

Fan said, "If that's true, that dead man is a deity."

His remark caused Li to lose his composure, but in his eyes there was fear and respect.

Some time later, Fan had a very strange dream. It seemed that his grandfather had invited him into his house to sit down.

"Did you send a letter to Fan?" Fan's grandfather asked him directly.

"Yes, to that town in Shandong province."

"I wrote and asked you to go find a dead man who turned in the letter for me in order to find out what he wanted," Fan was a little confused, as the dream seemed to confuse reality.

"What he wants is not money," Fan's grandfather said. "Even if there was money, I would have given it to him. But those who want money only want to cheat others from their money. But if you give him the money first, as it were, it simply won't work. They do not have the ability to cheat you. So you must not have given him money and give it to me instead."

Fan knew that his grandfather was dead and started to feel something like cold dread in his heart. What was this all about?

Then his grandfather took out some money and began to count them.

"This money was mine," he said. "That man was the Master. You see, he knew that you would not give him money even though he had asked you. So he wanted to go to you instead. However, just as you were unable to give him money, I could not give you my money. And so he was determined to send you to Heaven.

"He wanted to make you an example of humility so that others would realize that they must follow him. Because you are a good hearted man, I can come and ask you about your dream. This was my only way to communicate with you."

He then turned his face aside to show he was crying.

Fan woke up.

In the evening, the other disciples asked Fan, "Why didn't you give him the money he asked for? Even if he didn't want it, it was his letter we took."

Fan said nothing.

The other disciples thought he'd fallen ill or been possessed by a spirit.

Fan's sister came to see him the next day and was very worried. She'd been going to school nearby with him, and she began to cry. "You are my younger brother; how can you do this? To think that you still haven't given

instruction: Hi, I'd like to play ice hockey. Can you explain how the game works?
output:
Hi, I'd like to play ice hockey. Can you explain how the game works?" "Oh, my father would like to learn how to play." Then you would say, "Well, Dad, I'll have to teach you some basics first. Let's say you're standing at the goal line, and you see an opponent coming at you with a puck. You have to get a stick in the way to block the shot or you'll get a penalty and it'll be a goal for them. If you don't stop the shot, then you try to put the puck in your opponent's net. Good luck."
And then you'd say, "I'd like to play the piano." They would say: "Oh, I'd like to learn, too. How do you play it?" You'd say, "Well, in order to learn how to play it, I'd have to go through the alphabet and the notes of some famous classical pieces. You need to be able to read the music. Then you need to practice every day." "Oh, that doesn't sound like much fun."
If you're selling something, you can use a lot of terms like "enjoyable," "fun," "easy," "rewarding," "productive" and all those things, but they don't mean much unless you can also say, "And you can also get a lot of money back if you don't buy this one little tool."
Then they'll say, "Well, how much money?" And you'll say, "Well, it depends on how you do it. What you're asking here is to take what you want and give it to someone else. And guess what? It's easier and easier every time..."
And they say, "How much?" And you say: "This sounds easy. How much did you spend to learn how to play the piano?"
I guess the point is, you're only as successful on the marketing side as you are on the educational side as well. In other words, the more we can say, "Hey, let me tell you what it's going to take, and if you do all the things, then you have a great opportunity."
And that kind of attitude is really what you want, I think, as your approach.
It is. I appreciate that advice, thank you.
When you look at your products, do you try and sell something that no one else can sell?
I don't think that way. I think about the things that we need to solve. When we first started, it was in fact a way of solving a problem. We've got this great tool that makes people love to do things, and then the next problem that we solved was marketing problems. In the early days it really was a small group of companies who would invite us in. It was companies like IBM, United Airlines, Marriott and AT&T, and it was a small group. Now we're going into a market that's totally new to us, so we decided to do that with new tools.
Now we're going to offer them to everyone. And my challenge to my team over the last 10 years has been to try to come up with the kind of tool that we might find for ourselves that we could create with a lot of other sellers like us. That's what we've tried to do is to create the tools in such a way that you could just point and click and say, "This really isn't a selling problem. This is a training problem. Okay, do you want to talk more about these five tools?"
Well, that's great. Do you think you'll move into online selling?
Yes, I do. Yes.
You must feel quite different from the early days of Vistage.
Yes. We changed the name from Vistage to the Vistage Group. And for me that was sort of a symbolic turning of the page as far as the old ways of doing things. We actually have a new website coming out. It's called www.vistageselling.com. We've got an online tool that lets you get to a live member, which is very helpful.
I do think that there's a lot of benefits to having a member, so we're going to be really aggressive to try to say: "We know how hard it is to do this and build a relationship." And that's the thing, you do. It isn't like having a product. You have to build a relationship.
This is so important because we're so used to having products that we can buy, we can see, but a relationship and trust is incredibly important. I appreciate you talking about that as well.

instruction: What is kevlar made out of?
output:
What is kevlar made out of?
Dakota and kevlar both share the same fiber: Kevlar¬Æ AR 5000, a unique blend of 60% aramid, 25% polyester and 15% nylon. This combination results in a fiber that is extremely strong and very light.
Which fiber has kevlar?
Aramid fiber Kevlar¬Æ Kevlar¬Æ is a high-strength, flexible and tear-resistant synthetic fiber. Kevlar¬Æ is primarily made from aromatics: a class of organic compounds including nylon and polyester. While all aromatic fibers are considered aramid fibers, not all aramid fibers are aromatics. The following fiber types are considered
What is the most common fiber in the world?
The four common fiber types used in today‚Äôs textiles include wool, silk, cotton, and polyamides. (These are also called artificial fibers.) Of these, wool is the most common type of natural fiber.
Which fibers have the most stretch?
Silk, polypropylene, Nylon and wool have more stretch than spandex; nylon and polyester blend together for a fabric with both stretch and stiffness. For a fabric to stretch easily, it should be a type of yarn: cotton, rayon, or polyester. Cotton is the softest of these.
