instruction: is queue an ADT or a data structure
output:
is queue an ADT or a data structure that might be used to map from the
names of a group to the keys of its members.

An ADT will be called :term:`collection`.

An :term:`index` is usually maintained by a :term:`collection` for a given
:term:`key`, and is a representation of where in the :term:`collection` the
corresponding element is stored (along with its :term:`data`).

The general idea is that you provide an :term:`index` to an :term:`operator`
when it is called, and the index should be used to determine the location of
the element in the :term:`collection` for which you are computing an
operation.

.. _examples/hash_index:

The Hash Index
==============

A special case of the above that is particularly simple because it can be
written down by hand is a :term:`hash index`, also called a simple :term:`index`
(in a slight nod to the idea that it is as simple as a number).

.. _examples/hash_index_operation:

The Hash Index Operation
========================

How you use it is simple.  The :term:`hash index operator` is specified by a
pair of integers for :term:`lookup` and :term:`compute`.  The former
represents the position in the :term:`collection` from which to look up
the result.  The latter represents the number that is computed using that
location.  The operation that this produces is generally known as a
:term:`multiplication_by_one` or a :term:`lookup-from-collection`.

However, there is also a generalisation that is called the
:term:`multiplication_by_two`.  This is called a :term:`multiplication` in
fact, an example of which is a multiplication 0 or a sum.

.. _examples/d-ary-trees:

D-ary Trees
===========

A special case of the index is a :term:`d-ary tree`, a :term:`tree-index`.

This is more interesting to work with than a :term:`hash index` because it is
the basis for many modern algorithms for sorting: quick sort is a d-ary tree
version of quicksort.

.. _examples/d-ary_index:

The D-ary Index
===============

A :term:`binary tree index` represents a :term:`d-ary index` of size `d`.

The following figures show the structure of a :term:`d-ary tree index`.

.. note::

   In order to make the figures clearer, each edge is represented by a
   single line.  However, to represent a complete representation of a tree
   you need to draw in at least two lines, one to the left of the node, and
   one to the right.  For example, this is what the following figure
   :numref:`figure_examples_d-ary_tree` would look like.

.. _examples/d-ary_tree:

.. _fig_example_d-ary_tree:

.. figure:: figures/d-ary_tree.*
   :width: 50%
   :align: center

   D-ary tree index.

To lookup an element, find its :term:`index` (which is a value in
`binary_num_to_col_pos[key]`.  Then find the `d` bits in tree index that
have that index (and use :term:`bit_array_and`.  Then use the :term:`compute`
part to do an operation on the number of bits set to 1.

This operation can also be performed by iterating through the tree :term:`left <left_index>` to :term:`right <right_index>`
(as is done by binary search).

.. _examples/d-ary_tree_binary_tree:

A D-ary Tree is a Binary Tree
=======

instruction: what are some basics of nutrition that i should be aware of
output:
what are some basics of nutrition that i should be aware of?
I do not know about all of the details but here are a couple of things that came up in a conversation about nutrition this morning with some folks on Facebook that I thought would be worth posting.
the first thing is that nutrition is an incredibly complicated topic and you cannot really get a fully complete answer to any nutrition-related question in one blog post. you should start here and do more research. i suggest you read all the comments which i will post at the end, it's a goldmine of information.
I think it's important to remember that there is no one diet for all people.
One of the most important things to remember is that there's no ONE diet that is suited for everyone. What's most important to realize is that the biggest change in dietary pattern is the change in the type of carbohydrates that you include in your diet [...] The reason for that is that a very large percentage of Americans get more than 50% of their calorie intake from carbohydrates [...].
carbs play a very important role in overall body function and they are what keep your levels of energy elevated.
If your level of carbohydrates is too low your level of energy will be low and you will likely not be able to make it through the day without missing out on the important and fundamental work you need to do.
Low carb diets are generally high in fat and protein but they are also high in fiber content.
When we're discussing fiber, we're discussing the non-starchy type.
This is fiber that's got carbohydrate content, it's got carbohydrate molecules that you cannot get the benefit out of, and that doesn't mean it's unwholesome.
It just doesn't give your body the benefit that is going to be best for your body, so if you want to increase your fiber intake, look for the non-starchy type.
Now if we're talking about eating more and more fiber, the more fiber we eat is great, we're eating plants, and if you're eating fruits and vegetables you are eating more fiber.
Now you can't get 100% of your carbohydrates in from plants, so ideally those carbohydrates will come from something that is green, and it comes from something with a seed. And if you are going to be trying to consume more fiber it is important to go down the list and look at things like fruits, vegetables, nuts, seeds and green, leafy-type vegetables.
The second thing to understand here is what type of vegetable oils are best when it comes to cooking and heating?
This is something you're going to have some debate about, but I think that for the most part, if you're looking for some of the most heat resistant oils you have a couple of different choices. The first one is olive oil, the most heat resistant of the virgin oils and I think that's probably one of the most popular oils you're going to think about.
I'm going to talk about coconut oil a lot and I'm going to say it's important to know a little bit about coconut oil. Coconut oil when you heat it over 105 degrees is partially or partially broken down.
What happens is that it changes its structure and it's a bit more of a viscous liquid than it is a solid, and that means it's going to stick to your food and when you heat it over 105 degrees and it's solid it tends to cook with some of the other oils that you're using. So coconut oil is certainly one of the most heat resistant vegetable oils.
I would say that most people who've used it, it's a great cooking oil, it tastes great, it has a nice mouth feel and it has all kinds of beneficial properties. There's a lot of debate over it, though, because you do have to understand that it has a high level of saturated fat in it. When people say low-fat, they think about saturated fat.
So for those of you that try to limit saturated fat, then I would definitely not recommend using coconut oil if you're trying to limit the amount of saturated fat you're consuming, but again coconut oil is probably the one that I would not think of if you're using it for frying or baking or sauteeing vegetables.
I think that olive oil would be the first choice and coconut oil is probably the second choice when it comes to cooking.
the other oils, such as butter and lard are also high in saturated fats. butter is the only vegetable oil that is more liquid at room temperature but, at room temperature and it's very flavorful when it is not mixed with, say, an oil that has a lot of flavor.
I don't recommend

instruction: what would be a good idea for a quiz about omnichannel marketing on my website
output:
what would be a good idea for a quiz about omnichannel marketing on my website" (I get this all the time), and then proceed to go all over the place trying to find a piece and link to it. No wonder so many people hate links (myself included).
I would love an in-built search capability when clicking on the "link" icon, to allow a user to search for a piece within the content they're viewing, without having to dig out their browser every time.
This is probably the biggest obstacle many people face when using Wikipedia, even though it's available at the top of every article. You can find a lot of good content out there on the web that Wikipedia don't host, and having to dig deeper to find pieces that are relevant to your needs takes time and effort that could well be better spent elsewhere.
When it comes down to it, I can spend 20 minutes going through a Wikipedia article. There's only so much time in a day.
In my opinion, the idea of the Wikipedia article is to find a relevant piece on the topic and save it to read later. When a user clicks on one of those icons, they should be able to find the information without the extra effort and time.
I know Facebook is a different beast altogether, but how difficult would it be to link to a relevant page in that context too?
With an in-line search, and the ability to save a piece of content for later (or in the "reader's choice list" or whatever it's called in Facebook), you could use the Facebook platform to keep users engaged in something they're reading elsewhere.

instruction: I'm preparing a fun session with work colleagues in a tech company. The circumstances must be funny yet respectful and safe for work. Please help me come up with a few of these circumstances. To help you, please consider this example: "In 10 years time, who is the most likely to have won the lottery"
output:
I'm preparing a fun session with work colleagues in a tech company. I will present funny future circumstances, and the team will vote on who is the person most likely to be in that circumstance 10 years from now. The circumstances must be funny yet respectful and safe for work. Please help me come up with a few of these circumstances. To help you, please consider this example: "In 10 years time, who is the most likely to have won the lottery"
For example, a person's career might take them to work with a certain company, and then perhaps they fall in love and marry, and start a family. At some point their child might start school and after a while they move house, and on the move, perhaps they get a new car which they love.
However, 10 years down the line, what they love is, perhaps, not the same and therefore not something they use on a daily basis any more, yet it might even be a car.
I'm trying to come up with fun examples of funny current circumstances, and the person/people who are the most likely of all to get/have that future example (the person who 10 years from now would take a funny scenario which they, themselves, could be in).
I was wondering if you could give me a few examples that you can think of, please?
I don't mean you have to write complete scenarios about them. I just think you can give a brief scenario where a person could be in the future and the person who you think would be most likely to be there. You could even say it on their behalf.
For example: in 10 years time, Tim is most likely to be walking down the street with a large bag of snacks bought from a small coffee shop.
But Tim's daughter said a big sniggin about it.
I'm having trouble coming up with any ideas so I'm coming to you!
Thanks, much appreciated.

instruction: You will simulate an SEO expert. What keywords should a screenwriting software target
output:
You will simulate an SEO expert. What keywords should a screenwriting software target to gain a competitive advantage?
You will work with an SEO expert and gather all of the keywords that potential users of a screenwriting software would search for when looking for this product. You will then narrow down their findings as to which are the best keywords that the software targets, using a mixture of A/B testing and web analytics.
The next exercise will be conducted on the same software site (i.e., Screenplay) that you worked on for the previous exercise.
a) Analyze the screenwriting software you worked on earlier for this course. What steps can you take to improve the usability of this product based on your testing results? Feel free to consult some of the articles and tools you find through your research for this project. Do not forget to document those materials also as you complete this task.
b) Write a 3‚Äì4 page paper in which you describe your findings from the usability testing process. You will discuss your findings in a format such as the following: 1) Your key findings include . . . 2) Your test results show that most users reported problem areas as . . . 3) We have found through test results that . . . 4) Our survey shows that . . . 5) The design we created for the app . . . 6) What problems did we see that we did not foresee? 7) What was the best aspect of improving the site? 8) What did we learn from our testing process? 9) What are the implications for our company? 10) Who do you plan to share your findings with? Which reports would you like created from these data and results? What will you do with your findings?
11) What will you do now that your design is complete?
This exercise can either be an individual assignment or a team exercise where 2‚Äì3 people work together to share ideas.
c) To ensure you have a complete description of your findings for the site, create two pages for the following: 1) A report for management detailing an executive summary of the testing process, including your thoughts about whether or not your design was successful and the lessons that you have learned in the process. 2) A report for the app developer detailing your findings with the screenwriting software, including examples of changes that need to be made in order to improve the overall usability and the number of hits to the site.
What are some examples of the kind of reports you can share with management that would show that your work was a success? What is a key issue that you see regarding usability testing for software that you, as an app developer, also need to watch for? What are some considerations for making your design attractive without ‚Äútrashy‚Äù designs or using excessive colors?
Your findings about the usability of the Screenplay site will be shared in your post for this assignment. You will be evaluated on the quality of your findings and not on the overall usability of the Design. No grade will be handed out for the results from you usability testing.
What are some key factors you will need to consider when testing the usability of a product in order to improve on your product in some way?
What is unique about usability testing for a software site? How do you feel this design is working toward making the software more useful for users?
What kind of report do you feel is the most useful for a software developer in terms of improving their software? What kind of report do you feel is most helpful for management regarding a product?
Previous Previous post: The purpose of this assignment is to build your skills in using the Microsoft Office suite of software. Specifically, you will use these programs to edit and transform a research paper submitted from your course or that you will create.
It is critical that you have a paper, or at least a draft of a paper, before going through this process. Otherwise, you will be unable to accomplish the goal of this assignment, which is to transfer and share information.

instruction: write lyrics that only rhyme a little bit (not every verse needs rhyming or exact pacing), for a progressive metal song about loving jesus
output:
write lyrics that only rhyme a little bit (not every verse needs rhyming or exact pacing), for a progressive metal song about loving jesus. The song might be about the fact that I hate everyone except for God, which is not very loving at all, but we‚Äôll just let that one be. I do love Jesus, I just haven‚Äôt been very good at acting like it and taking time to understand what loving Christ means. That is one of my primary goals this year, so this song is a start. I do pray, I‚Äôm not like Pastor Paul Crouch or those other ‚ÄúChristian‚Äù televangelists. But it‚Äôd be nice to learn some more (a lot more) about jesus. I think what I‚Äôm writing is something of a confession / prayer of sorts. I just thought this might be a good place to try that song out. Hopefully it‚Äôll start a conversation on these topics, and maybe I can learn from someone. ‚ÄúI am just a weary traveller. In need of a place to lie down rest‚Ä¶..‚Äù
I remember writing this song for a friend, and she liked it a lot. She used to play it on her guitar. She no longer knows that song or I. But I‚Äôve always had it. I‚Äôve played it on my guitar quite a bit in the past years, and I really like it. A lot. It‚Äôs a simple song, but I actually think it is quite good. It‚Äôs a story song, like the first three songs of this release. I think it is in a key you haven‚Äôt heard yet. I think the guitar playing is pretty cool, and the lyrics are a good story of someone at work, who is being ignored and mistreated. Most of us have been there at some point in our lives, and I think any song that can express those feelings and offer the remedy to feeling like that is a pretty cool song. I hope you like this one too. Thanks for listening. ‚ÄúI was working my job, not that hard. I just wanna be somebody‚Äôs child.‚Äù
(This little tune is a part of ‚ÄúPiano Stories Volume I‚Äù. If you have no idea what that is, get it. It‚Äôs a collection of some pretty cool originals that we recorded at 479 Productions in Athens, Ga. I thought you might like to hear that, but I guess there are just one or two more songs that were recorded there that I could release.)
This is a fun little song. It‚Äôs sort of a prayer song. It might sound a bit spiritual, but it‚Äôs really just about my attempt to sort of pray by playing the guitar. I thought I might try a few things that I don‚Äôt usually do when I play, and see what sort of effects that might have. I don‚Äôt think the song is very good or anything, but it was a fun experiment.
That‚Äôs as much as I got. Hope you like this batch of tunes. Thanks.
‚ÄúI am happy when the world goes black. All your pain and your guilt, I will take. I have no place to go. I guess that the pain is all yours to take‚Ä¶‚Äù
From, ‚ÄúPiano Stories Volume I‚Äù ‚Äì Written by me
Pianophone ‚Äì ‚ÄúThe World Goes Black (for Me)‚Äù
November 21, 2006 / No Comments ¬ª
‚ÄúWhat time is it now? What does it matter?‚Äù ‚Äì from, ‚ÄúPiano Stories Volume I‚Äù
‚ÄúCan anyone see in the darkness? Where is the light?‚Äù ‚Äì from, ‚ÄúPiano Stories Volume I‚Äù
‚ÄúIn this world alone, can I be a child?‚Äù ‚Äì from, ‚ÄúPiano Stories Volume I‚Äù
This is, ‚ÄúPiano (479) Stories, Volume I‚Äù. You might have heard it. That‚Äôs me. I‚Äôm playing the piano by myself. But I play in this way that I‚Äôve developed over the years, that isn‚Äôt like a standard piano style at all. There isn‚Äôt really much rhyme or reason to it. Some songs, like The Beatles songs in (most of) ‚ÄúVolume I‚Äù, are very close to a standard style. Others, like this first song, are almost completely different from the way those songs were recorded. I thought there might be a few different sounds I could try, and I think it all turned out to be a good idea. I thought these songs could give you a little insight into where I‚Äôve been over these last ten years or so. I think there is a lot of difference between the early years and the later years in my life, but there is also definitely a certain continuity too. I think this first song sums up both ideas pretty nicely. There is a very clear line in time between the very early sound I used in these songs, and the

instruction:
question about Computer architecture and organization 
for 6 marks
what in general terms is the distinction between computer organization and computer architecture ?
give answer in full sentence points if possible
output:
question about Computer architecture and organization 
for 6 marks
what in general terms is the distinction between computer organization and computer architecture ?
give answer in full sentence points if possible

A: A computer's organization refers to its structure, while the architecture refers to it its specification.
Take the Apple 1 for example.  On the "organization" side, it had a CPU, an interrupt, some RAM, and the keyboard.  On the "architecture" side, it had a 4 bit CPU, 8287 interrupt controller, 16K RAM ($9600), and a 3279 keyboard.
Source:  http://j.mp/app1intro
The key difference between organization and architecture is what we can actually read and/or re-implement.
See the OVERVIEW OF COMPUTER ARCHITECTURE article for more discussion and background.

A: I assume you mean 
for 6 marks
What is the distinction between computer organization and computer architecture?
The main difference is that computer organization means what's internal behind the scene in the computer to do the actual computing work, (ie the implementation.) While the architecture is the description of how the computers are constructed internally, (which includes both internal implementation and how to deal with external access). 

A: Let's see if I can get into this problem from a slightly different angle. The two main ways that you can structure a computer are sequential and parallel. Parallel computing is the most recent approach, but there are actually two different approaches being taken in the field, and they both have problems. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Concurrency_control 
Sequential computers are also getting more complex by adding more sophisticated logic circuits and by adding more functionality.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_hardware
The question seems to be:  organization VS architecture
Organization is a matter of choice, and a great deal depends on how close to reality you want to design the computer to be.
The architecture is the way you design the computer. It may include things like the choice of organization as well as issues of instruction selection.

A: What they all say is correct, but to elaborate a little:
Organization - it is often considered synonymous with hardware on which some software operates.
Architecture - its a little vague on your request as well, but I would put it thus:  I'd say on an overall structure but without looking at the hardware itself. On a general note architecture is like the high level function of a machine, while organization is the implementation level.
So organization is the overall structure, while architecture is the design of all the parts in that overall structure.
For example, a RISC processor is a very organization (hardware) specific thing. It's organization is "there is memory which may be the code, there are the registers of the CPU, there are the I/O ports on the processor and there is some kind of cache."
Its architecture is then like: "there is an instruction processor, there are eight loads, eight stores and a general purpose ALU."
It doesn't define how any of that is implemented, it just says that it is.  For that you'd go to the implementation level, which is what organization is.

instruction: I am an aikido teacher and student of Tomita Seiji who is living in Belgium. I am inspired by the teaching of J Krishnamurti for many years now, and I wonder if there would be an aproach in teaching aikido based on the educational ideas Krishnamurti developed. Can you suggested some posibilities in a concise way?
output:
I am an aikido teacher and student of Tomita Seiji who is living in Belgium. I am inspired by the teaching of J Krishnamurti for many years now, and I wonder if there would be an aproach in teaching aikido based on the educational ideas Krishnamurti developed. Can you suggested some posibilities in a concise way?
Jiro, thank you for showing me the path which guided me to where I am today. Thank you to everyone at San Francisco, and I hope that Jiro and you will follow the path to which you have both embarked on with grace and elegance.
It would perhaps be best stated in terms of what the art/praxis of aikido is not: it is not about martial prowess in any form. It is not about teaching or learning about weaponry, or the use or technique of weapons. These are things that should be taught elsewhere, as appropriate to their intended audiences.
In truth, the martial side of aikido (what one learns physically while practicing aikido) is of little interest at all as something to study or to teach.
The martial arts are of great interest to most people, and I've certainly witnessed students whose primary interest in aikido was to learn martial arts. I've also witnessed other people whose primary interest was to learn self-defense or to learn to defend a friend. In these cases, I think aikido would be a good fit. But I think that we as aikido practitioners need to be very clear about what the praxis aikido ISN'T, if we are to educate people in the true aikido praxis.
It is not about learning how to fight in a good way.
It is not about learning how to use violence or weapons in a good way.
It is not about practicing or being able to kick someone's face off.
It is not a martial art at all, in any way and in any manner of speaking.
Aikido is not about teaching how to be violent. It is about how to learn how not to engage in violence, and about how to stop a person who is or has engaged in violence once engagement with that person has begun. It is about how to engage with a person who has engaged in violence in such a way that the violence being engaged in can stop, and who is left free of violence.
In the case of teaching self-defense or to defend another person, it is also about not harming that person's sense of self-defense or to prevent them from harming others. This is important to remember. A good aikido teacher will understand how to teach self-defense in such a way as not to create a fear of violence in the student. Similarly, a good aikido teacher will understand how to teach a student to defend a friend in such a way that they will not inadvertently cause harm or suffering to that friend.
That the art called aikido is not about teaching or learning to use violence is easily understood. If one were to study violence one would certainly look to the martial arts, for example, but certainly not to this art of aikido. Aikido teaches physical practices that are far from anything that could be termed "martial," and certainly are not about teaching how to use any form of violence.
From a historical and personal perspective, I would like to point out a particular event in my life regarding how I have applied the principles of aikido to my daily life.
About 20 years ago, I met my wife. I knew nothing about Aikido, and I have a pretty thick skin as it is, having been around tough guys my whole life. I can handle myself, but not what I thought was going on...she was getting beat up a lot when we met and we couldn't seem to make it work. I thought I could change things, even try to keep her safe, but I still didn't see her being attacked.
After months of being a doormat, I got it together and asked if she was still getting beat up. She said she was, and I asked her if there was anything I could do. I didn't take her seriously. She asked if I could learn Aikido. At first I thought she was crazy, but then I thought, hey, it was worth a try...I'm tough, I'm a tough guy, how hard could it be? I have two green belts already...she was wrong about that, of course...I was a total newbs at Aikido.
The night of my first class, I showed up, and I remember thinking to myself, what am I doing here? I sure don't look like someone who could ever kick this guy! When I entered the dojo, there was this guy...he wasn't a big guy, but in Aikido terms he was

instruction: write a detailed business plan for fatherhood training based on Dwayne Meeks book Pieces never missing in a childs life
output:
write a detailed business plan for fatherhood training based on Dwayne Meeks book Pieces never missing in a childs life (PNMCL), the life and work of Dr. George W. D. Howard, and 70 years of training children and adults to support families in crisis. The 6,000 word document was completed in January 2021. The plan lays out a vision for a nonprofit corporation to train people in crisis to support families. The corporation will provide services to non-profit organizations that are supporting families and children in crisis and also to individuals seeking to develop or improve their parenting skills.
A second critical goal of the group is to build a team of social workers, therapists, marriage and family therapists, marriage and family counselors, psychologists, and doctors to provide professional consultation on how to handle and manage an unexpected crisis.
The third critical goal of the group is to create a training program for individuals and organizations to receive training and to become certified under a new designation  Dad-Culturally Competent Parenting & Training Professional (Dad CCPT) and to implement a peer-to-peer mentoring organization for parenting educators who specialize in child and family crisis. This peer-to-peer mentoring organization would offer training, consultation, and support on crisis management and training.
Dwain Meeks
A fourth critical goal of this group is to make available to people and organizations, both public and private, the resources Dwayne Meeks developed over twenty years called TCPT. TCPT tools are a set of tools that help people understand complex parent-child behaviors in addition to being able to assist people in managing emotions and creating effective and healthy emotional responses and ways that support healthy self-development and emotional well-being.
Dwayne Meeks TCPT training tools can be downloaded free to anyone by contacting Dwayne Meeks. The tools are available, for free, at: https://www.dwaneymeeks.com/tct-instructions.pdf
The pandemic has been a time of great uncertainty and confusion for everyone, but more so for parents and students. There has, at this very moment, over 500,000 schools closed. The closures have impacted one-third of all children in America. The closures are causing many children to lose support and connection to teachers, parents, and family members. These problems can be addressed by expanding on a long-term project called Dad Taught, by expanding the model that Dad Taught was based upon. While Dad Taught will likely expand into schools, it is critical that the training in crisis management and support services be expanded. The support programs, PNMCL and TCPT need to continue to be expanded, to reach all who need them not just families but the children who are suffering as their families care for and love them.
The Crisis Response for Americas Families  CRAF is the foundation of a series of projects that focus on the needs and problems of families and children who suffer during crisis. The critical needs need to be dealt with and our children and families need to be educated to be able to manage both the crisis situations they encounter but also to deal with the stress that crisis creates for their lives. CRAF will focus on these critical needs and focus on finding the best practices on how to move through the crisis response phase.
The main objective is to create an entire family support program that has a Crisis Response Network and a Crisis Management System. The support system will create a training program to assist parents and caregivers who can use their own knowledge and skills, their own personal experiences and professional training, to provide immediate response to a family or parent in crisis. By responding directly to a parent in crisis, they are able to provide immediate crisis support to the family and the young person and help to avoid a more catastrophic outcome. Crisis Caregivers can be trained to be first responders in the family care system.
Dwain Meeks has created, over 20 years, an extensive training program that can be adapted to teach the fundamentals of response for individual crisis management. He has created two programs, one for schools TCPT and the Dwayne Meeks Training Program, TCPT, and one for families the Parenting Curriculum in Crisis, PNMCL. These extensive training programs will assist people and families to manage crisis situations and create a more positive and helpful response that assists families in moving through the crisis response and then moving to crisis management. While there are other response systems out there, the training in crisis management presented in the PNMCL and TCPT programs, will be provided, at a reasonable cost, to anyone who has been trained to use it.
The Crisis Response Network, CRAN is a project that uses trained professional, crisis responders, and care-givers who have received training as Dad Taught, Dwayne Meeks Parenting Curriculum in Crisis, PNMCL, or the Dwayne Meeks Crisis Training Program, TCPT. The crisis,

instruction: Need 300 words on the importance to documenting history in relation to the future
output:
Need 300 words on the importance to documenting history in relation to the future state of journalism.
It's all about the people
What kind of data do I need to provide a story?
Data from different sources allows users to make connections and create their own stories.
What are some effective data visualizations that could help people understand the relationships between different kinds of data?
Vivid colors and simple graphic overlaps help people compare and contrast different kinds of data.
Why might it be good to ask my readers and users to contribute to a story or to the data collection process?
People have more information than you do, and they'll want to contribute. This is their chance to share their perspective.
If you're not sure about asking users to contribute, give them a chance to do so - then make up your mind where you stand in that case.
What do we already have that's useful for journalism?
What do I do if one of my sources refuses to give me more details about a story, and how can I tell whether his/her refusal is justified?
In some cases, sources have concerns for their safety. In other cases, there might be issues of trust or a lack of information. Use the information you already have to draw conclusions about the source‚Äôs behavior.
Can I try to find a new source (i.e. a source who's willing to participate in the project)?
Do I already have a source who's willing to contribute? It's better to deal with them than start from scratch.
If you have a source, ask yourself how trustworthy you feel about him/her as a source. If you don‚Äôt feel very comfortable with the information this source provides, find another source.
How do I ensure my research makes use of as much information and sources as possible?
Have you done a proper search for existing data? What data have you researched or gathered yourself? You'll find more information in the section on data research.

Hardware virtualization is used to share the resources of the cloud providers effectively with the customers by generating an illusion of dedicated computing, storage, and networking on a computing infrastructure.

output:
Simplify "Most of the basic functions of current virtualization software are inherited from this early VM OS. The virtualization software is now represented with the term hypervisor. Hardware virtualization is used to share the resources of the cloud providers effectively with the customers by generating an illusion of dedicated computing, storage, and networking on a computing infrastructure.

The concept of virtualization is physically implemented using the hypervisor modules, and the operation and processing of hypervisors are materialized by the OSS. In other words, hypervisor modules are installed on top of OSS, which act as an interface between hardware units and hypervisor packages."..... In a cloud environment, hypervisor software is responsible to control the hardware resource management, which is essential for cloud computing. Cloud computing requires multiple instances of multiple clouds, and hence a single CPU is not enough to implement multiple clouds. Thus hypervisor is essential for management of multiple clouds to utilize the resources efficiently. In a cloud infrastructure, resource management takes place between the provider and resource users. The use of hypervisor has an interface to manage these resources as per the required configuration. The hypervisor is installed on OSS. It has a single version of software and is compatible with multiple operating systems. When the guest operating system is used to perform the tasks of resource management, the operating system of the hypervisor performs the tasks of load balancing. ![VM Ws](URL There are two types of hypervisors, the software-based hypervisor and the hardware-based hypervisor. If the hypervisor is based on software, it works as a thin layer over the OSS, and we call hypervisors VMM and VMware is an example of hardware-based hypervisor. ![VM R](URL There are different kinds of VMs used in Cloud. Each type of VM has its own advantages. VMs are used in various environments, including the following: 1\. Virtual machine for desktops For example, virtual machine images are used by an organization to deploy a computer within its network, which is used for running desktop applications. 2\. Virtual machine for data center The virtual machine is a type of software tool used for virtualization. If you have a desktop computer (larger than a laptop in size, but smaller than a server), the virtual machine is used on that computer to run applications that are either web-based or database-based. This lets you create a virtual server to run a database-based application on. 3\. VM for web hosting As discussed in chapter 2.1.1 Virtualization, web servers are another type of virtual machine that is used for internet hosting. A virtual server is run using its own dedicated computer. We call this server a web server. Instead of renting a server, if you want to save money, you can use a virtual server. Virtual servers are available at the cloud provider's site. 4\. Virtual machine for testing A virtual machine can also be used to test a website. We have created the above virtual machines under a common virtual server, in this way. It's possible to create a virtual machine that runs just a single page. In this way, the virtual server can be run at maximum capacity. 4\. Virtual machine for cloud-based applications If your business is cloud-based, you can use a VM to run the application without using your own hardware. #### Hypervisors are Software or Hardware Based There are two types of hypervisors: hardware-based and software-based hypervisors. * Hardware-based Hypervisors The hardware hypervisor was based on a separate hardware device. This hypervisor is used to control the hardware and provide virtualized services to the hypervisor. It is also known as a hardware hypervisor. There are many hardware hypervisors to choose from, such as Microsoft Hyper-V, VMware, Hyper V, KVM (Intel Virtualization Technology on x86), Red Hat Virtualization, Open VZ. We have reviewed a few hypervisors in chapter 06.04, Hypervisor Design Principles. * Software-Based Hypervisors A software-based hypervisor acts as a software program that runs on the operating system or OSS. It provides management services to multiple cloud accounts. In this way, it is similar to a guest operating system that runs other virtual machines. A software hypervisor is also known as a virtual machine management system. Many virtual machine management systems are available currently, such as VirtualBox, Xen Server, KVM, Virtual Server 2005, Citrix Xen, VMware Workstation, Oracle VM VirtualBox, Oracle VM, Binary VM, etc. Hypervisors, including VMware ESXi, are based on a single hypervisor. Hypervisors are installed on virtual boxes. Hypervisors usually have a single version,

instruction: i assume you are familiar with the Drake equation. Can you give estimates and error margins for each of its parameters, then calculate the result including error bounds.
output:
i assume you are familiar with the Drake equation. Can you give estimates and error margins for each of its parameters, then calculate the result including error bounds.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fermi_paradox
You might as well start with the big one  how many stars are there?
Then you can have a go at estimating the number of planets and intelligent life.
A final one to try is the number of times that some form of intelligence appears in a population that is large enough to support it and is also complex enough to show signs of intelligence.
The big ones always start with estimates and then try to get them more accurate
It was only when I started to investigate this that I started to think there was a problem.
I went to googles archives and searched for SETI. I know there are quite a few articles there from the sixties, seventies etc.
I also came across articles from more recent times including some from the last few years.
The one thing that is common to all of them is that they make a prediction that SETI is going to be able to find it in 10 years, 20 years 100 years..etc.
If ETIs are coming here, but are stopping short of the Solar System, why? I dont see any logic in that, especially in the case where we see all kinds of evidence and have made great advances in our own technology.
Why not just say to human beings?. We think you are very primitive. Youd probably get a bit confused and think we were being friendly so itd be better for us to give you a few hints
Why show up in some form of an event that can only happen once? If you are going to try and establish contact, why only with one of those few..hundreds of billions of years that some of you have mentioned?
But even if they were coming, what do they hope to achieve, other than to make themselves visible?. What do you think they are going to gain from it, that isnt going to be in their own planet?? And if they are already here, why tell us, when they can just open up a wormhole or whatever theyre going to use and put their presence there in the Solar System without our knowledge?
This reminds me of the post I made about how, when alien civilisations are shown in sci-fi films, one reason given is that they will never get to us, because they are getting closer to the point where they will either destroy themselves or themselves and Earth. Why would they ever show themselves?
When I started to investigate, the more I found about intelligence, the more convinced I grew that there is nothing intelligent that was not given an opportunity to become intelligent.
No one just wakes up one day and says Hey guys. Ill go out and try a few tests and see how much power I can extract from a photon
It starts with something simple, such as the ability to distinguish light and darkness. And then each step builds on that until it develops the ability and the habit of using what were given at every step of the evolution.
So the next question that I found I had to ask myself was Do I really think were any different?. Weve got the same genes, the same ability to evolve, live & die
Of course, Im not saying we shouldnt do anything with it, but it just made me wonder if we would have gone down the same track. Could we have developed to the point of being able to go out and try out whatever we liked, without needing a planet to sustain us for our every whim?. And, if not, would that have made us less human?
What do you say to all that??
Thats all from what Ive found so far.
I would love to hear any different or opposing opinions

instruction: what are african governments doing to improve air traffic connectivity
output:
what are african governments doing to improve air traffic connectivity?
3. in-market connectivity: improving on-ground infrastructure for travel to and from airports
For Africa‚Äôs airlines, improved connectivity to international hubs is a must for attracting tourist and business visitors, but a significant barrier remains.
Tourism is the continent‚Äôs second largest sector after agriculture, and the biggest foreign exchange earner, with arrivals projected to increase by 20% to eight million in 2017 compared to 2016. Of this roughly 20% is expected to be from Europe, and 30% from China ‚Äì and it is tourism‚Äôs growth to which the global industry is likely to turn their attention. However, to deliver on this potential for African airlines, infrastructure to serve international hubs needs to improve.
The government of Egypt, for example, has spent US$250 million on a new railway line between Cairo‚Äôs airport and the Red Sea resort of Sharm El Sheikh, as part of its efforts to turn Sharm El Sheikh into a world class tourism and aviation hub. Similarly, in July, South African Airways announced that it will invest up to ZAR1.5 billion toward upgrading its airport facilities in Johannesburg, Durban, Cape Town and Port Elizabeth, while Turkish Airlines plans to expand its operations into Tanzania.
According to Jens Bj√∏rnandt, CEO of Danish airport group Global Aviation, if government authorities don‚Äôt invest in improving connectivity then the local markets simply won‚Äôt support airline investment. ‚ÄúIf the government doesn‚Äôt support the infrastructure for aviation, then the private sector isn‚Äôt going to follow,‚Äù he explains. ‚ÄúIf it has enough to invest in the local market then it has to invest in its own country. That‚Äôs the challenge. The local market will then grow, and once it becomes viable there will be interest in the international market, and then they‚Äôll have to invest.‚Äù
The lack of in-market infrastructure is also a major problem in East Africa, with many of the continent‚Äôs main transit hubs in Africa having to be shared by six or more airlines, including a handful of low cost carriers. Kenya‚Äôs JKIA is the most prominent, but at least eight airlines use it as a hub, including a variety of Ethiopian Airlines‚Äô domestic subsidiaries. At the same time, demand in East Africa remains high, including a 19% year-on-year upswinging in the East African travel market.
Kenya Airways‚Äôs head of marketing and revenues, Anthony Muraya, says he expects a further rise in arrivals from Europe to the region, and that improvements to their airport infrastructure must coincide with improvements to tourism attractions within the region that can draw business and tour groups. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs important to consider the fact that in order to have good tourism, you first have to have the airline which is a critical component of any tourism,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúWhen you see a tour group coming at JKIA, it is not just one or two people, but it could be 20 or 30 people. So to take good care of them and to treat them well, there is need for good facilities. So the time to improve is now.‚Äù
But as the East African market continues its rapid growth, the challenge is to make that growth sustainable ‚Äì which can only be done by improving the airports. The same is true for North Africa, which saw passenger traffic surge by 3% in 2016, to more than 100 million. Many major developments are underway, including the US$1 billion development of GAA ‚Äì the new airport for the Egyptian capital. The development was awarded to China State Construction Engineering Corporation, and is likely to be the biggest in Africa.
But airport authorities need to be cautious, too. In countries such as Angola, with little tourism, it‚Äôs unlikely that passengers will come, but high passenger numbers have the potential to damage an airport. Even though JKIA has been in use since 1977, it‚Äôs only in recent years that it has become clear that Kenya could take more passengers as an international hub than is currently the case.
What is the outlook for the African industry, and how realistic is the potential of the Chinese, Russian, Indian and other regional airlines, to invest in Africa?
The Chinese are taking an interest in African aviation, and the number of carriers that have either emerged or are establishing a presence in the continent is growing. But can Africa benefit from the Chinese investment?
The African air transport sector is certainly one that has attracted attention. It now accounts for 8% of global traffic, but that still represents only 4% of global passenger traffic. But the rise in passenger numbers is expected to continue, if not accelerate. By 2027, Africa is expected to rank as the seventh largest aviation market in the world, up from eighth now, with air travel to and within

Or, you could make the story about a group of tourists who have a weekend to remember on Sylt. Write a story that combines the two ideas. 2. You think you're a great storyteller. Show the world you've got what it takes. Write a story that you really want to read. Don't be content to merely tell a story, show the power of the medium. Make your readers say, "Wow. How'd he think of that?" 3. For all those authors who don't give up after your first novel's rejection, there's always that second, third, and fourth one. Now come up with something that you've never done before. No longer afraid of rejection, you write a story that pushes all your buttons. 4. A true friend will stand by you even if you're the worst writer in the world. Write a short story that shows your friend the strength of the bond. 5. It's been months since you sent that unpublished story out. Nothing's come back but rejection letters. Do something to cheer yourself up. Create your own story. 6. It's the day before that important meeting. You're dressed, you feel fresh and new, you check your e-mail one last time, and you're greeted by the last unopened message that you couldn't put off any longer. You open it. A horror story. One that's meant to be read at night, alone. What are you going to do? 7. A few years ago, you decided that you'd never write what you'd thought you'd write, a science-fiction story. But now that it's time you finally have to tell this story, you're afraid that the only way you can sell it is to try writing something like what you used to write. Tell the story that you always wanted to write and then, if that's your only option, do it anyway. 8. Your writing is getting pretty good. Your stories are being rejected less, rejected often, and your stories are winning awards. You finally feel that you can stop learning how to write, and you can start to teach others how to write. 9. You have been in this world for a while and it's getting weary, tired, and empty. Sometimes, it just doesn't feel worth it anymore. Write a story that gets what writing is all about. There's something in there that isn't just about the words, about money, and about how to get that book deal. It's about passion, it's about love, and it's about the way a good story can do all that.

instruction: What niches are not being fulfilled on the YouTube platform?
output:
What niches are not being fulfilled on the YouTube platform? What do you think creators should be working on?
Rafael: I like this question, because, right now, there are a lot of people that have their own niche, their own style of creating content, but there is no really structure to it. Like, what's the new trends? What's kind of the next thing? When I started out, I noticed how people were like "Oh, everybody's doing just YouTube. How do I build my business? How do I monetize my business? How can I make my business work?"
So, I think we need to have some kind of structure to it. What is the next thing right? Because as you know, it keeps evolving and changing. We need to have a structure and we need to have the influencers that are really doing something or bringing something different and kind of start building it like from there.
Felix: That makes sense. So, it sounds like you started the community because you saw that, like you were saying, there wasn't a community and also there wasn't any structure. Now all these people were kind of doing things on their own and it wasn't being organized. So, you kind of came in to create a community that can organize the community and give them goals and you're asking your own community members to become your educators because they've already been on the platform so long.
What kind of educational, educational tools do you guys use to educate your community members? What are your tools and what can your members use to take action?
Rafael: One of the things that I'm kind of trying to push, that I think is working especially with the online community, since a lot of us don't have the time to spend being online or be online all the time. So, I'm trying to push the idea that people can actually use automation. Automate more than they do.
So, if we talk about influencers or people that want to learn how to create content that looks more like influencers, you don't have to be like working 24 hours and sleeping for a few hours. Even if you sleep eight hours, do a few hours of content creation, work six-seven hours, seven-eight hours a day. Then have a few hours to relax and sleep and then get up and do whatever.
Because a lot of us, not a lot of us but a lot of people can work from home and there is no real structure in terms of when we work and when we don't. So, that's kind of what I'm pushing, is use tools so that we can automate and help you create content that looks like somebody else's, or maybe do something with it, or maybe edit, or maybe do something with all your content that looks like you're somebody else, because, as I said, right now it is not easy at all right. The quality is like so low.
And so, a lot of us need to know how to really, kind of create stuff the way that we want to, or we can't make up the time. That's one of the things that I'm trying to do, is make that community and the people in there are so willing to actually share the stuff that they want to with everybody else, because, right now, we're so busy. We have a lot on our plates, and the community is there to support all of us.
Felix: Yeah, that makes sense. I think that also, the other way to do it is to make the product that you want. Make the kind of products that you want to either use, if you're the creator, or that you want to consume, if you're a buyer. When you make your own product, you also have you're not in the direct competition of anyone else, but you also have more things that you know can work and can help you to further your business because you've made it yourself.
So, you mentioned that it's very difficult to make your YouTube channel look like an influencer or other people's or a bigger business channel, larger business channel. What would you say, if somebody is listening in and they want to know what that is like, what are some things that they can use or some things that they look out for, or you also kind of pointed to this stuff before, you recommended some products, and you are using them. I saw on your channel, you're now using the ScreenMaster screen recorder, and how are things like that can help a creator like you to help them become more like influencers?
Rafael: One of the most important things right now is to start with the process that you want to create what you want to create. Everybody and I'm not really saying anybody, everybody has their own styles of creating content or doing things.

A cloud computer, as described by Wikipedia, is a computer network that is composed of remote servers, storage, database, applications, and services. It is an on-demand and self-service model used by customers that provide resources that are accessed through the web and which are usually located in a large cluster of servers across the globe. Cloud computing is comprised of many components that include infrastructure as a service (IaaS), software as a service (SaaS), and platform as a service (PaaS). As explained in the Cloud Computing Glossary at Cloud Academy, IaaS involves companies renting computing capacity, storage, networking and other resources where there is a need for these resources at a time. SaaS is the ability to provision the use of application software over the internet. And PaaS is the ability to create and host your own application and deploy it on a shared platform.
In order to provide cloud services to customers, companies must invest in the establishment of their own cloud infrastructure and cloud security systems. And it must develop skills in managing cloud environments. It is not easy to design systems to manage cloud operations without the experience of cloud management teams. Most of all, companies need the technology to securely manage the application and data in the cloud, as well as managing the overall risk of their cloud services.

The company started out as an on-premise CRM solution and gradually added more and more functionality to its product line. Salesforce CRM is an example of a cloud-based CRM solution that is accessible through a website and software. Customers can interact with Salesforce data using a Salesforce tool via the Internet. This makes Salesforce a more powerful CRM solution since users can create different types of data and analyze customer interactions in real time. The fact that Salesforce is scalable helps companies to be able to use its resource effectively. This is because Salesforce can be scaled out to support the needs of more customers. find a word that represents people reacting to unpleasant events.")

# **SOLUTION - TYPES OF TRANSFERS**

The word in the answer choice is "disgusted." I chose this word because it makes direct sense in the context of the sentence and it's a concept similar to the other words that I've seen in the question.

You'll also want to take note of the answers that were eliminated in each question. If you have trouble eliminating answers, try looking at what the answer choices are telling you. When you're solving in a group and getting stuck, have a teammate help you isolate the word/word/word that doesn't look like it makes sense in the context of the sentence.

# **FREQUENT BUGABOO #2 - FALSE ANSWERS**

**_False Answers_**

False answers, as the name implies, are answers to questions that are totally WRONG. You'll get them even if you're very clever and give the right answers, but you shouldn't be getting them.

For a problem related to transfer, the only way you can get a false answer is if the answer is the same as the original sentence or one of the suggested answers.

# **FREQUENT BUGABOO #3 - NEITHER ANSWERS**

# **SOLUTION - NEITHER ANSWERS**

There you have it, another question from the test solved. It looks like neither choices A and B really describe what a transfer is, but they do look right. And C is the perfect word for the definition.

Take some time to rest, because there are still a lot of problems to go through!

# **THE GOOD**

**_P.S. If this is your first time going through the following questions, you should review the information on identifying question type and transfer from the previous pages again._**

# **Solution - No Transfer, No Change, No Difference**

The answer is neither.

# **FREQUENT BUGABOO #4 - NONE OF THE ABOVE**

# **SOLUTION - NONE OF THE ABOVE**

**You are looking for "None of the above." "None of the above" is either the correct answer or it is a false answer, which we consider to be an incorrect answer.**

One way to think about it is that the only way to eliminate one sentence is to be sure that it really does make sense. If the answer choices are completely unrelated to the original sentence, then your initial choice is incorrect.

In the case of NONE OF THE ABOVE, if one of the answer choices makes sense in the context of the sentence, then you should eliminate it. If more than one of the answer choices seems to work with the sentence, that means the answer is NONE OF THE ABOVE and all of the suggestions are false.

**Example:**

> _a. "The new law prohibits the firing of any employee." ( _ **_YES_**_ )
> 
> _b. "You are not allowed to stop someone from leaving your establishment." ( _ **_NO_**_ )
> 
> _c. "You should be wary when you meet this person." ( _ **_NO_** _)
> 
> _d. "You are no longer permitted to have this book on your desk." ( _ **_NO_**_ )

From this example, c, d and a are all false but b is true. So the answer is "None of the above."

# **TIP #1**

You actually want to use this problem not just to _know more_ about transfer, but to _learn_ transfer. Transfer may be in a different subject, but the skill with which you solve this problem should be universal. There is a difference in how the question is presented and the way that you think about it, but it's the same concept.

Think of a way to solve this problem without transfer at all. You know what they're thinking about, you know what they're implying, but they don't say it in so many words. You can infer that it's a transfer. They could have just said it. In our English exams, they use language to _teach_ the language. They explain things in such a way that the new language is not too challenging to understand. When you're solving questions without transfer at all, you're supposed to see what they've written as if they wrote it exactly that way.

There's nothing to infer. It's right there on the page

In this chapter, we will introduce how content companies can prepare to use AI technology, technology stack, and AI solutions that support the business.
Chapter 3: Applying AI Technology
In this chapter, we will demonstrate how AI technology can be applied to the process of producing content. We will examine the problem of producing content, the problems that it may cause, the role of AI technology in solving these problems, and examples of real-world AI uses.
Chapter 4: Using AI in Production
In this chapter, we will discuss the concept of meta content and how AI technology can be used to solve problems that content companies are facing.
Chapter 5: Using AI in Content Marketing
The next chapter is about AI technology applications in content marketing. We will talk about the way content companies think about content distribution and AI applications in content marketing.
Chapter 6: Building an AI-based Community
In this chapter, we will talk about the need to build an AI-based community and how to do it.
Chapter 7: AI Ethics for Content
In this chapter, we will talk about how to create an ethical AI-based company and the concept of ethics in relation to the content industry.
Chapter 8: Global Strategies
In this chapter, we will talk about the concept of global strategies and how to apply them in the AI industry.
This book is designed to be used by professionals and managers.

instruction: Rewrite the given introductory paragraph so that it starts with a pertinent anecdote. Also rewrite the thesis so that it is succinct and concise:    "Many types of black people have different cultural backgrounds and experiences. For example, African and African American cultures share a common ancestry and history of struggles but have distinct cultural identities. While both groups are considered Black, they have different experiences, records, and cultural practices. As Saint Augustine said, ‚ÄúThe world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.‚Äù This quote emphasizes the importance of exploring other cultures to understand their experiences better. As I have gotten older, I have come to understand the similarities and differences between these two individuals."
output:
Rewrite the given introductory paragraph so that it starts with a pertinent anecdote. Also rewrite the thesis so that it is succinct and concise:    "Many types of black people have different cultural backgrounds and experiences. For example, African and African American cultures share a common ancestry and history of struggles but have distinct cultural identities. While both groups are considered Black, they have different experiences, records, and cultural practices. As Saint Augustine said, ‚ÄúThe world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.‚Äù This quote emphasizes the importance of exploring other cultures to understand their experiences better. As I have gotten older, I have come to understand the similarities and differences between these two individuals."

1. Rewrite "Many types of black people have different cultural backgrounds and experiences" as "Black people from different regions and backgrounds have different experiences." Rewrite the introductory paragraph and the thesis with this revised paragraph 

2. Write an introduction using three relevant lines of the introduction along with the above change: 

  "Many types of black people are separated by culture and language. Although they seem to have a lot in common, they all have different experiences, histories, and cultural practices. People often see these as part of Black American culture. However, it is much more complicated than that. As Saint Augustine famously said, ‚ÄúThe world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page of it.‚Äù In this essay, we will explore how this applies to African Americans and African Africans through the lens of the Black Experience. The similarities and differences between these two groups shed light on the different types of Black experience. "

This assignment is about how to do functional programming with JavaScript. This means you will learn how to write pure software that can be composed, where you will learn how to read and write JSON (which are easy), and about the functional programming in the browser.
You don't have to know how to play the piano well in order to play along because you can take as long as you need. You can also go back to sections that you need help with and move on to the new sections.
This is the same way I like to learn languages and software. The first language you learn will already be a lot like the other languages of your future. It's not about learning a language or a programming language, it's about learning how to think about a problem.
This one's a "how to do JavaScript" course and the "how to" will start immediately with an explanation of the syntax itself to JavaScript as well as many of the built-in data types.
You will learn what the syntax is (and why you don't have to do any other work for it either), that all code is "case sensitive" (and that you shouldn't be surprised by what types of code make a compiler or an interpreter run in the way that it does), and some of the differences between JavaScript and Javascript. We will cover the whole of JavaScript, including ES5/6, Node.js, as well as ECMAScript.1 This does mean we'll also cover some advanced code snippets you can probably find on the internet somewhere, whether you're looking for "how to do JavaScript" or not.
Because this course will explain JavaScript and cover not only the whole language, but also the ECMAScript standard, we will go into it in depth. That means we will explain what code is, why variables and values are passed around by value or by reference (aka "reference semantics"), how to use variables and assign values to variables, as well as why "function" is a special keyword (and why both "let" and "var" are special keywords in JavaScript).
We will explain how to do things like assignment (including post-fix operators as well as "the assignment operator"), what comparisons evaluate to (which isn't really about comparisons any more), what things we can do to make our code easier to read (as well as how to do that), as well as what JavaScript can do with objects.
We will also touch on things like closures (and how they relate to scopes) even though the standard does touch on it as well

What is the most powerful fiber optic cable?
When is it too late to buy fiber optic cable?
A fiber-optic cable is a cable composed of light-carrying fibers that is used in optical telecommunications systems.
Who invented the fiber cable?
Alfred Kroehhoff is credited for the invention of fiber optic cable. He was looking for a way to move signals quickly and decided on light.
Why fiber optics is better than copper?
Fiber-optic cables are a more efficient means of transmission, meaning the signals and data move over the fiber-optic cable much quicker than traditional copper cable. Another reason fiber optics is better than copper is because they can carry more data over a single cable.
What does fiber transmission make better?
fiber optics is better than traditional copper due to the fact that it allows for data to travel over very long distances. This, obviously, is very helpful in transmission since in the age of technology there are tons of cables for multiple wires to be strung along, and a fiber-optic cable can span thousands of kilometers.
Why fiber is important to Internet?
As a result of this bandwidth increase, video is playing a larger role in Internet-based communications because the increase in data rate has been able to keep pace with the expansion in video formats and data transfer requirements. Fiber-optic cable plays an important role in broadband Internet applications.
How often should you change optical cables in buildings?
When installing optical cables, ensure the cable connections are connected correctly and that the system is tested before commencing operation. Change optical cables as required, when spliced. An interval of about 2/3 year for long span optical cable.
How does optical fiber cable transmission work?
Optically Amplified Optical Fiber Cable Transmission. At present, since the transmission distance of fiber-optic telephone lines is relatively short, it relies on an optical amplifier to improve the transmission speed and quality of data. Optical fiber has a number of unique properties.

output:
Please summarise in point form "Challenges for
African Agriculture" by Jean-Claude Dev√®ze
2.2.1 Agricultural potential for poverty reduction in Africa cannot be realised without tackling the food supply problem.
2.2.2 Agriculture is a major source of inequality and is the primary determinant of rural poverty.
2.2.3 Improving the quality and productivity of the agricultural labour force and increasing agricultural productivity through rural development efforts have been shown to be the best means of promoting rural poverty reduction.
2.2.4 Most agriculture-based rural livelihoods in Africa depend on small-scale production systems and subsistence resource utilization. Small farming systems are an important source of employment, as well as rural income and food that sustain a significant portion of Africa‚Äôs population.
2.2.5 Smallholder crops production in Africa has tended to increase during the past decade. However, it is important to note that this has not been the case for all the commodity groups examined.
2.2.6 The decline in global cereal prices and the resulting fall in international demand will affect the profitability of small farmers.
2.2.7 The increase in food prices which has affected Africa since 2007 is a major challenge to food security in Africa. Africa cannot be considered food secure in the face of the food price/poverty linkage and the lack of food reserves on the continent.
2.3.1 Food security has become a matter of major concern in Africa.
2.3.2 The problem of inadequate food for all in Africa cannot be addressed solely with a development approach.
2.3.3 Economic growth on its own is not sufficient for food security.
2.3.4 There is a need to develop a holistic, coordinated and long-term approach to food security that combines policy, institutional arrangements and individual, organizational, and household decisions to meet food and nutrition needs.
2.3.5 Food security is linked with human security and development.
2.3.6 Food security is an enabling factor for peace and conflict resolution.
3.1.1 Poverty is a multidimensional phenomenon.
3.1.2 Development of strategies for tackling poverty must be driven by the multiple nature of poverty, which means considering food, livelihood security (including nutrition, health and education), social security, and gender and social equity issues.
3.1.3 Agriculture can be a major catalyst of economic growth and poverty reduction, but only under favorable policy conditions.
3.1.4 Agriculture cannot be a sufficient condition for poverty reduction.
3.2.1 The poverty and inequality paradoxes persist.
3.2.2 Despite the increasing agricultural contribution to total consumption and the expanding agricultural markets, small farmers are still the major agents of development.
3.2.3 Poverty reduction in Africa is largely attributable to the high growth rates of the economies of the region.
3.2.4 Agricultural market reforms have contributed to African economic growth, but they have not been sufficient to promote growth among small farmers.
3.2.5 Public action is essential for the improvement of the welfare of the poor by promoting equity over efficiency as a development strategy.
3.2.6 The challenge is to transform the existing welfare provision for farmers into a system that ensures adequate access to resources by the poor.
3.3.1 The concept of agrarian transformation is multidimensional, based on a broad spectrum of social factors that affect the various actors in the agricultural sector.
3.3.2 Agriculture in Africa must be transformed, through restructuring production, distribution, and consumption systems.
3.4.1 The success of the rural development strategy is essential not only to the survival of small farmers but also to the long-term sustainability of Africa‚Äôs rural economy.
3.4.2 The agricultural sector has significant potential for rural development and it can serve as an important vehicle of economic growth and poverty reduction by addressing the social and economic challenges facing the continent.
3.4.3 There are many dimensions of rural development, ranging from individual to institutional and social.
Agro-based value chains for rural development and poverty reduction are central to African agriculture.
By 1990, the share of small farmers in Africa‚Äôs population has declined from 56 percent to 53 percent, mainly due to the increase in the urban population.
Agriculture is a major source of inequality and is the primary determinant of rural poverty.
Large-scale and commercial agriculture contributes significantly to rural development and employment, but does not play the role of poverty reduction.
About 60 percent of African consumers and 85 percent of the rural population depend on small-scale agriculture to meet their basic needs.
Small and medium farms are an important force in promoting equitable, sustainable development and contribute significantly to Africa‚Äôs economic advancement.

instruction: When I open Anki browser, It shuts down. how can i fix this?
output:
When I open Anki browser, It shuts down. how can i fix this?
Re: "Anki browser crashes after Anki app is closed"
1. Make sure you're connected to the internet.
2. Try to run Anki 2 (http://anki.net/download/anki-app.dmg) instead of Version 1 of Anki. Sometimes the App Store version gets overwritten when your computer shuts down.
3. Try to close Anki 2 and restart your system. If it still doesn't work, make sure an Anki version is installed and then try to close Anki 1, wait 10 seconds, and open Anki 2.

This has been a year like no other one in U.S.-Russian history.
It all started with a meeting between President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump in Helsinki on 16 July 2018. Some analysts were initially dubious about the meeting‚Äôs likely outcome. However, in a stunning development, Trump decided to side with Putin and challenge U.S. intelligence agencies, which have identified Russia as the principal culprit in the hacking of Democratic Party emails in 2016.
The Putin-Trump meeting in Helsinki had a decidedly chilling effect on U.S.-Russian relations, especially among Republicans.
Many Republicans were still reeling from Trump‚Äôs decision in June 2018 to abandon the ‚ÄúJoint Comprehensive Plan of Action.‚Äù The agreement was crafted to limit Iran‚Äôs nuclear capabilities, and its eventual withdrawal was viewed by many, including me, as a betrayal of U.S. and Israeli interests.
Putin‚Äôs own standing in Washington had already deteriorated during the previous year as his regime became known for staging a political assasssion of the exiled former KGB officer Sergei Skripal and his daughter in the United Kingdom.
In sum, the Helsinki meeting was not the high point of Trump‚Äôs presidency, not by far. It only managed to consolidate the deep distrust that many in both parties had already been harboring toward a president and a chief international opponent who had not always shown the greatest degree of care for U.S. national interests.
And the year did not begin with such a Trump-Putin meeting in Helsinki. Instead, it began with a series of high-level meetings and visits between U.S. and Russian officials, along with continued negotiations on a ‚ÄúNew START‚Äù treaty between the two countries, which would set limits on nuclear weapons.
Then, in early January, the Kremlin staged an election in which a Putin loyalist was returned to serve as president for at least another six years. And in February, the Kremlin began to openly display a number of provocative acts ‚Äì most notably the shooting down of a pro-Western opposition politician, an opposition politician. In many ways, there was an undeniable pattern in these actions: the more a Kremlin appears to be backing Trump, the more openly it engages ‚Äì some would say provokes ‚Äì U.S. adversaries.
And, of course, Putin never has seemed more like an adversary of the United States in our own political history since during the Cold War.
Trump was, of course, acquitted in his impeachment trial in the U.S. Senate. And many Americans were elated over the fact that he would survive his own party‚Äôs attempt to overturn his presidency.
However, that was only the beginning of this year‚Äôs U.S. political drama.
In May, the Senate voted overwhelmingly to block Russia‚Äôs invasion into Syria‚Äôs Idlib province. It was the second time in a short span of time that Russia‚Äôs invasion of Syria had been stopped by American naval forces patrolling the Eastern Mediterranean.
However, the Senate‚Äôs passage also signaled that ‚Äì at least in the Senate ‚Äì U.S. lawmakers seemed to be more concerned about Syrian military matters than with domestic Trump affairs at the moment.
Although impeachment was at the forefront of America‚Äôs political debates in early 2019, it faded rapidly from view. And as it faded from view, another political subplot started to emerge ‚Äì the issue of U.S.-Chinese tensions and the growing American trade deficit with China. Some analysts have called the situation America‚Äôs looming, silent foreign policy crisis.
Some analysts say that China was always America‚Äôs biggest foreign policy threat ‚Äì and that this issue may be growing into a full-scale foreign policy crisis in the United States.
I‚Äôm reminded of the saying that if you keep putting a Band-Aid on a bad wound, a patient can live for longer without pain, but he will die sooner than one that has more treatment.
The Trump administration continues to wage an ‚Äúeconomic war‚Äù against China. However, many analysts are quick to add that U.S. economic aggression toward China is causing the problems more than anything it‚Äôs doing about them ‚Äì and that America‚Äôs aggressive stance toward China is not only making us poorer, but it‚Äôs hurting America‚Äôs allies in Europe
