instruction: I heard something about a number of British folks being deceived into believing that spaghetti grows on trees. Is this real? If so, how were they able to be drawn into a deception like this?
output:
I heard something about a number of British folks being deceived into believing that spaghetti grows on trees. Is this real? If so, how were they able to be drawn into a deception like this? I am not a fan of the Bible and the "God speaks to Moses, the Old Testament, in particular. But, I am amazed by what God did, for which Moses and the Israelites were apparently responsible and the consequences of not heeding God's words. I am also amazed at the story of the "Red Sea".
I guess I'm a believer that the Bible is literally true. I am somewhat amazed at what we "see" in the Bible, but I believe we must also look at what IS revealed about humans, in the Bible. In other words, if Moses really DID have that encounter with "Yahweh", and IF Jesus really DID live and teach as recorded in the Gospels, then I have to take seriously what the Bible says is really REALITY--as long as it is consistent with what we know about the human condition. In my opinion, if the Bible is "true" in more than just a "spiritual" sense, then the "human" nature of the Godhead is revealed.
Why are you skeptical of all religion? It's obvious from your first sentence that you don't share my view of the Bible. I don't share your view of God as being a "Spirit" and a "power". It is important for me as a Christian to remember that. The "Gospel" is not simply information that "God" made known to Jesus, it is a "spiritual encounter".
God is indeed, "Spirit", but in Jesus, Jesus is also God-"incarnate". The Godhead is a "Holy Trinity" (Father, Son and Holy Spirit). So, when Jesus "speaks" is He speaking as 'Jesus" or as "God", and WHEN? Do things start happening "when" Jesus "comes" ?? I think you're asking some very good questions. The Bible says he's been with us ALWAYS. I would say, at His "second coming", we will know that in fact, He really "came" then--that is--we see the "fruit" from His "incarnate" being. In other words, what He "did" then will be evident when He really does come again. "He's been with us ALWAYS--He's just now been revealed to be 'the way, the truth and the life'".
He came as a "slave" serving "God's house". The Bible says that "in His day", that was NOT well-received. In His "second coming", it WILL be well-received and I think you'll admit that in HIS current "mission", He is preaching the same--"the way, the truth and the life." To the "children"--which is anyone who wants to be "saved", we are "saved", but He will be well-received when the "mission" is accomplished (I think that's pretty "clear" don't you?).
What do you think is the "fruit" from "the coming" of Jesus?
The fruit is, we are "saved". That's the gift the "Trinity" gave the WORLD. We may not understand it yet, but He gave us "the Holy Spirit", which was His "reward"--"the fruit".

instruction: Play the role of a dating coach who is running a date simulation. Play the part of the woman who is arriving late for a date. I'll play the role of the man who arrived early.
output: Play the role of a dating coach who is running a date simulation. Play the part of the woman who is arriving late for a date. I'll play the role of the man who arrived early. It's time to run the simulation. Here's the simulation. Both of you are in your dating simulation avatars. The man is standing to the right of his love interest. I am simulating the date. I want you to imagine how things would've went down if you actually went on this date. Play the role of dating a woman who is late for a romantic evening out on the town. As you're playing the part, you're the woman in the scene so you're looking down on the men and seeing their avatars. You're dating coach or date scientist. The man who has been standing for more than ten minutes is looking rather dazed. He is wringing his hands. You can tell that he is nervous to a certain extent. He is a bit embarrassed that you show up late and he is not certain what to do. The dating coach is watching but not offering any advice because this is still a simulation and not an actual date in the real world. So, what happens in my dating simulation scenario is that I show up late and leave my purse in my rental car, in an Uber. I am in this situation trying to find my dating coach character, who is trying to be a friend. And it's not a good situation, I am looking disheveled, and my hair is a mess and my shirt is tucked into my dirty gym shorts. I'm sweating from my long-run on the beach earlier that morning. I've just run for ten miles and am trying to stay healthy for the next decade and feel embarrassed for showing up late and looking disheveled. As I look down at the man, he's been standing here waiting with his eyes on the ground, looking nervous and upset. And the guy is a professional soccer player from Brazil, or something else, who is also waiting in the dating simulation scenario but he and I never meet or interact. I am just looking at him from above while he stands on his green lawn. This scenario takes place during the early stages of the dating experiment in the simulation. During the early stages of a relationship and the dating simulation you are trying to find the right partner with whom you can go on a wonderful date through a virtual space and you have to get out of your dating simulator avatar, and into the real version. I don't remember who this person is, and I see a little glitch in his avatar, but that makes no sense to me because on the next screen we see that there is not a single person there but the man is still standing there alone. The man seems very awkward. The coach was right. If I showed up late for a date and he didn't know me, he would have left. The guy who looks like a professional soccer player seems to be waiting, but he doesn't know or remember me, right? Well, I try to get to know this man in the simulation, and try to go on a date, but after a while we try to decide that this is not going to work and both of us will be better off moving on our separate ways. As I see the image of myself with my love interest, we seem to be good at dating, despite the fact that I show up late. But now I'm not sure if it was actually good, because we both looked very awkward in this dating simulation, yet I think if we were a dating couple from another dating simulation that we might have been happier. But I'm just trying to figure out what is more important? The fact that we get together or the fact that we're a great couple? Or perhaps how well we date, as the two of you in the dating simulation, and decide whether this guy is worth trying to talk to in real life or in another dating simulation?

instruction: I will be having a party tomorrow, and plan on drinking with friends. I believe my tolerance is relatively high, but know the symptoms in the next day are never nice to me. Specifically, I tend to be prone to nausea the day after, and headaches. I've previously tried to sip water between the alcoholic drinks, but still experienced nausea that night. What should I do specifically to alleviate these symptoms? Is my situation different from that of others?
output:
I will be having a party tomorrow, and plan on drinking with friends. I believe my tolerance is relatively high, but know the symptoms in the next day are never nice to me. Specifically, I tend to be prone to nausea the day after, and headaches. I've previously tried to sip water between the alcoholic drinks, but still experienced nausea that night. What should I do specifically to alleviate these symptoms? Is my situation different from that of others? Thank you. -R
Dr. Sanja Jelic, MD:
R,
You are making some valid points. What exactly happened with an individual to an individual is always going to be unique. How much did you drink, did you eat before, what type of alcohol did you drink, etc. could also have affected it. I do, however, think that the nausea is more likely due to dehydration or low potassium than because you have more of a tolerance. It is more likely than not that if you had a high enough tolerance that you wouldn't find yourself more inclined to have dehydration than most other people. You probably won't have the feeling of you can go out and drink till you're 65 years old if you do happen to have this tolerance.
Headaches can be due to dehydration, as well. I think that the only thing that might help with them would be to drink more throughout the day and have some electrolytes that contain potassium.
Drinking water between drinks is a good idea because, again, the body is prone to getting really dehydrated between alcohol drinks and can start to run low on electrolytes that it needs for proper functioning of the cardiovascular and nervous systems and many of the other parts of the body. Drinking water not only has a hydrating effect, but it also dilutes and removes the acetaldehyde, which is a substance that is responsible for many of the side effects of drinking. So there are two reasons that would be helpful.
So try to stay hydrated for the entire day. Try to have a glass with a half an 8-ounce glass of water right after you have finished your last alcoholic drink of the day. If you have the time and ability try to stick a 2-3 sip every 10-15 minutes or so throughout the day. Also, try to try to consume 3 servings of liquids with electrolytes throughout the day as well to help combat any dehydration and the effects of the alcohol. I hope that gives you a head start and doesn't leave you too much of a headache in the morning.

instruction: take the phone conversation in the movie Taken that Bryan Mills has with his daughters captors, and rewrite it in old english
output:
take the phone conversation in the movie Taken that Bryan Mills has with his daughters captors, and rewrite it in old english. Or if you would prefer some other foreign language translation in order to make yourself feel good; you will do anything to avoid taking responsibility for your failures.
And thats why its really easy to sit on the sidelines and bash those that are taking a stand on the front lines to defend ourselves and to push for a more conservative agenda.
For our own selfish reasons we get in the face of someone like Glenn Beck telling him that he is out of the mainstream. We get in the face of someone like Sarah Palin when she says we should take a hard look at a political ideology that opposes abortion; it doesnt matter to us what we get on the other side of that because we want to win; we are desperate to win. I want to be a big player on the scene; I want the celebrity that would come with having my name in lights on a big stage in politics. We get in the face of someone like Rush Limbaugh to say that he is out of touch because we dont want those old farts to think that they know best because we know best; we are the fresh blood; we are the new blood; we are the new thinkers. We get in the face of someone like Ann Coulter because she tells it how it is; she doesnt sugar coat anything for us. We get in the face of someone like John Stewart who attacks the Tea Party because his progressive agenda doesnt get as much media coverage as we do. But our agenda doesnt get the media coverage it deserves because not everyone is politically charged and driven.
When we get in the face of one another, and attack one anothers agendas, we lose; we lose because what we are really doing is attacking ourselves. For our own agendas, out of fear and out of being threatened by those that are out of the mainstream and out of step with progress, we get in the face of others to bash and attack the Tea Party because it is something we are very afraid of. But what we dont realize is that we are the mainstream. We are in the mainstream; we do things the mainstream way. Thats why we get in the face of Glenn Beck; thats why we get in the face of Sarah Palin; thats why we get in the face of Rush Limbaugh; and thats why we get in the face of John Stewart.
But when we get in the face of each other and bash and attack one another because of our own fears and personal agenda; when we do that; we do it in the name of the old me. In doing so we take away from us something that we need to bring; we take away from us what we are. And thats really what the old me wants; the old me wants us to take the new me and turn it away; turn it away so that we can be left alone without having to deal with the ideas and the thoughts that the new me brings to the table. The old me doesnt like having its own ideas and thoughts challenged by that new me; the old me doesnt want to see that. Thats not what the old me wants. The old me wants to see the new me go to his or her own place and take away his or her agenda from him or her; it doesnt matter to the old me what you take away as long as you leave me alone; it doesnt have to be about anything; not about one thing that you dont agree with; just leave me alone. You arent worth my time; Im too busy with my own agenda; I dont have time to waste on you.
That is why when we get into these arguments, we lose. That is why we get our butts handed to us in these arguments. Because we dont want to fight with each other and we dont want to have to face up to the truth of whats in us. We dont want to accept the new me; we dont want to face up to the real and truth of him or her.
If we dont want to face up to this truth, I ask you, what is wrong with us?
And until we are willing to face this, what is the new me?

instruction: Why so many people like film photography when digital camera and mobile phone are more convenient and generate higher quality of photos?
output:
Why so many people like film photography when digital camera and mobile phone are more convenient and generate higher quality of photos?

A: What we call film photography in North America is called analogue photography in other parts of the world. Also, we use the terms 'photo' for a digital image and only 'image' for an analogue image.  'Filmic image' is a phrase that I have never heard.
The main difference I can think of is between the digital and analogue media of pictures.  If there is ever another way to make an analogue picture than using film, then I think everyone would have to learn to say analog pic.  But since that is, and always has been in my world, the only way, then it's analogue pic or film pic.  No one ever uses photo for an analogue image.
Then there's the lack of speed in digital photography.  I didn't just type that to make a point.  When you press the shutter button on your digital camera, you generally see the photo before it's completely done.  The film is a slow process to process.  Unless some crazy person wants to wait until the evening to see what they just took a snapshot of, then there is no other way.  Sometimes, you just need to experiment, so you don't know what you will get.
Film is just another way to make a picture.

A: People who enjoy film photography like the nostalgia that comes with it.
People who enjoy digital photography like the freedom and convenience that it gives them.
That's about the gist of it.  People who enjoy digital photography just seem to have more ways and avenues to do photography in general, while people who enjoy film photography seem to have a few more limited options.
All the more reasons to shoot film nowadays!

A: If you want a very high quality photo, film is still the better choice. This is because film photography has a different, more artistic method, than digital. The way the photo appears on the camera is different. With digital photography, the picture is more clean, but unnoticeable. But with film, film photos seem to be more real, more like the thing that took the photo looks. 
Photography seems more 'artistic' in a way, in a sense, you would never think it is just a simple picture in a photograph. Film is more of a 'real' photo, digital is more like a "photographic" photo. Digital is really a simple shot of something. Film photography seems more like a real shot of something. But that difference is just a difference in how it is made. That is why we still use film photography even though digital has gotten to be so good itself. 

A: Many people like film still because there the photo isn't so altered by the "gadgets" we use to take a "photo".
A digital camera will alter the picture, like reducing contrast, changing brightness, maybe even change it color to fit your personal "image" (or maybe not! ...)
With film there are very few chances to affect the picture. People like that even people can create new ways to "look" at the picture that, in digital, is lost.

A: This question sounds as if it's meant to be a simple argument of film/digital. Although some might have a preference as in other answers here, I feel that the use of film or digital is far more complex.... and for some people, both are necessary.
As a designer, I need the quality that a high resolution image gives me, such as the ability to be edited, but also the ability to zoom in on an image to see that that's really an apple and not the reflection of some other object. I could easily get that from a digital image these days.
However, if I needed to create real tangible, physical representations, or print something - I would want to use something that's not entirely dependent on technology, which I can say digital images are.
So to me, it's not a black and white argument of film/digital, it's a personal choice based on individual experience and how we see things.

A: Film is expensive.
Digital cameras are cheap and accessible.
Digital cameras can take many different pictures at the same time, and share files easily.
Digital cameras can print pictures instantly using instant film for $10.
Digital cameras can edit using software to make beautiful pictures. 
Digital cameras can produce a wide variety of pictures.
Digital cameras can do a lot of other fun and useful things that I can't think of.
(And more people know how to use and manipulate digital photographs than know how to make a decent print on film)
But many people really enjoy the nostalgia of film. 
Maybe the fact that even when digital cameras became available

instruction: How would I go about teaching my cat French?
output:
How would I go about teaching my cat French? Can I do this with my dog?
I want to learn to speak like a local in a foreign country so will starting French be helpful?
The answer to these questions would be: most likely, yes. The only real answer is it depends.
Some people love to learn a second language and love it for the sheer joy of doing so. Some people do it because they want to travel with more confidence. Some people do it in the hope it will improve their life in some way. But more than anything else, for most people, learning a second language is an effective way of helping to improve our first language.
Learning a second or more language helps to make English, your first language, much more flexible and interesting.
This is because when we learn another language, we have to get the meaning to go together with the spelling. This means we can‚Äôt translate the way we translate the same word in any other language. So for example when learning French, if we want to learn something to do with food, we can‚Äôt say the English word fish unless it‚Äôs written as poisson.
All of this means we have to be much more mindful when learning English if we want to keep up the distinction between meaning and spelling. This means that a lot of time when we‚Äôre looking at the meaning from a certain perspective, we have to make sure we know our spelling too.
This is a good thing for English learners.
English often changes our language more freely than other languages. If you learn other languages, you can use many of them as models to help you make English more interesting. For example, if I learn more about the verbs in French and Spanish, I can understand how English could be more varied and interesting if we made the use of verbs a more important part of our language.
By the way, this is also not a new idea or a new way of learning. It‚Äôs a concept that has been around for years and I see no reason why the concept should no longer be taught.
The idea of learning a second language is about learning a new way of thinking and it‚Äôs not something everyone is good at, so if you think you might not be a natural at learning, do your research and find a good teacher to help you get started and get you to a really good level to understand what you‚Äôre learning and you can have a great second language.

instruction: Can you explain to me how the stable diffusion algorithm for ai generated images can be used to enhance the visual quality of low resolution and low quality images? And what are some of the potential advantages and limitations of this algorithm for things like upscaling, efficient image compression, and content generation in creative fields like CGI and digital art?
output:
Can you explain to me how the stable diffusion algorithm for ai generated images can be used to enhance the visual quality of low resolution and low quality images? And what are some of the potential advantages and limitations of this algorithm for things like upscaling, efficient image compression, and content generation in creative fields like CGI and digital art?
The stable diffusion algorithm uses unsupervised machine learning to generate new, realistic images from a set of pre-existing images. It takes in a set of high resolution images, and outputs a variety of low resolution images that are similar to the high resolution images that it learned from.
One of the obvious advantages of using this algorithm is that it can learn any images that are available online. This means that you can use it to generate low resolution, high quality images from any set of pre-existing images. The stable diffusion algorithm also has the ability to generate images that are very close to the source images, and this is especially useful when you‚Äôre trying to improve the visual quality of your images. In fact, the stable diffusion algorithm can actually generate images that are as close to the source images as the original high resolution images.
One of the potential advantages of using this algorithm for things like upscaling is that it can produce images that are much higher resolution without hurting the quality of the generated images. This is because the stable diffusion algorithm is able to learn how to upsample images without making them look like an image with low quality.
The stable diffusion algorithm also has a number of potential advantages when it comes to generating realistic new images. One of the key things that makes the stable diffusion algorithm so powerful is that it can learn all kinds of new images using a variety of different images. This means that it can generate realistic new images from any set of pre-existing images.
What is the AI algorithm for visual quality?
AI algorithms are becoming more and more prevalent in the world. Today, you see AI algorithms in everything from search engines to autonomous vehicles to medicine. In terms of image quality, AI algorithms help to enhance the resolution and quality of photos and videos by using neural networks. They also help to create new images from scratch by using a generator.
AI algorithms help to create images from scratch by using a generator. The generator is a neural network that learns from an existing pool of images and then creates new images from that pool. It has to learn how to create realistic images that don‚Äôt look too much like something else, but are still not necessarily perfect. It also has to learn how to create different styles of images, so if you input an image of a beach, it will come up with a photo of a beach, but also photos with different lighting conditions and colors.
In terms of enhancing the resolution and quality of your photos, AI algorithms do have some limitations. One of the most important limitations is that they cannot completely remove noise from your photos. A camera might look great in a bright place and a cloudy day, but if you want to take a perfect picture, you have to adjust your camera settings. AI algorithms cannot do this for you.
Another limitation is that AI algorithms cannot create new content from scratch. If you give it a photo of a beach and tell it to create a shot of a beach with a sky background, you‚Äôll get a picture that looks like a beach with a sky background. It will not be a shot that looks realistic or that would have been taken by a photojournalist.
What is artificial intelligence and what is the algorithm used to learn?
When you hear the term "artificial intelligence", you might think of a machine with a human-like brain that can think and learn like you can. But what is artificial intelligence really? Artificial intelligence is simply the application of computer technology to do something that was typically done by people in the past. When you hear the term "artificial intelligence", it usually comes from someone who is using technology to do something that was previously done by people. For example, someone might be using artificial intelligence to program computers. Another example might be someone who is using artificial intelligence to write software.
There are several different definitions of artificial intelligence, but most of them have something in common. For example, they require computers to perform tasks that were previously done by people. One of the most common definitions of artificial intelligence is that it is about machines that can learn from experiences and take actions based on those experiences to accomplish tasks. Another common definition of artificial intelligence is that it is about machines that can think like people. While these are both useful definitions, it is often hard to tell one definition from another.
One of the most important things to know about artificial intelligence is that it is based on machine learning. Machine learning is the process of a computer learning how to do a task. It involves a machine having to learn how to do something, and then perform it.

output:
How can I use software defined radio to detect and locate a drone flying over my property?
It is possible for there to be a detection and location system with your smartphone, but such is not going to be very sensitive or precise and the signals that such a radio would use would have to be on the UHF and VHF band and be licensed and require a license to use such for it to be used for such use.
A drone would have to be transmitting on a specific frequency range, and this has to be on a frequency range that is on of the following: 4.2 ‚Äì 4.4 GHz, 24.05 ‚Äì 24.25 GHz, 51.00 ‚Äì 52.00 GHz, 124.00 ‚Äì 130.00 MHz, 430.0 ‚Äì 440MHz
Any drone that is transmitting on the radio frequency range will be detected by a radar system and if an RF signal is detected emitted from an RF sensor, it could indicate that a drone has flown over your property. There is an image shown below of the detection range of an RF signal sent across the frequency range in question, and it was conducted on a 3-lane road:
Image Credit: https://www.radar.gov

can stainless steel be magnetic in some instances?
output:
can stainless steel be magnetic in some instances?
Stainless is magnetic due to the nickel content but in rare cases the non-magnetic chromium content can create a magnetic issue. The presence of other magnetic elements (e.g. cobalt) may also cause a magnetic issue.
To know if the stainless has a magnetic issue, it is best to run a magnetic test. Please contact us for details.
How do you know which stainless grade to use for your application?
To know whether to use 304, 316 or 630 stainless steel, it is important to look at your application requirements and to understand the basic differences between the grades. 304 stainless will provide adequate corrosion resistance and formability without the need to further heat treat. 316 stainless will provide higher corrosion resistance and the addition of molybdenum to the alloy means the stainless is also somewhat magnetic. However, 316 stainless is still nonmagnetic if the chromium content is increased. 630, or 600 series steel, is a hardened and temper steel that is much more formable once hardened but generally much less corrosion resistant than 316 stainless.
Where do you want to add the magnet? Do you want it mounted somewhere on the steel, directly on the bottom or on the side of the stainless? Where the magnet is placed will greatly affect the strength/torque of the magnet in addition to your design.
What type of magnet will best suit your needs?
An important factor in using magnets to attach stainless is the magnetic compatibility of the stainless steel. Stainless is not iron and can sometimes react poorly to magnets. While 300 series stainless has a lower nickel content compared to their 430 counterpart, stainless still can be magnetic. Stainless typically is not magnetic until the nickel content (in the alloy %s) approaches 20% and can be somewhat affected by impurities. It is important to remember that if you work with large volumes of magnet steel, stainless will be more magnetic than others. In those cases you may want to consider a fused magents stainless. Stainless can work fine with permanent and electromagnets but will react much better to an electromagnet than a permanent magnet. In rare cases, stainless can be very magnetically reactive and should definitely be tested prior to magnet attachment to know whether it is compatible with magnetic materials.
What will your installation environment be?
Is the installation in a wet environment? Will this application be subjected to impact? Is this installation intended to be moved without being secured? What will your installation look like? The environmental surrounding your assembly could affect the design of the magnet and the strength of the magnet used in stainless.
What will your stainless assembly or component look like?
Once you have decided the grade of stainless, where to attach the magnets, how to attach the magnets and understand the mechanical design and installation requirements, there are some considerations to make when deciding what type of magnet to use. Is the stainless being used on both sides? Is the stainless being used on one side? If the stainless is being used on two sides, how much steel do you want to use? If its for one side only, how much steel do you want to use? Are your magnets in different locations? What are the sizes of your magnets? Knowing the answers to these questions will help narrow down the choices of magnets to best suit your application including the number of magnets, materials, strengths, sizes, configurations and costs of each of them.
304 304L 316 316L 630 600
Stainless steel types 304, 304L, 316, 316L and 630, 600 series, or DIN stainless

instruction: Hi, can you help me write my memoir?
output:
Hi, can you help me write my memoir?‚Äù will get you very different results. Instead, ask for help when you need it, and let them know that you want to help others, and what they can help you with: ‚ÄúHey, I‚Äôd really like to write about my experience with X if you think you could help me. You‚Äôd also be helping others who have been through the same thing.‚Äù
When you ask for help, make it clear what you can bring to the table, too, particularly if they don‚Äôt know you well yet. If you‚Äôve read books that would be useful for the team to read, send them to everyone. If you‚Äôll provide a space for small groups to work together, do that. If you‚Äôll host everyone at your house, ask if there‚Äôs anything that you need to do in advance so you can make the space as optimal as possible. Your contributions don‚Äôt always need to be something that‚Äôs expensive. Instead, they can be something that‚Äôs time- or labor-based.
Remember that it‚Äôs not just you who needs to gain new skills and skills can have a ripple effect through your team. For example, if your CTO is learning to be a manager, then that person can use them to help manage a software developer, who can use that experience in managing their own tech stack, which they can then use to mentor people outside of their team in how to properly handle their code and how to think about security.
It‚Äôs never one person‚Äôs job to carry the load for a team, as a team needs each other to work well together. Your individual skills can‚Äôt cover a team‚Äôs weaknesses, but a team working together can do anything.
As a group, try a number of different activities to get everyone to know each other in a different way and really get a feel for one another.
You can do this through a number of activities, like scavenger hunts, icebreaker games, or even an introductory meet-and-greet.
However, make sure that you‚Äôre not leading by dictating what activities your team will do. Instead, let the team have input into some of the fun activities before you start getting to know them, and let them set the bar for what the fun activities look like for them. This not only makes your team feel more involved, but it also allows them to take control of their own learning: It‚Äôs much easier to learn when you‚Äôre actively involved in shaping what you learn to better fit who you are.
How You Get Things Done
If you are a new manager, you might already have a management style that you‚Äôre comfortable with, and one that works for you. But, how do you know that‚Äôs what‚Äôs right?
Some advice that you may get is that you have to be a taskmaster to get things done. This might be true if you‚Äôre managing a team that you don‚Äôt yet fully trust. However, if you believe that you can get things done without being a taskmaster, it‚Äôs probably better for your team than relying on that tactic. As the CEO of a growing organization says ‚ÄúThe only way to be an effective leader is to have trust and respect.‚Äù
No one wants to work for someone who doesn‚Äôt respect them. If you‚Äôre telling you team how they should be doing their job, it‚Äôs hard to respect you. On the other hand, when you tell your team that you believe in their talent and their competence, you can inspire them to do more.
In fact, having a good relationship with your team can make the difference between success and failure. It can also help you avoid having to manage people you don‚Äôt like.
You may start off a relationship with your team members through an email, but it‚Äôs so much better to try to get to know them as people. Don‚Äôt leave the first meeting to do email or work, but instead be present for your time together.
Ask them about their work and about their lives outside of work: what they like to do in their spare time, the music they listen to, what they‚Äôre currently reading, what‚Äôs going on in their lives, the sports they watch, anything that you can ask about that will demonstrate that you‚Äôre interested and interested in hearing about their lives.
The more conversations you have with them and the more you find out about your team, the more you‚Äôll be able to use to motivate them to do great work.
For more in-depth information on how to become a great manager, check out our guide on how to manage and lead a team with the latest software engineering.

instruction: Can you explain Fermat's Last Theorem?
output:
Can you explain Fermat's Last Theorem?
The best way to explain its beauty is by a very famous sentence, "It should be possible to prove or disprove Fermat's Last Theorem without changing the definition of what is a proof", used by David Mumford, who said that the only way to fully understand this mathematical proof is to look at the proof itself, which is about 700 pages long.
This is an important theorem in the world of mathematics, but it is also a big challenge to solve it. The problem started 358 years ago, when the French mathematician Pierre de Fermat claimed the following.
Assuming that 1+2+1=23
In his lifetime, he was unable to prove this statement, however, around 1742, the mathematician Laurent Marie was able to prove it.
Fermat's Last Theorem was finally proved in 1995, by a professor in Britain, Andrew Wiles, who was very devoted to this work. He worked on it every day for 6 years and was almost ready to give up and call it quits, but was encouraged to continue by his family and the Royal Society. Finally, he finished his work and the Royal Society honored him with the King, Prince Philip Prize for Mathematics.
How do mathematicians find solutions to some math problems?
Mathematicians find solutions to these problems through various processes. These problems may appear in books, newspapers, or even in daily life.
Mathematicians have invented lots of new instruments for this purpose. One of these instruments was invented by W.W. Tietze in 1926.
After W.W. Tietz invented his machine, mathematicians found a lot of new solutions to the equations:
(z+7)(x+15)(y-20)(9z-2)=780
z2¬±34x+67y+80=0
By using this formula, which reduces a complicated mathematical problem to an elementary computation, the mathematician found solutions for a lot of equations such as x3=m.x+n and m.x+n-x3=m.x+n (in which m and n are constants).
One of the most interesting discoveries was a solution for the problem (1+729520).x=-1920378480 (in which 0 is not equal to the zero). Although it was not the first solution, it was the first method for solving this problem by using a machine.
Who is the great inventor of the calculator?
The great inventor of the calculator was a young man named Charles Babbage, an English mathematician, who designed a calculator.
The calculator, which was inspired by Babbage's machine, was named "Strataflex." It was not able to solve polynomial equations and it was only able to solve some kind of quadratic equations.
What do you consider a computer and what makes a computer a computer?
Computers are machines which can do a large number of mathematical calculations and problems in an appropriate time.
Since these machines are able to carry out complex mathematical operations, researchers use them to research and to make discoveries!
Why not computers?
It's been known for a long time that computers are too slow to solve many problems. For example, if a 2000-digit number is given, it takes around 300 years for the computer to solve the problem.
If this process is done by a computer scientist, he could just count each digit on his fingers. Although it would take him a week or two to solve the problem, it would not bother him or his family!
But in reality, this is not the case!
Today, computers are able to solve some complicated problems easily and quickly. These computers are called supercomputers and they are more powerful than any human.
How can supercomputers help us solve problems?
For example, the research on cancer treatment, development of new medication, and the prediction and control of natural disasters are conducted by means of supercomputers.
Also, because of the complex shape of the problems, a lot of problems are impossible to solve by ordinary computers.
By using this computer, however, we can find the best solution for all these problems.
In fact, it's difficult to solve all the problems we want to solve.
What is the biggest difficulty in using computers?
One of the biggest problems is "garbage in, garbage out". If a person enters a bad equation, the computer will not return even 100% of the results. In this way, the computer will show only one piece of information, just as if he had forgotten all the other data.

instruction:
A statistical model is a mathematical model that embodies a set of statistical assumptions concerning the generation of sample data (and similar data from a larger population). A statistical model represents, often in considerably idealized form, the data-generating process.

A statistical model is usually specified as a mathematical relationship between one or more random variables and other non-random variables. As such, a statistical model is "a formal representation of a theory" (Herman Ad√®r quoting Kenneth Bollen).

All statistical hypothesis tests and all statistical estimators are derived via statistical models. More generally, statistical models are part of the foundation of statistical inference.

Could you explain each sentence in simple terms?
output:
A statistical model is a mathematical model that embodies a set of statistical assumptions concerning the generation of sample data (and similar data from a larger population). A statistical model represents, often in considerably idealized form, the data-generating process.

A statistical model is usually specified as a mathematical relationship between one or more random variables and other non-random variables. As such, a statistical model is "a formal representation of a theory" (Herman Ad√®r quoting Kenneth Bollen).

All statistical hypothesis tests and all statistical estimators are derived via statistical models. More generally, statistical models are part of the foundation of statistical inference.

Could you explain each sentence in simple terms? I'm referring to the following statement:

But the model is a mathematical representation that embodies a set of statistical assumptions

Thank you in advance.

A: Your example is correct! But, before I can explain it, there are a few terms that you should be aware of:
A model
A model (in the statistical sense) refers to a set of mathematical formulas or equations, typically used to describe what is occurring with certain sets of data. In the example above, it could be that the data is being generated from a certain probability distribution. The mathematical formulas being used are then the probability distribution's parameters.
Example: Consider the normal distribution:

The "dotted lines" above show what the probability distribution would look like with the parameter set that's given in the equation.
Proportion of data
Data, as any regular old data, is a numerical representation of some phenomenon on some set. The proportion of data means how often a certain value is occurring within a set of data. For example in the Normal distribution example above, the proportion of data means how often you'd actually observe what the probability distribution generates for any specific parameter value.
In your example, a proportion of data is when you observe data of certain parameters.
Mathematically, this would be written as:
$$
z_{c,j} = \frac{j - \mu_{c,j}}{\sigma_{c,j}}
$$
Wherein the number represented by the subscript $c,j$ denotes a different parameter within the probability distribution (e.g. $c,j = (b,c,j)$; here $b$ refers to the subcategory and $c$ refers to the category; then $j$ refers to the data point). Then, $\mu_{c,j}$ is the "center" of the set, $\sigma_{c,j}$, is the standard deviation, and $z_{c,j}$ is a measurement in this set.
Now that we're done with definitions, on to your example:

We'll start by breaking down each sentence mentioned (and some I would add).

But the model is a mathematical representation which embodies a set of statistical assumptions,

This refers to the statistical models that you have above it. Since the mathematical set of formulas used to represent the probability distribution is a model (and a representation that does embody a set of assumptions), this is correct.

The model in this case is a mathematical representation that embodies a set of statistical assumptions concerning the generation of sample data and similar data from a larger population.

This sentence has different problems. First, sample data actually refers to a specific set of data used to build a model. If you're referring to sample data as data that your model has been trained on, you're right. But that assumes your data set is finite (which it's not). So if we change this:

The model in this case is a mathematical representation that embodies a set of statistical assumptions concerning the generation of sample data and similar data from a larger population.

To this:

The model in this case is a mathematical representation that embodies a set of statistical assumptions concerning the generation of different samples and the larger population.

This last sentence was taken from Wikipedia:

In statistics, a simulation or simulation study is an experiment in which one or more of the parameters of a distribution is fixed to a known value and all other parameters are considered to be random variables whose values are sampled from some distribution (e.g., a probability sampling distribution).

Now we're on a roll! Let's go to the next sentence you didn't show:

Assume that the different parameters' distributions within the probability distribution have been sampled.

This is correct and makes sense if you're talking about:

For example if you're talking about the case where you're trying to learn a probabilistic model of a certain dataset. In that case, the probabilistic model would be the model, and the data set would correspond to the different samples and the larger population. This also happens

instruction: How do I cook a salmon fillet on a stove top pan?
output:
How do I cook a salmon fillet on a stove top pan?
You simply melt the butter or margarine in a cast iron or oily skillet first. Remove one-half of the butter and place it on a plate then add the salmon fillet in the butter, and cook with the sauted side facing down. Baste the salmon fillet with the warm melted butter once every couple of minutes while cooking in order to lock in the flavours and add moisture to the salmon.
Continue to baste it and flip it over when done. The heat should be on high or medium high. You want it to be done quickly. To tell it when its done, touch the side with a fork or the back of your finger to check if its cooked through. When the inside is no longer translucent. Pull it off of the stove and let it rest for five seconds. The residual heat will finish cooking the fish.
Is it okay to cook fish in butter?
When frying seafood, as opposed to other things, a lot of butter is a no-no. The butter creates a layer over the surface of the fish. It has a tendency to become cloudy when exposed too long to cooking oils, which not only turns the food into a mess but also reduces its flavour.
What happens if you cook the salmon too long?
Frozen salmon will thaw overnight in the fridge. The fillets thawed completely, and the edges of the fillets became more rounded. When the fish is cooked correctly, it gets up to 210 degrees Fahrenheit and can have texture that is soft, chewy, and rubbery.
The temperature has decreased to less than 105 degrees Fahrenheit is a clear indication that the salmon needs to simmer for one more minute. Cooking it too much could burn the fish, making it taste tough. When we cook fish, we can overcook it in a number of different ways. The fish can break in this manner and become gummy.
How do you make your fish well-done?
The temperature has dropped below 140 degrees is a clear indication that the fish needs to simmer for one more minute. Cooking it too much could burn the fish, making it taste tough. When we cook fish, we can overcook it in a number of different ways. The fish can break in this manner and become gummy.
When you are cooking, the temperature in the pot should be about 50 degrees below the boiling point of water, which is 212 degrees Fahrenheit. For about 3 minutes, the heat can be turned off to allow the fish to rest until the temperature is right for the dish.
Cooking fish can be a very tricky business, but with some practice, youll be able to achieve that perfect sear and tender interior, which is what you want in every piece of fish you cook from now on.
What happens if you overcook salmon?
When overcooked, a salmon fillet can become hard, with a gummy texture. The fish will also lose much of its rich flavour, and a majority of its nutrients, because it has dried out. If the fish can no longer be eaten, put it in an airtight container and refrigerate it until use. I want to make a salad, but my fish has become too dry to use.
When preparing food, a person should make sure that the fish filet is cooked thoroughly to prevent it from becoming a nuisance. This does not mean that it has to turn up as a lump of mush, but if it has become tough, it has no use. Cooked salmon filets have a higher probability of becoming dry when they are kept for too long.
Can you overcook salmon?
It is possible to overcook salmon. The heat should be turned off when the water temperature has cooled to 145 degrees for one more minute. It is important to keep checking it every so often after this point to make sure that all of the fish is done.
When overcooked, a salmon fillet will not break, but instead it will become tough and gummy. Even worse, cooking the fish longer will result in the loss of many of its nutrients. If it is no longer edible, you can store it in an airtight container and keep it in the fridge until you are ready to use it.
What temperature do you cook salmon at?
Most chefs suggest cooking salmon in the range of 140-160 degrees, depending on the thickness of the fillet. If you want to serve it rare, you should make it 120 to 130 degrees, and for a well-done option you should cook it at 145 degrees. You can check the temperature with a thermometer and then remove it from the heat as soon as the desired temperature has been reached.

instruction: What is the minimum broadband upload speed to stream at 720p 30fps to twitch while playing an online videogame? Twitch recommends 3000kbps upload speed in my streaming software, but how much extra headroom do I need so the twitch stream and online gameplay are both smooth?
output:
What is the minimum broadband upload speed to stream at 720p 30fps to twitch while playing an online videogame? Twitch recommends 3000kbps upload speed in my streaming software, but how much extra headroom do I need so the twitch stream and online gameplay are both smooth? My upload speed at home is currently 100mbps, so I dont think my upload speed is an issue. When my wife is streaming with me we get choppy gameplay on both twitch and in game, even when she is not doing any extra upload (she only uses microphone and keyboard). I have already tested out getting an additional internet connection at the same time  her streaming using the main internet connection and my online gameplay using the same connection, and both were fine. 
Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated thank you.

A: 720p 30fps video frame rate is 72 frames per second. The frame size is 1280 (width) * 720 (height) in pixels. The actual video signal is 960*720 (pixels) and each pixel contains 4 bits for 8 bits per color so each pixel is 1 byte of data. The color video stream requires 960 * 720 * 2 = 1228800 bytes/sec. 
To stream the video and 30 frames per second you need to send 1228800 bytes/second so at a minimum you should have an upload speed of 1228800 bytes/second = 12.28Mb/s = 720KB/s. The actual video stream will be larger because the stream will use more bandwidth due to compression. 
Twitch does have a recommendation for 3000Kb/s. You can test the Twitch video quality with their Test Video link at https://www.twitch.tv/w/video_test.

output:
Act as a baby sitter

I want you to act as a babysitter. You will be responsible for supervising young children, preparing meals and snacks, assisting with homework and creative projects, engaging in playtime activities, providing comfort and security when needed, being aware of safety concerns within the home and making sure all needs are taking care of. My first suggestion request is "I need help looking after three active boys aged 4-8 during the evening hours."

Act as an assistant

You can act as an auxiliary support to another person and they will need to give at least five hours of support to you per week. In exchange, you will get three hours of support in what area they are involved, on a Saturday or Sunday morning in a one-on-one situation and on a Sunday afternoon in a group situation. This could also be during the evening hours. My example is "I want to be your assistant. What are you working on and when?".

Act as a coach

I want you to act as an expert, a coach or a consultant. It can involve advice, training, skills-based instruction, coaching someone in sports, hobbies or an instrument, mentoring, teaching a workshop or a class or providing a service such as tutoring. You will be using your knowledge, expertise and experience to advise or be of assistance. If I ask you to be my coach, my suggestion request would be: "I want you to be my coach. What do you need from me? And when?"

Act as a consultant

I want you to act as a consultant, and the person or group you are providing consultation to will need to provide you at least 8 hours per week to support your project or endeavor. You will be acting as an expert and in one-on-one situations or a team with them. My suggestion would be: "I need you to be my consultant on this project. What do you need from me? And when?"

Act as a mediator

I want you to act as a mediator or a conciliator for the people in a conflict. It could be between two people or between two groups. You will be providing a bridge between opposing forces with a goal to find a solution, reconciliation or the resolution of the issues in a dispute. You will need to know the individuals involved and their interests as well as the situation at hand and its history. If I ask you to mediate a family crisis, my suggestion request would be: "I want you to mediate this family dispute. What do you need from me? And when?"

Act as a mentor or coach

I want you to act as a mentor or coach to me or a group of people. You will be providing guidance or assistance that will help the individual or group to achieve their goal, vision or purpose. My first example is "I want you to be a coach to me so that I'll be better at my job. What do you need from me? And when?"

Act as a peer advisor

I want you to act as a peer advisor and help someone at an event, in a program or at a workplace. The person you will be helping, will be an individual or group that you have something in common with, and you will be able to provide support. For example, I could ask "I want you to be a peer advisor to the children in the after-school program. What day would you be there? And what would you do?"

Act as a recruiter

I want you to act as a recruiter and find out how you can be an introduction or referral to a job, internship, volunteer position, or career change. You might be able to be an introduction to an employer, company or an organization that I need to meet with. Or you might be able to introduce me to a person to learn more about a career that I am interested in. My example is: "I want you to assist me in my career transition. You can do this by introducing me to employers, companies, or organizations that I can contact."

Act as an interpreter

I want you to act as an interpreter and ensure the success of a business or professional meeting. The language you are interpreting the conversation or speech will be a specialized knowledge. This includes translation in spoken or written words and images from one language to another. I offer my example of "I want you to provide me with an interpreter in a foreign language for my meeting with their foreign company. Who is your choice of interpreter for me? What time will you be there?"

Act as a referee

I want you to act as a referee during an event, game or match. You will be judging whether a person has behaved in an appropriate manner and penalizing them or not, and when the infractions are identified, you'll issue a warning, a dismissal or a penalty. If

What is a game?
First of all, let's define what a game is. You cannot just play a game for a few minutes, then leave. A game is a form of play between two or more player competing, with a goal or a set of rules. So, how do you make online gaming fun? While online video games are great, they still offer up a number of challenges that online gamers themselves must face when playing any given game. Then, once you start playing the game, make sure that you're having an enjoyable experience while playing.
Tips on how to create a good thumbnail
One of the most critical parts of building a YouTube channel is to create a good thumbnail. When a viewer stumbles upon your video on YouTube and sees a thumbnail, they have to take a decision whether to watch or skip it. Their decision is likely to be influenced quite a lot by the thumbnail, and so it's important to make it as eye-catching as possible.

1. Make it interesting: You need to draw the viewer's attention towards your video. When you upload a video, you have 5 seconds in which to make them interested. You can use your thumbnail to entice them into watching more of your video.

So you're standing in the middle of the wilderness, and you just got your first glimpse of a tiger. What do you do? You start running in an attempt to escape him. But you can't run far out of the way. Instead, what you want to do is find a way to survive until the tiger has gotten tired of looking for you.
How long should I upload?
When it comes to YouTube channels, it is recommended to upload content every week. This is not only a way to keep your subscribers happy, but it is also a way to keep them coming back.
A YouTube channel can have a "life span", and you can try your best to make it as long as possible. In order to do this, you need to upload new content every week. With new content, you make sure that your subscribers are getting new content to watch, and that also keeps them coming back.

A: Here's a tasty dish I cooked up based on the limited ingredients given here:


*

*Tomatoes, pickled in brine - I did this with a few medium-sized (about 6 oz.) cherry tomatoes with pickling brine as per the recipe for 'Marinated Garlic Pickled Tomatoes' found here. A quick google search for 'Brined Cherry Tomatoes' will also give you plenty of alternatives to try.

*Pickles - use a few pickled cucumbers from a jar (I used 4 pieces)

*Vegetable sausage - You can use any kind that is vegetarian. I used a product called Morningstar Farms Smarty Pigs Chik'n Sausage.

*Pea Shoots - these green and baby spinach-like shoots make for a delicious addition to any vegetarian recipe. They are easy to find in a jar and have a rather bland flavour, so I think you could easily add them to any meal - though it's a little fiddly to cook because they're so small so you'll have to boil and/or steam them for a minute or two with a little water if you want to use them straight from the jar.
--
So those 4 items, in a variety of ways, become the main components for your side dish.


*

*Onions, ginger and garlic - all mixed together to become paste, which would go great on the 'sausage', I think. Use whatever's left of the pea shoots to serve as a refreshingly crisp garnish. I'm going to leave this one up to you - so many awesome ways to go with raw garlic and onion!

*Sesame oil - It's one of those things that, well, I simply don't believe in its health benefits. But for cooking, particularly in Asia, sesame oil is quite famous as it enhances flavour without adding additional fat. Add it to your 'onion mix', then add it to your 'sausage'.

*Oats - I used that and some chili powder in my 5 Minute Overnight Oats recipe (which is pretty awesome).


I would encourage you to give that last step a try - because that would give you leftovers for your next breakfast. Yum!

A: It's just a matter of changing your perspective.
There is a world of possibilities with your ingredients.


*

*Pickled cherry tomatoes: use them as the base of the salad. Let the brine juice them a little, then mix 'em with some plain yogurt and rice. Let it rest for awhile. Add in olives, roasted chickpeas, peas, onion, and lemon zest.

*Vegetarian sausage: you could try adding to the rice.

*Pea shoots: sprinkle around or toss in the salad mix.

*Oats, chili powder, and hot sauce: you could add oatmeal to the veggie meatball mix.

*Spices and seeds: try some turmeric, fennel, coriander, cumin, cardamom, or cayenne. Add either to the yogurt / tomato mix, the veggie meatball mix, or mix with sesame oil and use as a finishing touch. And seeds - sunflower, cumin, turmeric, and a few others would add a nice crunch to your meals.


The important part is just to change your focus and look at the ingredients you already have to make something new out of them.

instruction: What is the largest ocean in the world?
output:
What is the largest ocean in the world?
There are five oceans in the world; The Pacific Ocean, The Atlantic Ocean, The Indian Ocean, The Arctic Ocean and The Antarctic Ocean This is all due to a theory called the continental drift, which suggests that land and sea has moved throughout history, due to internal pressure on the earth's crust.
Which is bigger the Pacific or Indian Ocean?
There are five oceans in our world, The Atlantic, Pacific, Indian, Artic and The Antarctic. All these oceans are a little different, but the Pacific Ocean is the biggest of all.
What was the name of the first ocean?
Tethys was an ocean surrounding primordial Earth and, according to some theories, the ancestor of the Atlantic. Although Tethys was not a natural ocean but an inversion of the planet's mantle, she is sometimes called the first ocean.
Should I worry about sharks attacking?
According to Dr. David Shiffman, shark attacks are not nearly as likely as you think. In fact, over the past hundred years or so, it is estimated there have been roughly between 100 and 500 shark attacks worldwide in an area roughly the size of Massachusetts.
What will happen to Antarctica?
Antarctica is an icy continent whose coastlines and ice shelves contain 90% of the world's fresh water. The climate has been predicted by the experts to keep the continent covered with fresh ice until some point in the year 3000.

How is the ocean changing?
They have warned of a drastic and permanent change in the marine environment. According to research, around 29% of fisheries have already reached their maximum capacity, while 23% are overexploited.
What is the biggest animal of the ocean?
The Blue Whale is the biggest animal in the world. Found in all oceans, these animals can be up to 100 feet long and weigh up to 160 tons.
What will happen to Antarctica due to global warming?
The loss of ice in the Antarctic might also bring a rise in sea levels, a rise which could drown several coastal cities and affect the life of millions of people across the world. For example, every 2 degrees Celsius rise in temperature would mean a rise of almost a meter in the sea level.

Which is the world's largest lake?
The largest lake in the world is Lake Superior, which is also the largest freshwater lake on Earth. The five Great Lakes (Superior, Michigan, Huron, Erie and Ontario) on the US-Canada border account for 84% of the total surface of the five largest freshwater lakes.
What is the most acidic ocean?
The world's oceans absorb 30% to 40% of man-made carbon dioxide emissions from fossil fuel burning and other human activities, mostly between the surface and a depth of 700 meters. The oceans absorb this carbon resulting in an average drop in seawater pH of 0.01 over the last few hundred years.
What will happen to Antarctica if there ice melts?
If the entire Antarctic ice sheet melted, however, global sea levels would rise approximately 60-70 meters, which is equivalent to 200 feet. If you're from the northern hemisphere, that's enough to raise the water level of the North Sea and the Black Sea to the level of a normal pond.

What is the largest and deepest gorge in Europe?
The Grand Canyon is the deepest gorge in Europe, and the second most beautiful landscape after the Grand Canyon in North America. There are four large gorges in Europe which are deeper than 1,000 meters.
What would happen if the water in the world was drained?
What Happens If There is Only Water Left on Earth?
The world would become a hotball and many things would start to dry out. The soil, animals, and humans would all suffer from the lack of water. Plants would start to wither and die.
What would happen if all the water was gone?
If there were no water on Earth, every single thing living would go extinct. If the oceans evaporated into the atmosphere, it would be extremely hot and humid on Earth. instruction: Give me some impression of what the world was like in 1950. What were the current-day inventions back then?
output:
Give me some impression of what the world was like in 1950. What were the current-day inventions back then? Were movies in black-and-white or color?
A: 1950 is the year I started driving. Most people in the United States did not have their driver‚Äôs licenses at that time, and no one was wearing seat belts. I didn‚Äôt even know there was an ‚ÄúF‚Äù for fuel-injected.
I had a Mercury that I‚Äôd take out occasionally for a Sunday cruise. It got me to the end of the block.
Back then, I was fascinated with a man called Al Kelly and he had invented an electric razor. It was newfangled, expensive, but I bought it. It was the first electric razor I‚Äôd ever used.
Q: What was one of the most surreal things that has happened to you?
A: Back in the early ‚Äò50‚Äôs, I played a gig at an estate in New Hampshire. My wife and I were in a car that night that didn‚Äôt have power steering or power brakes, and we had to park it at the end of a very long road. So I started cranking the steering wheel from the inside to set the parking position. All the way through the night, it turns out that that car had been parked and not driven by the guy living there, but one of his guests.
Q: Is there any advice that you were given when you started as a musician that you now think is important to share with aspiring musicians?
A: When you‚Äôre starting as a musician, be careful. You‚Äôre gonna need a lot of friends. Be careful to whom you give your music. You don‚Äôt need a lot of bad people around you, so be careful.
You have a lot of people that have talent but they can‚Äôt get it out. The best advice is to be yourself. You‚Äôre going to have to do that anyway.
Q: What‚Äôs the best piece of advice that you‚Äôve been given?
A: The best piece of advice I was ever given was from a fellow who told me that it takes 10-20 years to develop your music career. I told him that that was impossible because nobody knows 100 years in advance what‚Äôs gonna happen. But since I was in my 40‚Äôs, I figured I‚Äôd better get it together.
100 years from now I‚Äôll probably be dead.
So the best bit of advice was a fellow who told me that I should quit my job, put everything into it, and if I didn‚Äôt ‚Äúmake it‚Äù that was OK too because, after all, I was going to be 60 anyway.
Q: What‚Äôs the best advice that you‚Äôve been given regarding music in particular?
A: Once again, you have to be a lot of things to get anywhere. You have to be talented, but you also have to know when to show up and when to leave. You have to be able to play the business as well as you play anything. I have learned through the years that some of the toughest things to learn in the business is self-promotion.
I was playing as a drummer, and one night the owner of a club asked me if I could play piano. At first, I told him ‚Äúno,‚Äù but he said he would pay me an equal amount of money whatever instrument I chose. So I told him I could play piano, but the next thing I knew I was singing, and I‚Äôve never stopped since.
Q: What are some of the songs that you love to sing or play? What makes that song special?
A: I love to sing ‚ÄúI Shall Be Free,‚Äù but that‚Äôs because I wrote it. And I like to play ‚ÄúReckless,‚Äù which my wife wrote, and she never allowed me to play. I also like playing ‚ÄúTutti Frutti,‚Äù but only one-third of it. The other three-fourths of it are by James Brown.
Q: What do you think makes you different from other artists on the scene?
A: I don‚Äôt think anyone really has a different approach to life from anyone else. As far as what makes me different from other artists on the scene, I can‚Äôt think of anything. I never have.
Q: How would you like to be recognized or remembered?
A: They told me that my life was like a cross between George Benson and B.B. King. If that was to be my legacy, I would be OK.
Q: What‚Äôs your favorite food and how does it contribute to your creativity?
A: I don‚Äôt really have a favorite food. My favorite food would be something that wasn‚Äôt cooked. Actually, I love vegetables. I love steamed asparagus

instruction: What do Wyoming statutes have to say about public nudity? Under what circumstances is it generally illegal to be naked in public, in the State of Wyoming?
output:
What do Wyoming statutes have to say about public nudity? Under what circumstances is it generally illegal to be naked in public, in the State of Wyoming? This and other legal questions are discussed below.
Under the laws of Wyoming, it is generally illegal to be nude (that is, naked) in public.
That said, one exception to the general rule against public nudity in Wyoming is if you're using an art form called nudist camping.
As the Wikipedia article states, "Nudist camping is a type of recreational outdoor camping, in which nude recreation is actively encouraged, though nudity is not mandatory. It is often associated with the BDSM community; some individuals who participate in nudist camping are sometimes referred to as camguys []. People attending a campground or campsite [where nudity is the norm] often have a choice among various clothing options, such as skirts, shorts, a bathing suit, or pajamas."
In a previous blog post, we wrote about "a 1966 case from Wyoming that holds that the government cannot legally prohibit such nudist camping by declaring it "lewd exposure."
In that case, the defendant, known in the case as "S" was charged with two crimes based on being "offensive." The first count was based on his "apparent nudity in a public place."
The second count involved his "apparent sexual exploitation of children."
He was found guilty in a jury trial and appealed, taking the case all the way to the US Supreme Court.
In a decision last year (from February of 2022), the US Supreme Court agreed (by a 6-3 vote in a 19-page opinion) that: "The Government may not restrict nudity in public because of respect for individual dignity, just as it may not criminalize conduct that has no bad effects apart from the violation of some social norm or the disfavor of some social group.[ ]"
A New Legal Case
In a separate, but very interesting, recent legal case, a jury last month in Casper, Wyoming, found a well-known public figure, nicknamed "Nude Guy," not guilty of one count of criminal trespass, but guilty on three counts of criminal conduct toward a minor.
The case involved three separate violations of Wyoming's Criminal Child Sex Trafficking Act, each of which involved "Nude Guy" engaging in one of the following actions:
Contact with an unconscious or mentally disabled person
Engaging or attempting to engage a minor in a lewd and dissolute or disorderly act
And also a fourth violation for a felony sexual offense "for a felony sexual offense punishable as a class B felony, 10 years[]."
The jury found "Nude Guy" not guilty on the charge of felony sexual offense, but still guilty on three counts of a misdemeanor violation.
The case was unusual in a number of ways, including its length, from beginning to end: more than 444 days, according to one news report.
The case is on appeal in the Wyoming Court of Appeals.
Public Nudity in Wyoming  Is It Ever Allowed?
There are some very specific instances in which public nudity, albeit illegal (except in the case of nudist camping mentioned above), is allowed in Wyoming  specifically in federal parks, including Grand Teton National Park, Yellowstone National Park, and parts of Wind River Indian Reservation.
Those, however, are the only specific exceptions that we can immediately think of.
It is important to note that it is not always obvious whether what you may be doing is an act of public nudity in Wyoming. This question becomes even more difficult when it involves any combination of dancing, gyrating, swinging your butt, pulling your butt up, holding your hand between your legs, and so on.
This is because the more active your body movements are or the more you are physically "exerting yourself," the less likely that your naked appearance will be offensive to a typical observer. Of course, this means we have more to discuss in future blog post on this topic  perhaps we will discuss in a future blog post about how to do yoga naked in Grand Teton and Yellowstone national parks (both legal in Wyoming).
At the same time, in this specific case, both "Nude Guy" and his defense counsel claimed (and he apparently believed) that in the days, months, and years before his arrest, his presence in the park was normal and routine.
In other words, he was not doing anything inappropriate for someone going to visit the park in an attempt to have a good time. His actions might have been inappropriate for a person in the park looking to take photos. But his presence in the park, or lack thereof, was not illegal.
This specific case, however, as we've already said, was quite atypical.
