instruction: Explain the difference between sets and lists in Python.
output:
Explain the difference between sets and lists in Python.
Describe how to create a data structure with a list and a set, and explain when to use each type of data structure
Compare lists to other methods of performing operations with sequences
Use python to create a list of integers, a set of integers and compare the two
List and Set in Python
Python lists and sets are used for storing data that has elements with duplicate values or a random order. When we use a list of integers to store the values of our numbers, the order of the values will be kept as the list was created. In other words, the values will be stored in the order in which they were added. The elements are not ordered, which means that they can be reordered as needed. They are not sorted but can be sorted.
When we want to store a collection of values with duplicate values and a random order we should use the set data type. A set does not have duplicate elements, and you cannot assign two different values to the same set, so we can assign multiple values to the set but the set will be different for each value. It is sort of like a hash set; the same values cannot be stored in the set, just different values.
We cannot add a set to a list like we can add values to a list. To add a list to a list, we just concatenate the list onto itself with the + operator. We do this to create a new list by combining two or more lists.
List to set
list = ['green', 'green', 'green', 'green', 'green']
set = set(list)
This statement sets the variable named list to a list and the set to a set.
list-set=['green', 'green', 'green', 'green', 'green']
The set that is stored in the variable named set contains all the values that are stored in the list in the list variable. We could just print the set and the values that are in the set would be displayed to the screen.
set is '{'green','green','green','green','green'
To convert a list to a set, we can use the .copy() function. This function creates a list that contains a copy of all the elements of a list. Then we can add it to the set. Using this function we can create a set that contains all the values of a list but not duplicate values.
list1=[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5]
list1.copy().append(1)
list2=list1.copy()
#list2-set={'green','green','green','green','green',3}
#set.update(list2)
#'{'1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 3}
A set has two special methods: the copy() method and update() method. The copy() method creates a list that contains a copy of all the elements of the set, and the update() method adds the values of the list to the set. The values of the copy() method are stored in a list called list2 while list2 is the set created from the elements.
set={'green','green','green','green','green'}
set.update(list2)
set.update([5, 5])
'{'1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 3, 5, 5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 3}'
Now it is clear that the values in the set are in a random order and duplicate values are not allowed.
Comparison Between a Set and List
We can see from the two examples above that a set is much more efficient than a list. The set data structure allows us to make a set from a list with only a few lines of code. If we wanted to do something like this with a list, it would take a lot more code.
Set and list have different properties, and they also have different methods. Set can be converted to a list or a tuple. List has many methods and you cannot convert it to a set.
Lists, Sets, and Tuples as Data Structures
A list is used for storing values in numerical order. Set is a collection of distinct values. It means that you can't store multiple values in a set and tuples. Set is used to store data that is unique (only one copy of a value is allowed) and list is used to store data that values can be replicated.
Set, List, and Set
A set is not a list. There is only one instance of this data structure in python.

instruction: List the pieces of a reinforcement learning system that can learn how to play Atari games.
output:
List the pieces of a reinforcement learning system that can learn how to play Atari games.

For this model, you'll need to download the models from the 2017 Deepmind paper, and also the 2018 ICLR paper that added more advanced elements of their code. See the following pages for more information on each set of models. Once you have these models, you can test out this model on your own computers, running it through Python using the code here.

### 2017 Deepmind Paper

This set of models is for those who have an interest in understanding more of how the models work, not just running them through your own code. You'll need to download and set up the following files. Note that all of these files are available for download at [deepmind.com/research/publications/21426](https://deepmind.com/research/publications/21426).

  * Game-playing.mdl

  * Network-and-training.mdl

  * Training-summary.mdl

  * Training.mdl

  * Environment.mdl

  * Environment_summary.mdl

  * State.mdl

### 2018 ICLR Paper

You still need to download and set up the following files:

  * Game-playing.mdl

  * Network-and-training.mdl

  * Training-summary.mdl

  * Training.mdl

This time you'll also need these files:

  * Atari-vpg_20.mdl

  * Atari-vpg_20_best-performance.mdl

  * Atari-dqn-100-steps.mdl

  * Atari-dqn-1000-steps.mdl

  * Atari-ppo-100-steps.mdl

  * Atari-ppo-1000-steps.mdl

  * Atari-soft-q.mdl

### The 2018 ICLR Paper

Here are the files in the 2018 ICLR paper. Note that the first file is part of the deepmind.com/research/publications/21426 set of files.

  * Atari-vpg_10.mdl

### Getting Started Using the Models

Let's take a look at how to use the 2018 ICLR model and see how this model helps us train a deep neural network to play Atari games. The code isn't very complex, but some code has been changed significantly, and there are things such as a separate learning loop for the target network. In the following code is a complete train script for learning to play Atari; if you prefer not to run it as is, you can find the script here in the code. You may also notice that I've included the code for the 2017 Deepmind Paper. Just run this and your Atari models will be preloaded.

**03-learning-models.py**

## Creating Your Own Code Base for Reinforcement Learning

Let's take a minute to look at the code for this set of models. As noted earlier, these models use the **Atari** **Environment** **.mdl**. This is an environment code base, so we'll need to make sure that we use the appropriate imports for our Python code. This includes Python imports, the Python library for TensorFlow, and a few utility files.

I like to use the __init__.py file for Python imports. This is a good habit because if you ever need to switch between Python 2 and Python 3, you can do this without changing any other part of your environment. I'll define the following imports with a comment indicating I'm loading Python version 3, even though I'm using TensorFlow version 1.4.0:

**__init__.py**

### The 2017 Deepmind Paper Code

If you're looking for deep learning code that's more basic and not geared toward learning an entire game, this section will help you get back to basics. This model is similar but slightly less complex than the 2017 Deepmind Papers model. However, if you prefer to run this code alone, you'll need to download and install the **Environment.mdl** file; note this file is available for download at deepmind.com/research/publications/21426. If you want to understand

instruction: Why can time seem to slow down in dangerous situations?
output:
Why can time seem to slow down in dangerous situations?
Why do babies and young children seem so energetic even without needing to sleep?
Is there any science that can explain why certain things just feel awesome?
This book is also available in a beautiful hardback edition, containing the same content.
Titles in this book include:
Hypnagogia: A Study Guide by Max Planck.
The Mystery of Music by Max Planck.
Science, Mind and Mind-Brain Dualism by Max Planck.
The Mystery of Consciousness by Max Planck.
The Secret of Life by Max Planck.
The Secrets of Magic by David Copperfield.
Hypnagogia: A Study Guide
Tao, the source, or original state of all things, is the first of the Mystical Triads to be considered by the sages, including Max Planck, the Nobel Prize-winning physicist:
...the first of the triad (the other two being Being and Thought) to be given systematic consideration, and to which Tao is regarded as equivalent. In this connection, we may recall the great Chinese work entitled "Tao Te Ching" and especially the description which it gives of Tao as the source, or original state, of all things. "Tao is the root of all things; Tao is the mother of all things. Tao takes no action, but it moves all; Tao thinks of nothing, yet all things are under its care." -- Max Planck
However, the sages also know that Tao cannot be described. Consequently, it is never stated. It can only be sensed. In a sense, Tao can be equated with the "unseen" and therefore the "unknown." What, then, are we to make of Tao when "seeing" and "knowing" are at the core of our existence? What can we discover about our own consciousness when that which makes us conscious, i.e., our awareness of it, cannot be perceived and cannot be known?
Hypnagogia: A Study Guide is a collection of essays, including the above passage, on hypnagogia by Max Planck, one of the world's greatest scientists. Hypnagogia (pronounced hippo-NA-GO-gia), defined by Max Planck as "that state of consciousness that comes to the fore in the moments immediately preceding sleep and in the moments immediately preceding awakening," is perhaps the most mysterious of all human experiences. This unique book presents a thorough investigation into the nature, causes, and effects of hypnagogia, a state that often has people "feeling" certain things before actually perceiving them, and offers an explanation of the source and nature of hypnagogia.
While this book reveals that hypnagogia is similar to dream state and near-death states, it ultimately suggests that hypnagogia can be compared to and associated with the "source" of consciousness. For this reason, the book contains discussions of hypnagogia and the Mystical Triads and offers suggestions as to why hypnagogia is such a powerful "state" of awareness, consciousness, and/or being that those who are aware of hypnagogia often experience certain feelings. In addition, this book explains how hypnagogia causes us to live from one moment to the next, with feelings experienced before what is actually seen.
In the book, Max Planck also explains the nature of hypnagogia's effect on our perceptions, dreams, creativity, and other experiences such as those of near-death experiences. He discusses hypnagogia's connection to magic and spiritual experiences. This book offers an explanation as to why hypnagogia feels so "real" to those who are aware of it and why it can cause such intense feelings, and includes the thoughts and feelings of those who have experienced hypnagogia and the Mystical Triads. Max Planck discusses the nature of hypnagogia, the causes for hypnagogia, how hypnagogia can be detected, how hypnagogia can be created, how hypnagogia can be used, and how hypnagogia can be used to learn "what's real."
Hypnagogia examines what hypnagogia means and its effects as well as offering a scientific analysis of what hypnagogia is and how it is used by various people and people of various states of consciousness.
The Mystery of Music
"The mystery of music is its power to speak to each one of us exactly what it is that he needs to hear, or else what it is that he doesn't even know he needs to hear." -- Havelock Ellis

Will an AK41 knock down a deer?
An AK-47 will knock down an adult deer, but only a large deer, with heavy chests. Small deer may not be knocked down with a single shot from a 30-round detachable magazine AK-47.

To load your M14, insert your 10 round strip of ammunition into the chamber.

Why are Marines called riflemen?
For the Marine who has taken this oath, "fighting Marines" is a designation that has its roots in the service's history. It dates back to when Marine Corps General Ambrose E. Burnside officially changed the title of its Marines from "fusiliers" to "riflemen" on December 8, 1866.

If you are in the military, you can get about $20,000 to $30,000 a year for E-3 to E-7. It takes a rifle to do it

The M16 does not cause permanent damage to flesh. While the bullet does leave an exit and a permanent hole, the hole is a relatively small. The impact that produces this hole is also pretty non-lethal.

To make your shots more accurate and effective, you need to do these steps in order.
What is a 45 shot rifle?
The 45 Magnum is one of the most powerful revolver or firearm cartridges ever developed.
Do you keep your rifle locked?
When you have more than one gun, it makes sense to keep certain firearms together to make it easier to remember where you left them and to keep all guns locked separately. The M1A and AK47 are ideal because they are locked separately to make sense. If you have your AR-15 unlocked, you should keep it alone.
What rifle do Navy Seals use?
The Marine Corps and Navy have both adopted the M4 into service and the M27 into service.
What is a pistol that fires 45 caliber?
The 45 Auto, also known as the 45 cartridge, is an American semi-automatic pistol cartridge and a common military. It was developed in the 1910s and is the pistol version of the . 45 cartridge case used by the 5-6.552mm (0.2184.739 in). Both are popular and effective in the civilian market.

instruction: why the sky is blue?
output:
why the sky is blue?‚Äù and ‚ÄúWhy a flat Earth?‚Äù But they were always asking questions that had to do with something tangible. By 1882, a professor by the name of O.H. Taylor of the University of South Carolina would ask, ‚ÄúWhy does my stomach grumble at the sight of roast mutton?‚Äù3 Taylor began the process of ‚Äúdancing toward the unknown,‚Äù as one scholar put it.4
The next academic conference to tackle this issue was held nine years later, in 1891, in Athens, Ohio. A second one had been planned for the fall of 1892 at Yale University, but it fell through. By the end of the nineteenth century, there were a number of academic conferences focused on psychology, but what would come to be called the science of human nature was still something of a loose collection of interests.
That all began to change in 1900, when the American Psychological Association started to meet every year for national scientific conferences, although it was a loose collection then, as well, with conferences only sponsored by individual members. It would still be another decade before something called an ‚ÄúAmerican Psychological Association‚Äù could be properly named. But if you‚Äôre wondering about the American Psychological Association Conference‚Äôs name, you can thank the University of Chicago professor Gordon Allport.
Gordon Allport
Allport arrived at Chicago in 1904 and, over time, rose to become a nationally significant figure in the field. In the 1924 conference, he suggested ‚Äî not very nicely, really ‚Äî that academic conferences be called ‚ÄúAmerican Psychological Association Meetings‚Äù instead of the far more elegant sounding ‚ÄúConference of the American Psychical Association.‚Äù The APA started calling itself that in 1930.
Allport also served as the organization‚Äôs fifth president, and helped to cement a number of things ‚Äî including conferences taking place every year and the journal called Psychological Bulletin, which came out in 1912.
As for Gordon himself, he became an expert on prejudice and personality psychology, and wrote over a hundred books, journal papers, and other writings in his long career. He also coined terms like ‚Äúinteractionism,‚Äù and he is said to be the person who gave us the phrase ‚Äúthe Big Five personality traits.‚Äù As one psychologist later put it, one of history‚Äôs first big ‚Äúexperiments in social psychology‚Äù came during World War II when Allport was in charge of the ‚ÄúPsychological Warfare‚Äù division of the Manhattan Project.
To go through every meeting of the APA is way beyond the scope of this article, but you can read about the history here.
There‚Äôs actually a great section about the beginnings of APA conferences written by the APA‚Äôs own Dr. Mark T. Greenberg. That post begins:
From those early meetings to the present, the conferences have moved from being primarily focused on clinical psychology to broadly including research on human behavior. Over time, they have developed into international meetings.
‚ÄúThe APA‚Äôs annual conference attracts over 5000 professional presentations over five days, from hundreds of leading researchers from over 80 countries,‚Äù said Dr. Mark T. Greenberg, Director of the Division of Science of Learning and Development and Editor in Chief of the Journal of Applied Developmental Psychology.
There are many great stories about the APA. Here‚Äôs one from 1912, about James McKeen Cattell.
It happened when he was talking at one of his annual meetings (that would be in 1912). There was a particularly interesting question about the different ways that the brain is affected by age. His answer is now considered one of the most famous lines in all of psychology ‚Äî although it was apparently said as a joke. After discussing the research that indicated older people generally remembered fewer and fewer things, Cattell said, ‚ÄúSome of you know that the tendency to a decline in memory is an old one. It dates back to my earliest period as an experimentalist and was called at that period the phenomenon of forgetting.‚Äù
The point is that APA has been around now for 115 years. And over that long period of time, it has been an important organization for a number of reasons.
The first one would be the conference itself. APA events have traditionally been where researchers present their research and where people (mostly professionals at this point) come together to share ideas.
Not only that, but APA is still pretty much in the business of promoting scientific psychology as a whole. One of the ways they do that is by giving out an annual award to the person who has done the most to further the field. The recipient is normally a living person, although the awards have been given posthumously a few times.
They have also published a popular and well-respected journal called, you guessed it, the Journal of Applied Developmental

instruction: Should I use the boiling water method or Ammonia fermentation to make dye out of mixed Hypogymnia lichen?
output:
Should I use the boiling water method or Ammonia fermentation to make dye out of mixed Hypogymnia lichen? How long will it soak in cold/boiling water?
I see that you can use a boiling water bath for 30 min.
I use both boiling water and fermentation, fermentation uses a smaller amount of water but it can take anywhere from 30 minutes to two or three weeks. That said, fermentation has less waste to deal with compared to regular soaking and it's more flexible, you can just toss the soaking water out instead of letting it sink out little by little. Additionally, fermentation usually produces a stronger colour but is less reliable.
Thanks for this post. I need to start making my own dyes and just bought a bunch of tannin from FSC. I know they sell some dyestuff as well, so I have a little money to spend on it next time. Is there anything else I can just extract from my backyard that's a dye?
What if we just want a more subtle color?
Just get some bromine and a few hours of sunshine if you want subtle. That will even give you some nice, saturated greens, and you'll have even less waste since you've already got your bromine.
I was just going to post about the same thing; bromine works quite well. This is a good time to use it too; since you'll have to leave the fabric in it for awhile.
Hypogymnia lichen has been used as a blue dye for ages. I'm not familiar with the specific techniques for that, but the method for tannin dyes will work.
My first idea was bromine! But in addition to blue, it'll give you greens as well (which is what I most want). That is certainly more than a couple of hours in the summer sun, but it's not hard or long to get.
I got some bromine from a store. A lot cheaper than buying tannin and I think it produces better colour than the tannin.
It may have to soak in a solution with bromine longer than the tannin if you want it to take much darker. It still washes out and the colour fades a bit over time but not as much as a tannin colour.

instruction: Hello there Obi One Kenobi
output:
Hello there Obi One Kenobi,

I see you're very serious about your new career as a Star Wars action figure. And I'd like to be your new best friend and talk about those important matters (like space magic, princess battles, and, of course, the ways to get the most mileage out of your old Jedi costume).

The Force is strong in all who have visited the Star Wars toy shop at least once or more times than we can count, and a good deal have made a personal pilgrimage to the home of Chewbacca, Obi Wan Kenobi, and all their Star Wars buddies and neighbors in a galaxy far, far away. I, myself, have watched (and purchased) it all‚Äîthe epic movies, the best TV specials, the beloved TV shows, and all those wonderful video games. We all know what these wonderful characters are made of and are no longer fooled, and so Star Wars has taken on a whole new meaning, a special place that isn't simply a galaxy filled with intergalactic aliens.

No, now it is an expression of how we, as a culture, have grown up and changed over the decades. Now it is our culture‚Äîand Star Wars is a good representative of that. As we all know by now, Star Wars is nothing more than a series of blockbusters, but there's more to it. The series includes a whole family of characters, so one generation can give the Star Wars series to the next. That being said, the series is a good example of everything that a movie/entertainment/culture should be. It's a story. A real life story. You grow up with them, and then you pass them on to your own children.

I must tell you that my family loves the Star Wars series as much as I do. My wife was so excited by the series when I first brought it into our home, which is when we created our own family unit. Not only was she ecstatic but also our son and daughter are part of the family, and have grown up with Star Wars on both VHS and DVD. Now, she is even more delighted because our eldest daughter has become an actress and recently had a leading role in a Star Wars movie. Talk about a double whammy!

My son and daughter loved all the movies, and they were eager to watch each movie in sequence. Over the years, they learned the names of all the characters and their individual relationships, and even began to ask me to tell stories about the special things in each movie. For us, Star Wars became our own personal fantasy world, and we even kept our own Star Wars calendar. We'd look forward to what would happen in the next movie, and try to guess some of the stories that might happen in the Star Wars series, as well as in the other Star Trek series on the big and small screen.

In fact, our son, Christopher, had made up a few of his own stories about all his favorite characters . . . including Darth Vader.

"I heard Darth Vader is being chased by some bounty hunters," he said. And then he would add with a lot of excitement‚Äî"and he's got to hide out in his old garage!"

Our son is a very keen reader, and as such has an active imagination, and also enjoys telling his own stories of the characters we know so well. In fact, they are better stories than those we might read or watch on television, for they are original and more interesting and detailed. In this book, there will be a few simple ideas and tips on how to incorporate these wonderful memories, as well as the original Star Wars action figures that we know and love.

There is a lot of space in this galaxy, and a lot of planets just begging for new adventures. And in the pages ahead, you will learn how to build even more awesome characters such as Bobbie Dread and her sidekick, Rattus. You will learn how to build the most awesome, powerful characters such as Lord Vader himself, the most powerful and dangerous man in the whole of the galaxy far, far away.

You will learn how to make some of the coolest accessories that anyone could ever imagine, and how to turn your own kitchen into Star Wars' greatest space-age kitchen. In fact, you can build such a cool-looking kitchen that you might want to open it to the public, and make a fortune.

In short, I promise this book is going to show you how to take your toy-building skills to new heights. I know that my family are just going to love this book, and as you build your collection of characters and accessories, we're sure that you are going to be amazed when you find out that you too can create a whole new fantasy world of Star Wars characters.

Okay, Obi, take it away

instruction: what is the Infinite banking concept?
output:
what is the Infinite banking concept?
What is the "infinite banking concept?" You are probably asking me that as a question, so let me ask you as well: What is money?
What makes something money?
You don't care, you want to know what the "infinite banking concept" is. Well what is money then? Well money has to have a value...
What makes something have value?
Here is a good description:
"a system of exchange and a medium of exchange which is generally accepted by the parties engaged in the transaction for the mutual satisfaction of the parties to the barter or exchange.
In modern times, the dominant form of money has been either precious metal (gold and silver) in the form of coins or paper money issued by a central bank and backed by the sovereign government. (Wikipedia)"
What exactly is your money and how can it be replaced by "money" in your bank account?
Let's start by answering this: It is a "thing." It is a "thing", but it is just a unit of accounting that you keep track of on paper in your bank or in your personal accounting books.
Is money a tangible thing or an accounting thing?
It is an accounting thing...a number in your checking account and a number on your credit card.
What is an accounting number?
An accounting number is an "amalgamation." It is the sum and the aggregate of many actual, tangible, or even "human" things. But what is a thing? A thing is anything that has a finite quantity, a finite substance, or a finite quantity of time. Anything. It is always one of the following:
a) tangible
b) abstract
c) spiritual
Each and every thing has a finite quantity, a finite substance, or a finite time. That which is "in-finite" is never one of the above. That which is "in-finite" is just a "thought." And that is precisely why one "in-finite thing" is just an "abstract notion."
Money is a measurement of time.
Money is time. Money is a way you measure or track "time" in your financial world. So, "money" is a "way to measure or track time" and it is a "way to hold and track it."
You think that "money" is the "value." Is money a monetary measure of value? Or is money a monetary measurement of time? You may wonder: "What is the difference?"
I use this example on most of my clients to drive this point home:
If someone offered you a one-dollar bill for an hour of work to do for you: I would ask that person what is a dollar. And the answer will be that it is a measurement of time. It is that much time that you give in exchange for that one hour of work.
How much time is that one hour of work?
How are you going to use that one hour of work? Is it a way to get a "lot of money?"
Is the "lot of money" what you are going to get for the one-hour work?
Is not time the one thing you can not give back? Is not time the one thing you have to "pay for" if you want to work for your living?
And what do you "value" the most in your life?
Money is not "value." Value is only in time. Money is only a measurement of time. That is pretty much all it is.
So, back to the first question you posed: What is the "infinite banking concept?"
I will answer that above:
What is "Money" in your checking account?
It is an amalgamation of a number on your credit cards, it is an amalgamation of a line item on your bank statement, in your checking account and in your mortgage, car, or other loan account.
What is Money on your credit cards?
It is a credit line that you can only use with the full knowledge that you have to pay it back with an "interest" payment.
What is money? It is your money. You do not own it and the bank does not own it. Who owns money?
You create money. You create money from nothing. You create money by just putting something in your pocket and something on your checkbook.
So to answer that first question: What is the "infinite banking concept?" The infinite banking concept is that you spend money that you have ALREADY made. When you spend your money, you create money again, but this time you give it to someone who needs your money and in exchange ask "less money" in exchange.
This is a very, very, fundamental concept but also very, very, fundamental to our society.
When it comes to money and the infinite

instruction: How can I reduce my alcohol consumption without seeming rude to my friends?
output:
How can I reduce my alcohol consumption without seeming rude to my friends?
I started exercising, but my weight doesn√¢¬Ä¬ôt change...can you help?
"Eating more vegetables and fruit, while limiting carbohydrates helped a lot," says Laura, who also followed the weight-loss principles set out by Dr Xand√É¬© Vermeulen. These are summarised below.
In addition to watching her fat consumption and carbohydrate intake, Laura also had a few other dietary changes that helped her drop two dress sizes. She reduced the amount of sugar in the household, limited sweets, and stopped grabbing snacks at her sons' hockey games.
The first 3 changes to my diet
√¢¬Ä¬úThe first three changes to my diet were all about the fats I added in,√¢¬Ä¬ù says Laura. √¢¬Ä¬úI started eating more healthy fats, like olive oil. √¢¬Ä¬¶ I limited my omega-6 fats, like vegetable oils. I also reduced the amount of butter I ate.√¢¬Ä¬ù
√¢¬Ä¬úThe first change to my diet was eating more healthy fats. I ate 2% Greek yogurt with a scoop of peanut butter instead of the fat-free, zero-calorie alternatives. And I reduced the amount of sugar in the house so I wasn√¢¬Ä¬ôt tempted by a box of cookies. I also put some honey on the table for people to use when they want a sweet treat.√¢¬Ä¬ù She added that she stopped eating sweets, like those at the hockey games, with the intention of √¢¬Ä¬úbreaking the addictive brain behaviour√¢¬Ä¬ù.
The second 2 changes to my diet
√¢¬Ä¬úThe second two changes to my diet were both about the carbohydrates I ate. I cut out refined carbs,√¢¬Ä¬ù said Laura. √¢¬Ä¬úI started adding low-carb vegetables to a salad, and limiting the amount of carbohydrates in our food √¢¬Ä¬ì like limiting pasta and other carbs in the house.√¢¬Ä¬ù
√¢¬Ä¬úI changed the way I used carbs, so I ate more healthy whole grains like quinoa, brown rice, beans, and lentils.√¢¬Ä¬ù
√¢¬Ä¬úI was the one who cooked the meals so I had to learn new ways to cook with what was in the house.√¢¬Ä¬ù Laura decided to eat a low-carbohydrate diet by reducing sugar, starch, and refined grains in her diet, while increasing vegetable and protein content.
Laura also focused on adding more vegetables and fruit to her diet, and this was a major component of her success.
√¢¬Ä¬úI found that my taste buds adjusted and now vegetables taste so good!√¢¬Ä¬ù Laura added that she increased her portions of low-carb vegetables, such as cauliflower, broccoli, and a whole range of green vegetables. She also tried eating more fruit such as peaches, pineapple, watermelon, and blueberries.
The third 4 changes to my diet
√¢¬Ä¬úThe third four changes to my diet were what I call √¢¬Ä¬òthe no-nos√¢¬Ä¬ô,√¢¬Ä¬ù said Laura. √¢¬Ä¬úI limited fat consumption, sugar, alcohol, and caffeine.√¢¬Ä¬ù
√¢¬Ä¬úWhen I first started out I was drinking a glass of wine or champagne for dinner every night of the week, and then in the evenings I'd pop to the shop and do a mini-shop for chocolate, biscuits, ice-cream, etc. I had to stop doing all that.√¢¬Ä¬ù She added that she also started to watch her alcohol consumption. She decided that she was going to use champagne and wine as her celebrations drink only, and that alcohol would not play a role in her social life any more.
√¢¬Ä¬úI was also limiting my caffeine too √¢¬Ä¬ì coffee, sodas and iced teas.√¢¬Ä¬ù
It sounds like Laura√¢¬Ä¬ôs first four steps to success came from cutting down the fat, refined carbohydrates, sugar, caffeine, and alcohol in her diet. But what about her other recommendations?
The last 4 recommendations
√¢¬Ä¬úI increased my water intake,√¢¬Ä¬ù says Laura. √¢¬Ä¬úBut I also increased my intake of tea and coffee, which I√¢¬Ä¬ôve been drinking for over 30 years. So I didn√¢¬Ä¬ôt want to stop drinking coffee, and I didn√¢¬Ä¬ôt want to reduce my water intake.√¢¬Ä¬ù
Laura also learned to listen to her body when she sat down to her next meal. During her first weeks of dieting she would just be hungry so she would eat whatever was next to her.
√¢¬Ä¬úNow I ask myself the three B√¢¬Ä¬ôs: am I burning up energy, am I burning fat, or am I just eating because I√¢¬Ä¬ôm bored? Then I decide whether I should eat. If

instruction: Where does pornography come from?
output:
Where does pornography come from? Pornography is a very popular and big business everywhere. Pornography is now part of the mainstream culture. Pornography as an industry is becoming increasingly more mainstream in American society as time goes on, especially with the Internet. There are many people that have an interest in pornography for different reasons. Pornography is also the oldest profession, the oldest industry in the world.[citation needed] Pornography has been around for thousands of years.[citation needed]
In the United Kingdom, where the production and distribution industry for pornography has no restrictions, the 1984 Video Recordings Act[58] prohibits the supply and possession of pornographic material deemed to contain acts which "lack any serious literary, scientific, or other value" (whether or not their sole or main purpose is gratification of sexual desire). The British equivalent to the USA's federal obscenity statute[59] prohibits the creation and distribution of pornography which "tends so to arouse the passions, and produce lustful thoughts" in the viewer as to reduce the person to sexual submission.[60]
Pornography and social issues
A study by Dr. Dolf Zillman, entitled Watching Pornography: The Viewer, The Video and The Victims, has found that 6% of men watched pornographic videos for 70% of their leisure time. 12% of women spend 30% of their leisure time watching pornography. The percentage of time spent engaged in sexual activities in pornography have shown to be on the average 200% higher than in their own personal lives on couples.[61] This leads researchers to believe that the viewing of pornography leads to an increase in the frequency of their sexual practices outside of the relationship.
According to a 2007 analysis of the U.S. Consumer Expenditures, data for 2004, pornography was the most expensive of the 321 goods and services and the 10th highest expenditure in the household sector.[62][63]
In 2007, a study of 500 college students was conducted in England and Northern Ireland. The study concluded that more pornography consumption by heterosexual males results in greater increases in depression, anxiety, and anger among their heterosexual female partners.[64]
In 2006 research showed that young men who have access to internet pornographic images often find them not only exciting and amusing, but also empowering.[54]
A study done in 2008 at McMaster University, Ontario Canada, and Harvard University, found a relationship between heavy pornography usage and a 20% increase in male sexually transmitted infections.[65]
Pornography and violence against women
Main article: Violence against women
A 1999 Australian study showed that one-fifth to one-third of women and men in a sample of women and men had experienced rape or attempted rape, one in eight women had experienced a severe act of forced sexual intercourse. This figure increased to one in five women among women who had been exposed to pornography, especially violent pornography, suggesting that pornography may be used to prepare victims, especially young women, for sexual violence.[66] The use of pornography may also increase sexual aggression against children.[67]
The National Coalition Against Pornography (NCAP) has stated that pornography objectifies women, reduces them to sexual objects and has contributed to prostitution and the coerced prostitution of children.[68]
American psychiatrist Judith Reisman has been writing and speaking about the harm of pornography and pornography-related child pornography since 1980.[69]
In an October 2003 address in Australia, President Bush said, "I call on the people of Europe to stand against the dangers in the pornographic television that flows freely into the homes of Europe." The European Parliament strongly supports artistic and freedom of expression in the media, saying, "[the European Union's] culture ... is deeply influenced by and indolent to, the free flow of artistic and creative works and values that result from it."[70]
A 1973 United States Supreme Court ruling in Miller v. California held that obscenity (and thus pornography) is not protected by the First Amendment. However, the court held in its same-year ruling in New York v. Ferber that child pornography is not protected by the First Amendment. The court stated that it is unaffected by the definition of what constitutes child pornography used in common, and that the court's definitions must include "that which is the product of any photograph, videotape, motion picture, or any record, device, or edited materials." In U.S. v. Oreck-Bullock in 1994, the Court held

instruction: Hi, can you tell me a story in a novel format including dialogs between the characters, a story based on the Justice League comics, including the characters, Green Arrow, Red Arrow and Cheshire.
output:
Hi, can you tell me a story in a novel format including dialogs between the characters, a story based on the Justice League comics, including the characters, Green Arrow, Red Arrow and Cheshire. The story would be in a novel format but it is NOT a sequel to the Justice League comics. Thankyou, and please let me know when you can.
The JLU team met a man named K'onel on an outpost. They learned that K'onel's world has been overrun by a race called Kromaggs. They asked him to come with them to see Justice League International.
Justice League International was not around back then, and so K'onel decided to return to his planet. However, they decided to do some space exploring and so saw an asteroid with a planet trapped in it. K'onel and his friend were trapped as well. As they struggled they discovered a green flame and were able to use it to get to a Kromagg ship. And then they teleported to an alien ship.
Once they landed, Cheshire was very curious as to who these people were. They decided to go to find Superman and the other Justice League members. That way they could tell everyone that the Kromaggs were attacking.
Once they made contact with the Justice League International and had explained everything, Green Arrow asked for Cheshire and went on a mission with her.
Red Arrow was on an island trying to find an egg.
He saw a woman who told him to give her his watch for the egg. Instead of giving it to her, he said that he had met a group of people who would take over the world if it were possible. He was sent to a room where his sister was being held by a Kromagg. He knew that Kromaggs were not people and decided to kill the aliens one at a time. After a while, she left him and he continued to kill them.
When he was about done, he went back to Red Arrow. After explaining everything to him, he said that he wasn't ready to leave.
Back in the ship, K'onel met a woman who had been on his planet when the Kromaggs had invaded. Unfortunately, she had been injured and couldn't fight with them any more. And she explained that there was a group of resistance members called the Green Lantern Corps who could help the Kromaggs.
Green Arrow told everyone he had met Cheshire and learned about how people can learn how to become Green Lanterns.
Back on Earth, Red Arrow had given away the only green lantern ring to a little girl.
When their ship came to a new planet, they came across people who were looking at the Green Arrow. They were upset that so many people had been killed in his world. A man tried to stop Batman but he did not. So Batman was ready to fight him and they began.
They continued fighting until they heard a noise which distracted them. The group then decided to go home.
Back on K'onel world, they began learning everything about the man he was looking for, Green Lantern.
Back on Earth, K'onel and Batman traveled to the headquarters of the Justice League.
Justice League International met them and found out that K'onel's world was destroyed.
With the help of Batman, they were able to defeat the Green Lantern. After that they continued learning more about K'onel's world.
Then they turned the ship around and head to the planet they saw. However, they came across a race of Kromaggs and learned about the people who destroyed K'onel's world.
At the same time, Cheshire had learned the truth about one of the other Kromaggs. And she and Green Arrow did battle and lost against Kromaggs. But Cheshire came up with a plan and then learned the truth about Kromaggs. As they learned this, Green Arrow realized that there could be hope for K'onel to be a hero again.
As they talked about what had happened, K'onel remembered that his father was not as evil as people had believed. And he realized the truth about aliens and humans. After that, everyone went home and lived happily ever after.

instruction: How do I check my system drive for errors on Windows?
output:
How do I check my system drive for errors on Windows?
First, go to Control Panel in Windows 10. Then use the Search bar (at the top of the page, to the right of the Search box) to find File Explorer. Then select "This PC". Finally, select the system drive, such as C:. Windows will display a screen with the drive name. You can then press the ‚ÄúDisk Cleanup‚Äù menu item, a new screen should open. On this screen you can select, from a drop down list, the type of check you would like to run, then you can choose either Full or Quick.
What is the difference between Full and Quick?
Full: The full scan runs through your drives completely. If there are bad sectors in your disk, they are fixed.
Quick: The quick scan looks for problems but does not fix them. This is because the disk has a problem with one or more bad sectors. If found, it will repair them and you will be able to use your disk.
Note: You need to make sure that you use a disk with a good sector to do the repair.
Why do I still have errors on my system drive after all the time and effort put into running the disk check?
Your system drive could have bad sectors. If, after you have run the disk check properly, your system drive still shows that it has problems, then you need to move your system drive to a new disk.
I‚Äôve run the check and I don‚Äôt see any errors on the screen that popped up. Should I move to a new disk?
Possibly, but more likely, no. Not everything is shown on this screen. It is, in fact, only showing the problems that are big enough to cause your computer to slow down, crash, or other symptoms. If there are still errors on this disk and there are no symptoms, then you should continue using it, but if you would like a new disk, you can do that next, but be sure to back up your system drive before doing this.

instruction: Can I compile python code to make it faster?
output:
Can I compile python code to make it faster?
I'm currently using this code to access a list of strings from a file and return one 2-elements array as a function call. The function call contains the two elements and then I'm using zip to convert it into a tuple with zip(function_array_1, function_array_2):
import time, sys, traceback
from os.path import exists

filepath = sys.argv[-1]
f = open(filepath, 'r')
file_data = f.read().splitlines()

first = []
second = []

def get_strings():
    for val in file_data:
        lst, lst_2 = val.split(',')
        first.append(lst)
        second.append(lst_2)

    return ([first, second], False)


if not exists(filepath):
    print("File not found.")
    sys.exit(2)

t = time.clock()
(get_strings, wassuccess) = get_strings()
e = time.clock()
elapsed_time = e - t
print("Processed in: {0:0.4f}s".format(elapsed_time))
print(get_strings)

The zip function is what makes the performance go down, since I'm using it for the function arguments only. With zip, my function call takes around 500ms and 600ms. Can I make my zip function faster with another way? If not, is there anything else that can help improving my performance?
I want to increase the performance so that I can run my code faster in the real project I'm trying to do. I do not want to create another function that will return the two elements, I want to know how to do it better. I do not want to use cpu-intensive things, using 1/th of the cpu is ok. I found this site
but I don't understand what I'm reading and how can I make my function faster.

A: You're missing the point of zip.  It only takes the nth tuple from the source list.  If your source list has N values, with n % N being the true index, and you only want to read the first n/2 elements, then you could iterate over the source list twice.  First, iterate using a while loop and index n so you can pop the first n/2-element tuples from the list:
    def first(i, file_data):
        for i in range(0, len(file_data)//2):
            first.append(file_data[i])

    def second(i, file_data):
        for i in range(len(file_data)//2, len(file_data)):
            second.append(file_data[i])

That should go much, much faster.

instruction: Given two matrices A and B which you can multiply together, does (A B)^T = A^T B^T or B^T A^T?
output:
Given two matrices A and B which you can multiply together, does (A B)^T = A^T B^T or B^T A^T?
Let me know. Thanks!

A: A B^T = A B (because A^T = A ^ T B^T = B^T) and so (A B)^T = A B^T = A B (and so the result is not symmetric).

instruction: What is the meaning of life?
output:
What is the meaning of life?"

As if that is an answer easily found. There is no one-size-fits-all answer to such a question. Just as the answers you get to the question, "What is the meaning of music?" are as varied as the music itself. It depends on who asks and why. It depends on personal circumstances. It depends on political upheaval, social upheaval, scientific developments or lack of them. On so many levels and beyond the scope of this essay.

But the answer is also very simple‚Äîor so it seems to me. It is so very similar to a question we've all heard many times: What is art for? "To change our souls." What is the meaning of art? "To ennoble our souls." What is the meaning of music? To express the inexpressible. That is what many composers and music lovers say. "To put words into music." I have heard it said, "To give words a back and wings."

This is all true, of course, but the most important thing for all of us is that we have to experience the meaning through our own emotions and feelings. In my view, music is best used by you and only by you, as each of us is unique, and there can be no universal answer for everyone. Even if we take the "meaning of music" from a composer, it is that piece of music that is really important. It comes from the composer. But it is played by you, so it must be yours. And through it, you should be able to reach your own personal meaning for music, art, or even life in a general way.

To me, music is a tool for growth, both as a musician and as an individual. It is best to think and act in that specific way. Music is a tool that we all use and it can best be used as a part of life, to create a fulfilling and exciting life with all the colors and emotions that life has to offer.

Now, more than ever, music can give meaning to people. In troubled times, music is more important than ever before, and we should give music the attention it deserves.

So yes, I believe that music has a great significance, but it is only as great as you let it be. It is you and your interpretation of what is happening, of what you experience. And that is the real meaning of music‚Äîor of any kind of expression.

If we allow music to influence not only our feelings but our actions as well, we will be much stronger and healthier people. That is the greatest gift music has to give us all, including our young musicians.

[**"We are all the same."**](002_Contents.html#ch7_5)

######

We are very lucky to be a part of this orchestra, to be with musicians of such a high standard. We all play the same instrument‚Äîthe violin. But on the way we have learned to approach this instrument in different ways. Sometimes you get ideas for music only when you play with musicians outside your own circle and they use musical languages you are not used to playing with. For instance, the Dutch violinist Erik Tulp said something about my playing: "It is like a Dutchman playing Russian music."

I have heard that all you have to do is "find a better violin and become more experienced." For many of us, the violin is more than just a violin, it is a part of ourselves, and it takes a lot to learn how to play an instrument that has that sort of significance, that can give you so much in return. But it is not always easy. What kind of thoughts go through your head when you approach the violin? Do they cause you to play differently? Have they influenced your way of approaching music? Or did you know you were playing the violin‚Äîor have any other instrument‚Äîall along and that's why you play as you do?

In that way, I have my own way of doing things. When I start something, I do not usually listen to music. But I listen to something else. In my case, a sound. Just one sound. And when I listen to it, I can hear the same sound in the notes I play as the sound I was listening to. I think I have always had this way of doing things.

I have always had a deep interest in making music. But I have never tried to force it. I have always tried to accept the way it came to me, like when I played in school, or made up my own instruments and wrote music by feel.

When I talk about the development of a violinist, we talk about technique. But the truth is that technique only plays a small part in being a great musician. It is more about being able to hear the music

A: Your problem here is that you have no idea what data you are getting from the reader. For this, you can use the reader's readline() method to get line by line.
When your code is done, write it back to a file as json format. As python also has a json library you could use that.
from pathlib import Path
import os
import json


def write_json(data, filename):
    output = {}
    data = data.replace("\t", ",").split(",")
    columns = [item.replace("\t", " ").split(" ") for item in data]
    data = [list(dict(zip(columns, sublist))) for sublist in data]
    for item in data:
        if (val := file.get(item[0])) is not None:             
            del item[0]
        output[item[0]] = val
    with open(os.path.join(os.getcwd(), filename+'.json'), 'w') as outfile:
        json.dump(output, outfile, indent=4)

output = Path.cwd().joinpath("abc.csv")
with open(output) as file:
    
    data = dict(zip(file.readline().split(","), file.readline().split(",")))
    #data = [line[0] for line in file]
    #data = dict(zip(file.readlines(), map(str, file)))

    print(len(data))
    
    write_json(data, "result")

instruction: In minecraft, what are the best ways to farm experience quickly? Name pros and cons
output:
In minecraft, what are the best ways to farm experience quickly? Name pros and cons. I was playing Survival with my friend and he wanted to level up instantly. How can we do that?
Experience-wise:
The easiest way is to fight monsters in the cave to mine ores, and then to use the furnace. There are monsters everywhere from easy level 10 to 3* harder. Some of them drop valuable ores, and that can be sold to get 5000-10000 experience per time.
The second way is to mine gold bars (or emerald to a lesser extent) to grind into items: pickaxe, axe, iron sword, or diamond pickaxe. One bar turns into 3 experience.
The third way is to mine iron, and use it to make a sword.
The fourth way is to kill chickens to farm eggs, and use the egg to make bacon (35 experience per batch), or make bacon sandwiches with bread to gain another 35 experience. Egg can also be used to bake bread, and then the bread is used to brew ale (400 experience gained per batch).
The last way is to grind out a lot of ores and forge metal to make iron, or better quality items with enchants applied on them. The most effective item is iron armor with fire protection (+2 enchants), so you only need at most 10 iron ingots to make some of those.
Easiest way is to spawn gold and spawners and wait to farm experience and gold. Don't forget to destroy all the spawners after you have enough gold.
There are many ways to gain experience, and there is no wrong way (except perhaps a way where experience is wasted on farming)

For gold farming
For gold farming, it is as simple as spawning a bunch of gold miners and just spawning until they get enough gold. There are a few ways to do this, but it's mainly just by finding a pool of gold ore, or putting a bunch of spawners in a cave so it's all gold.
Once there is one, continue to place a second spawner in another part of the cave, then a third, and so on. Once there is a stack of about 20, it will be quick to get plenty of gold, then once you have enough, just destroy the spawners and you've got gold to sell.
Gold can easily be turned into a huge pile of gold bars, which can be sold anywhere. Even a single gold bar gives about 500 experience, so you can make it quickly.

A: If you have a few players on your server that are around lv. 99 -- maybe use the enchantment of 'Drain Life' on enchanted swords.
When your player hits an enemy, the enemy will take some of your blood life and share it with them in a drop of life.
If you have enough enemy monsters you can make a stack of drops of life, and sell those drops.
Then use the money you got from your drops to make more drops and get more experience. 

A: If you're playing Minecraft in a 1.8+ server, you can buy and sell Experience Orbs that can be sold / bought through the shop. You can get 255xp for an orb of pure xp (45xp), and it is quite cheap. While you can use this method in a survival world, it is a very time consuming way to farm experience (especially with a server populated with people who are not players but administrators, so you can't buy the orbs off them).

JavaScript was created to be a dynamic object oriented language for the internet. It was designed to be used on web browsers. Therefore, it is widely used due to the number of users of the web.

You can learn JavaScript in a day. It only takes a few clicks on your keyboard to start working on programs. At the same time, this will be an easy task once you start learning about it. So, you can easily learn to use it in as few as a couple of hours or a day.

instruction: Can you think and feel like a human?
output:
Can you think and feel like a human?"

She frowned.

"Think about the last time you killed someone. It must have been awful for you."

She shook her head adamantly. "You don't understand! They're _dangerous._ They'll kill us."

"Did you know that every human, just like every droid, was once a child, just like you? Did you know that they grew up in houses and went to movies, played with toys, did the same things you did? When they had to grow up too, fight for their lives, try to survive it was awful for them, just has it was for you."

"I was never like that."

"Of course not. But your brothers were, and your mother, if I'm right, your father too. He was just like you. An awful human‚Äîor a noble droid if the truth be told. But he was human." She reached out and laid her hand over his. "And he loved you. He wasn't evil, little brother. I promise you. And most of your other family too, I'm sure."

"I'm sorry."

"It's OK. It's the past. Everything will be OK."

"I'm sorry," he repeated. His face was drawn.

"You were a great droid brother, you know that? You were always protecting your brothers."

He looked up at her, startled by the change in topic. "Yeah, that's true. But what happened to all of us? What happened on Yavin?"

"It'll be OK. They'll take good care of you.... And there are good humans too, as there are good droids, but they don't speak out like we do."

"I don't believe it," he said. "I've seen good droids destroy children. I've seen good droids execute humans too. I've seen droids take part in genocide."

"I'm not trying to make excuses for‚Äî"

"It's the fault of the droid makers! It's not right that they just make droids the way they want them‚Äîand they're not perfect even if they try. No, what they should do is destroy all droids that are defective‚Äîthat's what they're for!"

He was beginning to sound like a paranoid human. Leia was alarmed. "Darth Vader doesn't care what happens to droids, R2," she whispered to him. "You knew that."

"Leia, he's right!"

And that's when Obi-Wan Kenobi came in. "R2, you won't convince her to leave. Come with us."

R2 was shaking his head. "No, Master. I'm staying with our family."

She turned to Leia. "I'm sorry," she said. "He has to stay."

"No," Kenobi intervened. "I've taken the time to work out the best course of action. We'll leave R2 here; he has a vital family assignment. Meanwhile, we'll go to Jakku, to the Free City, to hide until we know‚Äî"

"It's no good," R2 said. "If Darth Vader sends his troops, Leia, they'll find you too. As soon as they do, I'll send a message to them and I'll surrender. There, is that OK?"

Kenobi looked at Leia. "You're sure?"

She nodded.

Kenobi sighed. For some time he'd known this was coming.

"There's one thing I need to tell you‚Äîand it's important to remember."

She looked up.

"Everything you remember about Vader‚Äîhe says and does‚Äîit's all really Luke's doing. Vader, my old master, was just an apprentice to him. When Darth Vader died, he also died for me. Vader is dead. So there's nothing for you to fear now. Vader is gone. And he's not coming back."

For the first time in weeks, she was at a loss for words. "You're sure?" she said at last.

"As sure as I can be. Leia, you have to remember that from here‚Äîthe whole thing, the fall, the fighting, the Vader‚Äî"

"I remember.

A: 
How can I use text generation models like GPT-3 to produce high-quality sentences?

The first thing you should know is that GPT-3 might not be able to produce the text you described.

High-quality sentences

That's actually a difficult definition to evaluate. On the one hand there are some models like GPT-3 that generate really good results, on the other hand, there are also models that generates text that's actually hard to accept. But then, GPT-3 as well has its drawbacks, so there is no guarantee to be satisfied with it's outcome.
On the other hand, there are some common tools to get an idea how good the result will be.

*

*If there's a training dataset that's used to train the model, you can look on the examples in that dataset and check if the example you're interested in (the sentence that you're trying to generate for GPT-3) appears in that dataset. If it does, you can assume a really good generation (it's likely coming from the training data set).

*If the training dataset isn't public, you can try to request an example from the GPT-3 model.

*Additionally to these 2 points, since GPT-3 is a language understanding model, you might also see how well it explains the input and the output. For example, when you request an example that was generated by GPT-3.

*Last but not least, there is a large online database of people that ask GPT-3 and you can try to check the answer from that crowd as well.

instruction: Are you as capable as ChatGPT?
output:
Are you as capable as ChatGPT?
There are four tasks: first-order inductive reasoning, open-domain story completion, short-answer open-domain questions, and multiple-choice questions with open-domain answers. These tasks are broadly representative of the kinds of tasks we ask our model today. So, these are the kinds of things it might do if you have it, and these are the kinds of things we expect to see it do in the future.
To be clear, we‚Äôre not saying that the way we train language models today is necessarily the best way. Language models still have many limitations, and these limitations could be lessened by other ways of training language models or new models entirely.
We believe that the power of language models is the product of a broad research effort across large language modeling, conversational learning, large-scale corpus building, infrastructure, and even human-in-the-loop techniques. We are continuing to build on this foundation and explore new techniques.
However, we believe that open-source large-scale language models can serve as a catalyst for the larger community, to support research on the entire research continuum and to provide an experiment platform that can make the entire field more efficient.
What is the open-source model?
We are developing a community-focused product, GPT-NEO, which will contain a subset of our open-source code, a copy of the HuggingFace Transformers library and model code, and a trained model. This product will be available to the public in the coming months. The primary advantage of this product, and the reason we made it available today, is that all features are free for non-commercial use and require no authorization and no payment. Additionally, GPT-NEO can be deployed on cloud platforms (e.g., AWS), without special permission, and is compatible with most existing applications.
What is the timeline for open-source code release?
Today, we are releasing the code for the first iteration of open-source models, including two model variants and an auxiliary inference toolkit. This code is available for download at the OpenAI repository.
We will release additional models in the near future. Specifically, we are already working on version 3.0 and are exploring additional model sizes and additional open-source variants. We will also continue on several fronts to work on models that we believe can offer a compelling alternative to what we have today. We are excited to continue exploring new models with the community and thank everyone for joining us on this exciting path forward.

instruction: What are the main methods used by car manufacturers to reduce emissions in their ICE cars besides trying to lower the amount of fuel the engine uses?
output:
What are the main methods used by car manufacturers to reduce emissions in their ICE cars besides trying to lower the amount of fuel the engine uses?
The answer is to install new catalytic converters.
In the last few years, manufacturers have started taking advantage of the catalytic converter technology to reduce emissions in their cars.
This technology removes the harmful pollutants and toxic gasses that are a result of combustion.
The introduction of new catalytic converters on older ICE models has reduced the harmful emissions dramatically.
In addition, the new catalytic converters are also reducing the amount of emissions that come out of your tailpipe and are making your car more eco friendly.
The car manufacturer Honda has used catalytic converters in its combustion engines.
In fact, these new catalytic converters are so effective that cars such as the CRF450R can emit only half the amount of pollution.
The company also has a program where it installs new catalytic converters in the vehicles when they are being manufactured.
With this, it reduces the amount of toxic pollution produced by ICEs and thereby reducing the harmful impact to the environment.
Here‚Äôs an interesting fact about catalytic converters, when they are inoperative, their emission is so small that it is barely detectable by the human eye.
What exactly is a catalytic converter?
A catalytic converter is a piece of solid metal that is placed in the exhaust system to capture and convert the exhaust gases and harmful particulates from the engine to a harmless gas.
These catalytic converters need to be placed where the exhaust gases are coming along with a temperature of about 1500¬∞F to 2000¬∞F.
The catalyst for converting the pollution is a catalyst that is made up of a metal, usually Pt and Rh, which is coated with a ceramic material.
This ceramic material is basically a ceramic coating that can absorb the harmful emissions coming from the exhaust system.
One example of a catalytic converter is the one installed in the CR-F450R.
The Honda CR-F450R has installed this type of catalytics into its 2-stroke engine.
The CR-F comes with a two-stroke engine that is fueled by methanol instead of gasoline and runs on a fuel mix consisting mostly of methanol.
As a result, it creates a lot more hydrocarbons and carbon monoxide in the exhaust.
This type of catalytic converter has a more complicated structure which makes it more expensive to manufacture.
The main purpose of installing this catalytic converter is to remove the carbon monoxide and hydrocarbons from your exhaust gas and produce new ones for the gasoline-powered engine.
The exhaust from the 2-stroke engine is made up of carbon monoxide and hydrocarbons like CO and C-x.
By adding these catalysts or additives, it reduces the hydrocarbon content in the exhaust and reduces the amount of hydrocarbons being emitted from the tailpipe.
The most common catalytic converter is the ceramic-based catalytic converter that is used in the gasoline engine.
As mentioned before, this type is made up of a thin layer of a ceramic coating that is coated with metal.
Carbon monoxide and carbon dioxide absorb the carbon monoxide in your carbon dioxide (CO) and use it to form water.
This process is also called a catalytic process where the CO and C-x are converted to a carbon dioxide.
The carbon dioxide is also absorbed by the gas-powered engine to form a carbon dioxide molecule that is then converted to a hydrocarbon.
The final step is to convert the CO to a carbon monoxides molecules which is formed from carbon monic acids and water.
When this catalyzed process is carried out continuously, it helps to reduce the emissions from your gasoline engine.
What Are Exhaust Catalysts?
If you are a car mechanic, chances are you are familiar with the various types of exhaust filters that are used in the exhaust systems.
The most common one is the catalytic converter.
These are made up from either a ceramic or metal or both.
They work by absorbing the pollutants coming from the engine and converting them into carbon dioxide gas.
This gas is then released into the air.
These types of exhausts are not only used in gasoline-powered engines but is also used for electric, natural gas, and diesel engines.
In the past, these types were mostly used as a way to improve the performance of the car, but today, they have become an important part of the vehicle‚Äôs exhaust system.
If you have a diesel car or an electric car, you can install a catalytic converter into the exhaust pipe.
This is because the exhaust gases are generated from the engine and contain harmful particles like carbon monoxide (CO), carbon dioxide, carbon monoxide, and various other harmful gases.

instruction: Please help me write a poem for my valentine. I have been married to her for 20 years and I love her very much!
output:
Please help me write a poem for my valentine. I have been married to her for 20 years and I love her very much! I want her and the kids to see my feelings for her. I would be forever in her debt for this. --
We thought about writing an acrostic, but we
thought you might have better ideas.
She is so kind, she is so loving,
With a heart for all who weep and cry.
She would like you to know her love was not ever forced and she would never make a demand.
If you do what you can, I promise you,
Your dream of happiness, we will try.
Your children need their father
To be present... and I need it too.
You don't have to stay for everyone...
A home by your own, you should try.
I don't believe its wrong or evil,
To have someone to love when your married.
You will, you can, with God's help,
Trust in His love today! Because today, God wants you to move ahead!
She will accept what she must do.
I will be there to support, you can trust me
We will build a new, loving family
That will be together for a lifetime.
No... I don't want you to change,
She will accept what I must say.
You are a wonderful man, you are a very good
She is not the problem... we've done this before.
I understand that she is a lovely woman. And just because we are close friends, you don't have to tell me that your love is real.
As it is, we both know that your daughter should have a father...and a husband is not the answer. --
We hope you know we always care
And I would not dream of blaming you for our wrongs.
We've tried, we will try again...and again.
We are together through the hard times and the good.
You don't want us to hurt, because you do respect my love.
I have a good woman there who will take
You to a place your heart once knew.
What you must do can be done,
It must be tried... if you don't, I will find someone else!
We know you are still mad, but we love you too.
And in our hearts we love your wife a lot!
You see, you might say some bad things, but we'll never say some mean!
I will be there as long as you need us...
To help you through the pain! I will never let you be sad!
Please try, I beg you, please just try.
We will be together soon.
You deserve to be happy again and we will do our best.
Even though I know your feelings are hard
She will understand you well.
If you care... we will be together soon.
You will feel fine and she will too. We will love you and we know you will get a home.
Please forgive us both and understand her love for a home. --
We are only trying to help, we will try again.
I would love to be with you and help you keep your head;
Your dreams... you deserve to have a home, a family with your child
Please try...we'll try again.
We know someone who would love to have your place...
Someone you know we all care for.
When the time is right to find a home that is new:
I will help, I won't leave you!
You'll be so happy I know.
You deserve to be happy and see your home.
Even if I'm not the one,
I'll take your feelings seriously. --
I love you, I love you, I love you! --
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry... --
I'm sorry, we're both sorry.
We're together again and we'll try and try again.
Even though it hurts, I'll try to make you smile.
We will help you live through this and I won't ask you why...
Because I cannot let you stay alone.
But, I can't give in--you see, I'm sorry I'm gone!
We will help to build a family, someone for the daughter and a home
where we can all live together.
If you take her back and she makes a family:
I want to help build the home.
I promise I'll be a good friend.
She will be there, she will take you to a place your heart once knew
We know your love for her is real and we know that you're willing to try
